ActorDebug/BaselineStandIntroTurnsMissing,如果模型為「站立-開始」（Stand,Start）的動畫，以及擁有性質群組為[%1]「站立-左邊」（Stand,Left）和「站立-右邊」（Stand,Right）的動畫，則其必須同時擁有該群組的「站立-開始-左邊」（Stand,Start,Left）和「站立-開始-右邊」（Stand,Start,Right）的動畫。比方說一個單位在跟隨另一個單位時，該單位可以在進入「站立」（Stand）動畫時轉向。當它靠近時便開始進行站立，不過需轉向以持續面向其所跟隨的單位。=140

Missile/CannotHaveZeroStopAtDistanceOnZeroethPhase,若超過1個階段時，在第0個的階段時無法將「止於」的距離設為0。移動器[%1]。 /// Cannot have 0 stopAt distance on zeroeth phase if there is more than 1 phase.  Mover[%1].=1263
Missile/CannotPowerslideOnNonPositiveAccel,無法在有非正值加速值的階段使用甩尾。移動器[%1]階段[%2]。 /// Cannot use powerslide on phases with non-positive acceleration.  Mover[%1] Phase[%2].=1264
Missile/EmptyThrowVector,清除投擲向量。移動器[%1]階段[%2]。 /// Empty throw vector.  Mover[%1] Phase[%2].=1265
Missile/InvalidPitchThrowBand,無效的俯仰投擲帶。移動器[%1]階段[%2]。 /// Invalid pitch throw band.  Mover[%1] Phase[%2].=1266
Missile/InvalidYawThrowBand,無效的篇轉投擲帶。移動器[%1]階段[%2]。 /// Invalid yaw throw band.  Mover[%1] Phase[%2].=1267
Missile/NoMotionDriver,無動作驅動器。移動器[%1]階段[%2]。 /// No motion driver.  Mover[%1] Phase[%2].=1268
Missile/StopAtNotGreaterThanOrEqualToBlendAt,止於[%1]不 >= 融於 [%2]。移動器[%3]階段[0]。一個階段完全中止的距離，必須超過或等於該階段淡出的起始距離。=1269
Missile/StopAtNotGreaterThanOrEqualToBlendAtPhase,止於[%1]不 >= 融於 [%2]。移動器[%3]階段[%4]。一個階段完全中止的距離，必須超過或等於該階段淡出的起始距離。=1270
Missile/UnsupportedNegativeBlendAtAndPositiveStopAt,不支援 - 負值的融於[%1]和正值的止於[%2]。移動器[%3]階段[%4]。無法在根據目標點指定一個階段淡出的起始距離時，同時根據發射點指定該階段最終的中止距離。若發射點和目標點之間的距離不一致，可能會使行為不一致或是出現預期之外的行為。=1271
Missile/UnsupportedNonGroundHeightMap,預設動作者飛彈[%1]；飛彈只能支援地面高度貼圖。空中高度貼圖使空中單位可在山崖間流暢地移動，且不為飛彈提供任何協助，所以對於那些需要靠近地面的飛彈只會造成一些小毛病而已。也因為如此，通常會忽略飛彈上的設定。 /// CMoverMissile[%1]; Missiles only support the ground height map.  The air height map enables fliers to move smoothly over cliffs -- it offers no assistance to missiles and would only causes glitches in missiles that need to be near the ground.  It is therefore ignored on missiles.=1272

UI/ChatPrivacyToolTipGameStatus,<c val="ffffff">自動設為忙碌：</c><n/>此功能開啟後，每當你在玩遊戲時，你的Battle.net狀態會自動切換為忙碌。對戰時，來自外部的發言和即時聊天訊息都不會顯示通知。等你回到主選單時，你的狀態將恢復成之前的設定。 /// <c val="ffffff">Automatic Busy Status:</c><n/>When enabled, your status will be automatically set to Busy while playing matches. While in a match, features such as toasts and in-line chat from outside the match will be suppressed.  When you return to the main menu, your status will be restored to its previous setting.=3738

These players will be displayed by their character ID. Disabling this feature prevents both you from seeing other players on your network and them from seeing you.<n/><n/>Note: Toggling this feature may require some time to take effect.=3739

UI/GameplayOptionsTooltips/ControlGroupMode,<c val="ffffff">編隊：</c><n/>決定編隊按鈕的行為。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">普通：</c>可看見按鈕並用滑鼠點擊。<n/><c val="ffffff">隱藏：</c>無法看見按鈕。<n/><c val="ffffff">無法點擊：</c>可看見按鈕，但無法用滑鼠點擊。<n/><c val="ffffff">無法指定：</c>可看見按鈕。編組的隊伍可以叫回來，但是無法用滑鼠點擊來指定。 /// <c val="ffffff">Control Groups:</c><n/>Determines the behavior of Control Group Buttons.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Normal:</c> Buttons are visible and can be clicked by the mouse.<n/><c val="ffffff">Hidden:</c> Buttons are not visible.<n/><c val="ffffff">Unclickable:</c> Buttons are visible but can not be clicked by the mouse.<n/><c val="ffffff">Unassignable:</c> Buttons are visible. Control groups may be recalled but not assigned with mouse clicks.=5593

UI/GameplayOptionsTooltips/FlyerHelper,<c val="ffffff">顯示飛行單位映射：</c><n/>飛行單位映射是在地形上顯示飛行單位所在位置的指引標誌。你可以透過此選項來設定顯示方式。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">不顯示：</c>從不顯示飛行單位映射<n/><c val="ffffff">顯示選取：</c>僅顯示選取的和事先瞄準的單位<n/><c val="ffffff">顯示全部：</c>顯示所有的飛行單位映射 /// <c val="ffffff">Show Flyer Helper:</c><n/>Flyer helpers are indicators that display the position of flying units on the terrain. This setting determines when they will be displayed.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">None:</c> Never show flyer helpers<n/><c val="ffffff">Selected:</c> Selected and pre-target units only<n/><c val="ffffff">Always:</c> Show all flyer helpers=5595

UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/Model,<c val="ffffff">模型品質：</c><n/>高品質模型可以讓模型擁有更多的細節變化。死亡和建築的動畫，以及星際平台的背景變化最為明顯。<n/><n/>將著色器設定為中等或以上，可以解開高品質模型的設定。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>死亡、建築和其他特效共用一個簡化模型<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>所有模型為獨特的，且具有較高品質<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c><n/><n/><c val="FF2222">改變此選項設定需要重新啟動遊戲才會生效。</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Model Quality:</c><n/>High quality models allow for more variety in various models. UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/PhysicsQuality,<c val="ffffff">物理品質：</c><n/>決定碰撞物件和重力的真實度。<n/><n/>物理品質取決於電腦的處理器（CPU）。<n/><n/>可用的物理物件數量將隨等級從中至極限，而由少變多。更多功能：<n/><c val="ffffff">關閉：</c>無物理模擬<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>開啟布娃娃效果<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Physics Quality:</c><n/>Determines the realism of colliding objects and gravity.<n/><n/>Physics Quality relies on your computer's processor (CPU).<n/><n/>Each setting from Medium to Extreme increases the number of possible active physics objects. In addition:<n/><c val="ffffff">Off:</c> No physics simulation<n/><c val="ffffff">High:</c> Ragdolls enabled<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5690
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/Portraits,<c val="ffffff">單位頭像：</c><n/>可讓你變更單位頭像顯示的方式。<n/><n/>全立體頭像需要消耗較高的資源。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Unit Portraits:</c><n/>Allows you to change the way that unit portraits are displayed.<n/><n/>Fully three-dimensional unit portraits have a higher performance cost.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5691
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/PostProcessingQuality,<c val="ffffff">後製處理品質：</c><n/>決定光暈及景深的品質。<n/><n/>後製處理效果取決於顯示卡。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>開啟位移效果<n/><c val="ffffff">中：</c>開啟光暈效果<n/><c val="ffffff">超高：</c>開啟景深效果<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Post-Processing Quality:</c><n/>Determines the quality of selection halos and depth-of-field.<n/><n/>Post-Processing relies on your graphics card.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Low:</c> Displacement enabled<n/><c val="ffffff">Medium:</c> Halos enabled<n/><c val="ffffff">Ultra:</c> Depth-of-Field enabled<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5692
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/ReflectionQuality,<c val="ffffff">反射：</c><n/>開啟在水面和蟲苔上的反射效果。<n/><n/>反射效果取決於電腦的處理器（CPU）。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Reflections:</c><n/>Enables reflections on creep and water.<n/><n/>Reflections rely on your computer's processor (CPU).<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5693
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/RefreshRate,<c val="ffffff">螢幕更新率：</c><n/>顯示器更新畫面的頻率。如果更新率太低，可能會看到閃爍的狀況。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：預設</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Refresh Rate:</c><n/>Refers to the number of times the image is drawn to the monitor.  Some players may see a flicker if the refresh rate is too low.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: Default</c>=5694
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/Resolution,<c val="ffffff">解析度：</c><n/>較高的解析度將會提高清晰度，但會大幅影響效能。請選擇一個適合你顯示器的長寬比例。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Resolution:</c><n/>Higher resolutions will result in increased clarity, but this greatly affects performance.  Choose a resolution that matches the aspect ratio of your monitor.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5695
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/ShaderDetail,<c val="ffffff">著色器品質：</c><n/>決定著色器的複雜程度，且會對許多特殊效果產生影響。對影像品質及效能表現影響甚大。<n/><n/>著色器品質取決於顯示卡。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>簡化的著色器效果，只有光影貼圖和平行光<n/><c val="ffffff">中：</c>簡化的 HDR 效果、法線貼圖、高光照及強化戰爭迷霧<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>柔和陰影、細部光線、環境遮蔽、強化匿蹤及軟粒子<n/><c val="ffffff">超高：</c>HDR 效果全開、半透明陰影、視差貼圖及容積物質<c val="ffffff"><n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c>%supported% /// <c val="ffffff">Shader Quality:</c><n/>This determines how complex your shaders are, which impacts a variety of special effects.  This can have a great impact on visual quality and performance.<n/><n/>Shader Quality relies on your graphics card.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Low:</c> Simplified shaders, light maps and directional lights only<n/><c val="ffffff">Medium:</c> Simplified HDR, normal maps, specular highlights and improved fog of war<n/><c val="ffffff">High:</c> Soft shadows, detail lights, ambient occlusion, improved cloaking and soft particles<n/><c val="ffffff">Ultra:</c> True HDR, translucent shadows, parallax mapping and volumetric materials<c val="ffffff"><n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>%supported%=5696
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/ShadowQuality,<c val="ffffff">陰影品質：</c><n/>可使所有投射的陰影擁有更多的細節。<n/><n/>陰影品質取決於顯示卡。著色器品質設為低才支援低等的陰影品質。將著色器設為中即可支援中等或更好的陰影品質。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>僅有團狀陰影<n/><c val="ffffff">中：</c>即時陰影<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>增強的陰影解析度及水波陰影<n/><c val="ffffff">超高：</c>最佳陰影解析度及半透明陰影<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Shadow Quality:</c><n/>Allows greater detail on all shadows cast.<n/><n/>Shadow Quality relies on your graphics card. Low Shadows is only available for Low Shaders.  Select Medium Shaders to unlock Shadow Quality at Medium or better.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Low:</c> Blob shadows only<n/><c val="ffffff">Medium:</c> Real-time shadows<n/><c val="ffffff">High:</c> Improved shadow resolution and water shadows<n/><c val="ffffff">Ultra:</c> Best shadow resolution and transparent shadows<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5697

UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/TerrainQuality,<c val="ffffff">地形品質：</c><n/>可以在地形上顯示更多細節。提高地形品質會提升植物叢、霧氣、水面和蟲苔的細節。<n/><n/>地形品質取決於顯示卡。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>沒有植物叢，水面和蟲苔的細節單調<n/><c val="ffffff">中：</c>水面單調，蟲苔細節提高，植物叢少<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>逼真的水面，植物叢較多<n/><c val="ffffff">超高：</c>水面逼真及植物叢完整<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Terrain Quality:</c><n/>Allows greater detail on the terrain.  Raising Terrain Quality will increase the foliage, fog, water, and creep detail.<n/><n/>Terrain Quality relies on your graphics card.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Low:</c> No foliage and simple water and creep<n/><c val="ffffff">Medium:</c> Simple water, improved creep, little foliage<n/><c val="ffffff">High:</c> Realistic water and more foliage<n/><c val="ffffff">Ultra:</c> Water caustics and all foliage<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5699
UI/GraphicsOptionsTooltips/TextureQuality,<c val="ffffff">材質品質：</c><n/>決定遊戲中使用的材質清晰度及大小。較高的材質品質將會顯示較多細節，但會需要用到更多的顯示卡記憶體。<n/><n/>材質品質取決於顯示卡的記憶體大小（VRAM）。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">低：</c>128 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">中：</c>256 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">高：</c>512 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">超高：</c>1024 MB<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">建議選項：%val%</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Texture Quality:</c><n/>Determines the clarity and size of textures used throughout the game.  Higher texture quality will result in more detail, but it requires more video memory.<n/><n/>Texture Quality relies on your total video memory (VRAM).<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Low:</c> 128 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">Medium:</c> 256 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">High:</c> 512 MB<n/><c val="ffffff">Ultra:</c> 1024 MB<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Suggested: %val%</c>=5700

UI/HelpGameMechanic_Experience_Description,<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>每當你的隊友附近有敵方小兵或英雄死亡，以及敵方建築物遭到破壞時，你們就會獲得經驗值。</li><li>經驗值是全隊共享的。</li><li>升級時，你會獲得新的天賦，英雄的屬性也會提升。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Experience is earned when a teammate is close to an enemy minion when it dies, when an enemy hero dies, or when an enemy fortification is destroyed.</li><li>Experience earned is shared across the team.</li><li>Leveling up gives you talents and better hero stats.</li></ul>=5795

UI/HotkeyProfileDescription/0_Default,標準設定將會讓大部分的指令保留在鍵盤的左側。指令名稱的第一個單字通常就是熱鍵。 /// Standard keeps most commands on the left side of the keyboard. The first letter of the command name is often used as the hotkey.=6371
UI/HotkeyProfileDescription/1_NameRightSide,專為左撇子玩家所設計的熱鍵配置。大部分的指令將保留在鍵盤的右側，其中需注意的配置差異為：<n/>- F12為 Escape 鍵的備用鍵。<n/>- 聊天熱鍵改為 Tab 鍵。<n/>- 編隊功能從按鍵1至按鍵0改為按鍵3至等號(=)鍵。 /// Designed for left-handed players. Keeps most commands on the right side of the keyboard. A few key differences to make note of:<n/>   - The F12 key is an alternate key for Escape.<n/>   - Chat moved to the Tab key.<n/>   - Control Group functionality shifted from the 1 to 0 keys to the 3 to = keys.=6372
UI/HotkeyProfileDescription/2_GridLeftSide,網格熱鍵將根據指令欄下按鈕的位置而決定。 /// Grid hotkeys are based on the button's position in the command card.=6373
UI/HotkeyProfileDescription/3_GridRightSide,網格熱鍵將根據指令欄下按鈕的位置而決定。有一些不同的按鍵需要特別注意：<n/>   - F12 也是跳出的按鍵。<n/>   - 聊天移至Tab按鍵。<n/>   - 控制群組功能從1到0的鍵盤按鍵掉換至3到=的鍵盤按鍵。 /// Grid hotkeys are based on the button's position in the command card. A few key differences to make note of:<n/>   - The F12 key is an alternate key for Escape.<n/>   - Chat moved to the Tab key.<n/>   - Control Group functionality shifted from the 1 to 0 keys to the 3 to = keys.=6374

UI/ImageUploadAttentionText,注意！</N>你將上傳一個影像至暴雪平台服務。上傳有版權或具攻擊性/惡意的內容是違反《星海爭霸II》最終用戶許可協議以及暴雪平台服務的使用條款並可導致遭受處分行為，其中包括完全限制使用暴雪平台服務的服務 。請在上傳前確保你的影像符合最終用戶許可協議以及使用條款。 /// ATTENTION!</N>You are about to upload an image to the Blizzard service. Uploading copyrighted, offensive, or malicious content is against the StarCraft II End User License Agreement and the Blizzard Terms Of Use and can result in disciplinary action that may include complete restriction from the Blizzard service. Please ensure that your image is compliant with the EULA and TOU before uploading.=6414
UI/ImageUploadHelp,<c val="ffffff">圖形需求：</c><n/><ul text="-"><li/>支援的圖檔類型：DDS，PNG，JPG與TGA<li/>圖形必須為尺寸介於2x2與256x256之間的正方形影像圖檔。<li/>圖檔的大小必須小於256KB。</ul>=6415

UI/InputOptionsTooltips,必須先開啟權限才能使用此選項。在「輔助使用」中，勾選「允許使用輔助設備」選項。要現在開啟「系統偏好設定」嗎？ /// In order to use this option accessibility needs to be in enabled. Please check the option "Enable access for assistive devices" in the Universal Access System Preferences panel.  Would you like to open the System Preferences now?=6431
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/AltTabDisable,<c val="ffffff">關閉 Alt-Tab 熱鍵：</c><n/>關閉 Alt-Tab 按鍵組合。若要避免不小心將遊戲視窗最小化，請使用此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff">Disable Alt-Tab Shortcut:</c><n/>Disables the Alt-Tab key combination. Use this if you don't want to accidentally minimize the game.=6432
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/CameraFollow,<c val="ffffff">啟用鏡頭跟隨：</c><n/>啟用後，鏡頭會跟著你的英雄在戰場上移動。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Camera Follow:</c><n/>When enabled, the camera will follow your hero as it moves around the map.=6433
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/CmdTabDisable,<c val="ffffff">關閉 Cmd-Tab 熱鍵：</c><n/>關閉 Cmd-Tab 按鍵組合。若要避免不小心將遊戲視窗最小化，請使用此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff">Disable Cmd-Tab Shortcut:</c><n/>Disables the Cmd-Tab key combination. Use this if you don't want to accidentally minimize the game.=6434
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/ControlGroupMode,<c val="ffffff">編隊：</c><n/>決定編隊按鈕的行為。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">普通：</c>可看見按鈕並用滑鼠點擊。<n/><c val="ffffff">隱藏：</c>無法看見按鈕。<n/><c val="ffffff">無法點擊：</c>可看見按鈕，但無法用滑鼠點擊。 /// <c val="ffffff">Control Groups:</c><n/>Determines the behavior of Control Group Buttons.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Normal:</c> Buttons are visible and can be clicked by the mouse.<n/><c val="ffffff">Hidden:</c> Buttons are not visible.<n/><c val="ffffff">Unclickable:</c> Buttons are visible but can not be clicked by the mouse.=6435
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/CursorConfine,<c val="ffffff">限制滑鼠游標移動的範圍：</c><n/>在視窗模式或全螢幕視窗模式下時，決定滑鼠游標是否能夠移到程式視窗之外的行為。這個設定在全螢幕模式下不會產生效果，因為滑鼠無法移到畫面外。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">智慧切換：</c>在全螢幕視窗模式下時，限制滑鼠游標移動的範圍，但在主選單中不受限制。在視窗模式下時，不會產生效果。<n/><c val="ffffff">開啟：</c>不論在哪種顯示模式下，都限制滑鼠游標移動的範圍。<n/><c val="ffffff">關閉：</c>不論在哪種顯示模式下，都不限制滑鼠游標移動的範圍。 /// <c val="ffffff">Confine Mouse Cursor:</c><n/>Determines when the mouse cursor can leave the application window in either Windowed (Fullscreen) or Windowed Display Modes.  In the Fullscreen Display Mode this setting has no effect, the cursor is always confined.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Smart:</c> In Windowed Fullscreen, mouse cursor is confined during games, but unconfined in menu screens.  In windowed mode, this has no effect.<n/><c val="ffffff">On:</c> Mouse cursor is always confined.<n/><c val="ffffff">Off:</c> Mouse cursor is never confined.=6436
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/CursorSize,<c val="ffffff">游標大小：</c><n/>調整滑鼠游標顯示的大小。<n/><n/>Windows XP不支援此功能。 /// <c val="ffffff">Cursor Size:</c><n/>Determines how large your mouse cursor appears.<n/><n/>Not supported on Windows XP.=6437
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/DragScrollInverted,<c val="ffffff">倒轉拖曳捲動：</c><n/>以滑鼠中鍵拖曳時，倒轉地圖捲動方向。某些玩家可能比較習慣此項設定。 /// <c val="ffffff">Invert Drag Scroll:</c><n/>Flips the direction the map scrolls while dragging the middle mouse button. This may feel more natural to some players.=6438
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/DragScrollSpeed,<c val="ffffff">拖曳捲動速度：</c><n/>決定以滑鼠中鍵拖曳時捲動地圖的速度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Drag Scroll Speed:</c><n/>Determines how fast to scroll the map while dragging the middle mouse button.=6439
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/EnableFunctionKeys,<c val="ffffff">使用標準功能鍵模式</c><n/>選取後，鍵盤最上排的按鍵視為功能鍵。按下Fn鍵可使用印在各按鍵上面的功能。取消選取的話，最上排按鍵功能會視作業系統而定。=6440
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/KeyboardScrollSpeed,<c val="ffffff">鍵盤捲動速度：</c><n/>決定鍵盤方向鍵捲動地圖的速度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Keyboard Scroll Speed:</c><n/>Determines how fast to scroll the map when using the keyboard's arrow keys.=6441
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/MouseOverrideSensitivity,<c val="ffffff">開啟滑鼠靈敏度：</c><n/>開啟自訂滑鼠靈敏度功能，可取代系統原有的設定。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Mouse Sensitivity:</c><n/>Enables setting a custom mouse sensitivity to override the setting from the operating system.=6442
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/MouseScrollEnabled,<c val="ffffff">開啟滑鼠捲動：</c><n/>開啟游標在螢幕邊緣時，捲動地圖的功能。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Mouse Scroll:</c><n/>Enables the ability to scroll the map by placing the cursor at the edge of the screen.=6443
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/MouseScrollSpeed,<c val="ffffff">滑鼠捲動速度：</c><n/>決定游標在螢幕邊緣時，捲動地圖的速度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Mouse Scroll Speed:</c><n/>Determines how fast to scroll the map when the cursor is at the edge of the screen.=6444
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/MouseSensitivity,<c val="ffffff">滑鼠靈敏度：</c><n/>決定滑鼠的靈敏度。靈敏度越高，游標移動越快。 /// <c val="ffffff">Mouse Sensitivity:</c><n/>Determines how sensitive your mouse is. Higher sensitivity will cause the mouse to move faster.=6445
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/MouseWheelZoom,<c val="ffffff">開啟滑鼠滾輪縮放：</c><n/>可使用滑鼠滾輪來縮小或放大地圖。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Mouse Wheel Zoom:</c><n/>Allows the camera to zoom into or out of the map while using the mouse wheel.=6446
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/QuickCastMode,<c val="ffffff">快速施放：</c><n/>決定攻擊與技能的瞄準方式。<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">關閉：</c>按下熱鍵後進入瞄準模式，然後按下<k pre="(" val="TargetChoose" post=")"/>施放。<n/><c val="ffffff">開啟：</c>按下熱鍵立即朝游標的方向或位置施放。<n/><c val="ffffff">放開熱鍵時：</c>按下熱鍵後進入瞄準模式，放開熱鍵後立即朝游標的方向施放。 /// <c val="ffffff">Quick Cast:</c><n/>Determines how attack and ability targeting behaves.<n/><n/><c val="ffffff">Off:</c> Pressing a hotkey to issue an order enters target mode and then <k pre="(" val="TargetChoose" post=")"/> issues the order.<n/><c val="ffffff">On:</c> Pressing a hotkey instantly issues the order in the direction or location of your mouse cursor.<n/><c val="ffffff">On Release:</c> Pressing a hotkey enters targeting mode and releasing the hotkey issues the order in the direction of your mouse cursor.=6447
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/ReduceMouseLag,<c val="ffffff">降低滑鼠延遲：</c><n/>讓滑鼠反應更靈敏，但可能會大幅降低畫面幀率。 /// <c val="ffffff">Reduce Mouse Lag:</c><n/>Will make the mouse more responsive, but may drastically reduce frame rate.=6448
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/SelectAllConjoined,<c val="ffffff">選取所有幼蟲：</c><n/>啟用此功能時，選取單一幼蟲的同時便會自動選取同一孵化所的所有幼蟲。 /// <c val="ffffff">Select All Larvae:</c><n/>When enabled, selecting a single larva will select all larvae for that Hatchery.=6449
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/SelectUncontrollable,<c val="ffffff">允許選取敵方單位：</c><n/>開啟此功能可讓你選取原本無法控制的單位，包括中立和敵方單位。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Enemy Unit Selection:</c><n/>When enabled, you can select units that are not under your control including enemy and neutral units.=6450
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/ShowCurrentOrderModel,<c val="ffffff">顯示當前指令提示點：</c><n/>啟用此功能時，對單位下達指令會在目標地點顯示指令提示點。 /// <c val="ffffff">Show Current Order Indicator:</c><n/>When enabled, issuing an order to your units will cause an indicator to be displayed on the terrain.=6451
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/ShowUnitPoints,<c val="ffffff">顯示經驗值：</c><n/>開啟此選項時，每當單位或建築被摧毀或生產出來時會顯示經驗值。 /// <c val="ffffff">Display Experience Points:</c><n/>When enabled, experience points will be displayed over units and structures when created or destroyed.=6452
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/SmartPan,<c val="ffffff">開啟智能鏡頭平移：</c><n/>開啟時，點擊單位頭像會使鏡頭快速捲動（而非切換）到該單位。如果該單位當時不在畫面內，鏡頭會直接切換到該地點。<n/><n/>雙擊「編隊」熱鍵時，鏡頭總是會切換至該部隊所處位置。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Smart Camera Pan:</c><n/>When enabled, the camera will quickly scroll (instead of jump) to a nearby unit when you click the unit's portrait.  If the unit is not currently in view, it will jump to the location instead.<n/><n/>Double-tapping a control group hotkey will always cause the camera to jump.=6453
UI/InputOptionsTooltips/SwapCtrlCmd,<c val="ffffff">用 Command 鍵取代 Control 鍵執行熱鍵：</c><n/>若要使用 Command 輔助鍵代替 Control 鍵來執行熱鍵指令，請使用此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff"> Use Command instead of Control for hotkeys:</c><n/>Use this if you want to use the Command key modifier for the hotkey commands instead of the Control key.=6454

UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/AlertFadeVolume,<c val="ffffff">警示時的遊戲音量：</c><n/>決定警示音播放時的遊戲音量。如果因為遊戲音效而無法聽清楚警示音的話，請將此值調低。 /// <c val="ffffff">Game Volume During Alerts:</c><n/>This determines the volume level of other game sounds while alerts are playing. UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/AltSoundtrack,<c val="ffffff">配樂：</c><n/>選擇進行多人遊戲時播放的配樂。=7651

UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/AmbienceVolume,<c val="ffffff">環境音效音量：</c><n/>決定環境音效的音量。 /// <c val="ffffff">Ambience Volume:</c><n/>Determines the volume of ambient sound effects.=7653
UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/Channels,<c val="ffffff">聲道：</c><n/>決定可同時播放的音效數量。減低這項數值以提升效能。 /// <c val="ffffff">Sound Channels:</c><n/>Determines the number of sound effects that can play simultaneously. Lower this number to improve performance.=7654
UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/Effects,<c val="ffffff">開啟音效：</c><n/>開啟標準遊戲音效。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Sound Effects:</c><n/>Enables standard gameplay sound effects.=7655

UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/Errors,<c val="ffffff">開啟錯誤音效：</c><n/>此音效於執行無效的指令時播放。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Error Sounds:</c><n/>Enables sounds that are played in response to an invalid command.=7657
UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/Global,<c val="ffffff">背景播放：</c><n/>允許遊戲在非主視窗的狀態下繼續播放音效。 /// <c val="ffffff">Play in Background:</c><n/>Allows the game to continue playing sound when it is not the focus window.=7658

UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/OutputDevice,<c val="ffffff">輸出裝置：</c><n/>輸出裝置是音效播放的裝置。預設值將會設定符合你系統的輸出裝置。如果你想要透過耳機或者是不同組的喇叭體驗遊戲，請變更此選項的設定。 /// <c val="ffffff">Output Device:</c><n/>The output device is where your sound will play. Default will match your system's output device. Use this if you want the game to play through headphones or a different set of speakers.=7666
UI/SoundOptionsTooltips/Quality,<c val="ffffff">音效品質：</c><n/>決定音頻保真度。越高的設定會有更好的音效，但可能會降低遊戲執行速度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Sound Quality:</c><n/>Determines the audio fidelity. Higher quality settings will sound better but may slow down the game.=7667

UI/StereoscopicConvergence_Tooltip,立體聚合度控制著無視差聚合點的深度，提高立體聚合度可以使得畫面中的物件影像更加突出。但若你的眼睛無法適應立體影像的話，過高的立體聚合度可能會使你感到不適。 /// Stereo convergence controls the depth of the point of convergence where no parallax occurs. Increase convergence to push objects further out of the screen. Too much convergence can be uncomfortable if your eyes are not adjusted to stereo.=7707

UI/Video,影像 /// Video=8000
UI/VideoCapture,錄製影像 /// Video Capture=8001
UI/VideoOptionsInstructions,玩遊戲或觀賞戰鬥錄影時，你可以按 CTRL-F11 來開啟或關閉遊戲影像錄製。影像將以 Theora OGV 的格式儲存於你的使用者目錄下《星海爭霸II》的影像資料夾中。錄製高品質的影像可能會嚴重減緩遊戲執行速度。 /// You can toggle in-game video recording by pressing CTRL-F11 while playing a game or watching a replay. Videos are stored in your user directory's StarCraft II Videos folder in Theora OGV format. Recording high quality video may considerably slow down your game experience.=8002
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/AudioQuality,<c val="ffffff">音頻品質：</c><n/>提高音頻品質可提供更好的音頻保真度，但會產生較大的影像檔。 /// <c val="ffffff">Audio Quality:</c><n/>Increasing audio quality will provide greater audio fidelity at a cost of larger video files.=8003
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/FrameRate,<c val="ffffff">幀率：</c><n/>幀率指的是每秒錄製的畫面數。較高的幀率可讓影像播放過程更加流暢，但會產生較大的影像檔。在較高的幀率下錄製影像可能會減緩遊戲執行速度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Framerate:</c><n/>Framerate refers to the number of frames recorded per second. A higher framerate will result in smoother video playback at a cost of larger video files. Recording at a higher framerate may slow down your game experience.=8004
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/RecordAudioCheckbox,<c val="ffffff">開啟音頻：</c><n/>開啟影像的錄音功能。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Audio:</c><n/>Enables recording audio with your video.=8005
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/RecordTriggers,<c val="ffffff">觸發器錄製：</c><n/>開啟此選項可以透過遊戲中的觸發器來錄製影片。玩家可用「MovieStartRecording」觸發器編輯地圖以便錄製影片。如果你不希望在某些地圖上自動錄製影像，請關閉此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff">Record From Triggers:</c><n/>Enabling this option will allow you to record video from in-game triggers. Players can create maps with "MovieStartRecording" triggers to facilitate the creation of movies. Keep this option off if you do not want videos to automatically record on certain maps.=8006
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/Resolution,<c val="ffffff">解析度：</c><n/>決定錄製影像的像素多寡。較高的解析度會有較好的畫面品質，但是錄製速度較慢。為求最佳效果，請使用符合你遊戲畫面比例的解析度。 /// <c val="ffffff">Resolution:</c><n/>Determines the size in pixels of the recorded video. Higher resolutions have much better image quality, but they are slower to record. For best results, use a resolution that matches your game's aspect ratio.=8007
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/SlowGame,<c val="ffffff">錄製影像時，放慢遊戲速度：</c><n/>決定是否在錄製影像時，放慢遊戲速度以彌補效能的降低。這樣可以提高錄像品質，但無法在多人對戰模式下使用。關閉此選項設定會降低幀率進而影響錄像品質，但不會影響所錄製的音效。 /// <c val="ffffff">Slow Game while Recording:</c><n/>Determines whether or not game time will slow down to adjust for the performance drop while recording video. This will result in better looking videos, but it cannot be used while participating in multiplayer games. Videos recorded with this option disabled will record the drop in framerate, but your audio will be unaffected.=8008
UI/VideoOptionsTooltips/VideoQuality,<c val="ffffff">影像品質：</c><n/>決定錄製影像所使用的壓縮比例。較高的影像品質將有較高的畫面品質，但會產生較大的影像檔。 /// <c val="ffffff">Video Quality:</c><n/>Determines the amount of compression used when recording your video. Greater video quality will result in better image quality but much larger video files.=8009

UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/AGC,<c val="ffffff">麥克風自動增益控制：</c><n/>開啟或關閉麥克風的自動增益控制，這可調節輸出的聲音大小以維持相同音量。<n/><n/><c val="ff0000">注意：這會變更作業系統的麥克風設定，進而在《星海爭霸II》執行期間影響到其他使用麥克風的應用程式。</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Microphone Automatic Gain Control:</c><n/>Toggles automatic gain control for the microphone, which will adjust the outgoing sound levels to maintain a constant volume.<n/><n/><c val="ff0000">Note: This will change the operating system settings for the microphone. It will affect other applications that use the microphone while StarCraft II is running.</c>=8025
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/ActivatedSensitivity,<c val="ffffff">語音啟動靈敏度：</c><n/>決定啟動語音聊天的說話音量。若呼吸聲或其他雜音會啟動語音聊天，請將此數值調低。 /// <c val="ffffff">Microphone Activation Sensitivity:</c><n/>Determines how loudly you must speak before voice chat is activated. Keep this lower if breathing and other incidental sounds are triggering voice chat.=8026
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/ChatVolume,<c val="ffffff">語音聊天輸出音量：</c><n/>決定語音聊天時所聽到的音量。 /// <c val="ffffff">Voice Chat Output Volume:</c><n/>Determines how loudly voice chat plays back.=8027
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/FadeMusicVolume,<c val="ffffff">音樂淡出等級：</c><n/>決定談話時音樂的音量。 /// <c val="ffffff">Fade Music Level:</c><n/>This determines the level that music should play while someone is speaking.=8028
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/FadeSoundVolume,<c val="ffffff">音效淡出等級：</c><n/>決定談話時遊戲音效的音量。如果無法在遊戲中聽到其他人說話，或你的談話收錄了遊戲音效時，請調整此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff">Fade Sound Level:</c><n/>This determines the level that game sounds should play while someone is speaking. Use this if you are having trouble hearing other people over gameplay or if your game sounds are recorded while speaking.=8029
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/InputDevice,<c val="ffffff">輸入裝置：</c><n/>選擇進行語音聊天時使用的麥克風或者耳麥。 /// <c val="ffffff">Input Device:</c><n/>Selects the microphone or headset used for voice chat.=8030
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/Microphone,<c val="ffffff">開啟發話：</c><n/>讓玩家可在遊戲過程中使用語音聊天。必須配有輸入裝置，例如麥克風、耳麥或內建麥克風。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Talking:</c><n/>Enables the ability to participate in voice chat during gameplay. You must have an input device such as a microphone, headset, or built-in microphone.=8031
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/MicrophoneBoost,<c val="ffffff">麥克風增效：</c><n/>增加傳統型麥克風的音量。可能會造成USB耳麥或麥克風失真。並不支援所有輸入裝置。 /// <c val="ffffff">Microphone Boost:</c><n/>Increases the power of a traditional microphone. This may cause distortion with USB headsets or microphones. Not all input devices support boost.=8032
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/MicrophoneHardware,<c val="ffffff">作業系統的麥克風設為靜音：</c><n/>開啟或關閉作業系統的麥克風靜音狀態。<n/><n/><c val="ff0000">注意：這會影響其他應用程式，而且在《星海爭霸II》終止後仍然有效。</c> /// <c val="ffffff">Mute OS Microphone:</c><n/>Toggles the OS microphone mute state.<n/><n/><c val="ff0000">Note: This will affect other applications and will remain in effect when StarCraft II is not running.</c>=8033
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/MicrophoneTest,<c val="ffffff">麥克風測試：</c><n/>開啟或關閉麥克風測試。當開啟時，所有透過麥克風說的話將由所選取的輸出裝置播放出來。 /// <c val="ffffff">Microphone Test:</c><n/>Toggle the microphone test. While enabled, all voice spoken through the microphone will play back through the selected voice output device.=8034
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/MicrophoneVolume,<c val="ffffff">麥克風音量：</c><n/>決定錄製音量大小。如果其他人無法聽見你的聲音，請調高此選項。如果使用自動設定的話，則無法使用此選項。 /// <c val="ffffff">Microphone Volume:</c><n/>Determines how loudly audio is recorded. Increase this if others have a hard time hearing you. Disabled if Auto setting is being used.=8035
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/Mode,<c val="ffffff">語音聊天模式：</c><n/>決定啟動麥克風的方式。「語音啟動」模式會在你發話時自動啟動麥克風。「按鍵發話」模式則需要你按住按鈕才能發話。 /// <c val="ffffff">Voice Chat Mode:</c><n/>Determines how your microphone is activated. Voice Activated will automatically activate chat when you speak. Push-to-Talk requires you to hold a button while speaking.=8036
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/OutputDevice,<c val="ffffff">輸出裝置：</c><n/>選擇播放語音聊天時使用的喇叭或者耳麥。語音聊天不需與遊戲使用相同的裝置播放。 /// <c val="ffffff">Output Device:</c><n/>Selects the speakers or headphones used to play back voice chat. Voice chat does not need to play through the same device as the game.=8037
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/PTTHotkey,<c val="ffffff">「按鍵發話」鍵：</c><n/>決定啟動語音聊天的按鍵。點擊按鈕後，再按你想要使用的按鍵以變更此設定值。 /// <c val="ffffff">Push-to-Talk Key:</c><n/>Determines the key used to activate voice chat. Press the button then the key you want to use to change this value.=8038
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/PTTSound,<c val="ffffff">「按鍵發話」的提示音效：</c><n/>當開啟時，在按下「按鍵發話」鍵後會發出一聲微弱的提示音。 /// <c val="ffffff">Push-to-Talk Sound:</c><n/>When enabled, a small chime will play when you press or release your Push-to-Talk key.=8039
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/Provider,<c val="ffffff">語音配置：</c><n/>選擇語音聊天時輸入/輸出配置。 /// <c val="ffffff">Provider:</c><n/>Selects the voice chat input/output provider.=8040
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/VoiceChat,<c val="ffffff">開啟語音聊天：</c><n/>讓玩家可在遊戲過程中聽到或進行聊天。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Voice Chat:</c><n/>Enables the ability to listen or participate in voice chat during gameplay.=8041
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/VoiceChatParentallyDisabled,<c val="ff0000">語音聊天：</c><n/>此功能已被家長監護設為關閉。 /// <c val="ff0000">Voice Chat:</c><n/>This feature has been disabled by parental control.=8042
UI/VoiceOptionsTooltips/VoiceToast,<c val="ffffff">開啟語音發話提示：</c><n/>開啟指示器，標示出目前在語音聊天中說話的玩家。 /// <c val="ffffff">Enable Voice Toasts:</c><n/>Enables the display of indicators which show who is currently speaking in voice chat.=8043

LoadingBar/Prot,神族 /// Protoss=12571
LoadingBar/Terr,人類 /// Terran=12572
LoadingBar/Zerg,蟲族 /// Zerg=12573
LoadingScreen/Help00,按下<k val="AlertRecall"/> 即可將鏡頭移到最近所發生的事件，例如戰鬥警告或最近所訓練的單位。 /// Press<k val="AlertRecall"/> to center the camera on a recent event, such as a combat warning or a recently created unit.=12574
LoadingScreen/Help01,按下<k val="ControlGroupAssign1"/> 鍵即可為選取的單位設定熱鍵，之後只需再按該<k val="ControlGroupRecall1"/> 鍵就能回到先前選取的單位。 /// You can store a unit selection by pressing<k val="ControlGroupAssign1"/>. Press<k val="ControlGroupRecall1"/> to recall the selection.=12575
LoadingScreen/Help02,按下<k val="SubgroupNext"/> 可在選取的單位中進行類型切換，這樣一來要使用不同類型單位的能力時會更方便。 /// Press<k val="SubgroupNext"/> to cycle through different types of selected units, making it easier to use their abilities.=12576
LoadingScreen/Help03,處於較高地形的單位在進行攻擊時，能避免自身遭受反擊。若要反制此情況，可將部隊移至坡道或派遣空中部隊隨行，以取得可進行反擊的視野。 /// Units on higher ground can attack without endangering themselves. To counter this, gain vision of the attackers by running up ramps or bringing air units.=12577
LoadingScreen/Help04,薩爾納加監視塔可監視一片廣大區域。派一個單位駐守在薩爾納加監視塔附近來控制它。 /// Xel'Naga Towers provide vision across a large area. Stand a unit near a Xel'Naga Tower to control it.=12578
LoadingScreen/Help05,摧毀岩石即可開闢新的路徑。 /// Rocks can be destroyed to open up new paths.=12579
LoadingScreen/Help06,你終將用盡起始區域的所有資源，擴展新的資源區以獲取額外收入。 /// Your starting area will eventually run out of resources. Expand to new resource locations to secure additional income.=12580
LoadingScreen/Help07,在遊戲初期就將勢力擴張至新的資源區的風險很高，不過有時候這筆額外的收入的確值得你冒這個險。 /// Expanding to a new resource location early in a game is risky, but the extra income is sometimes worth the risk.=12581
LoadingScreen/Help08,武器和裝甲升級會影響現有和未來生產的單位，因此對戰的時間越長，這些升級所累積的好處就會越多。 /// Weapon and armor upgrades affect existing and future units, so their benefits quickly add up over the course of longer games.=12582
LoadingScreen/Help09,建立強大經濟的關鍵就是不斷地生產太空工程車、探測機或工蟲。 /// The key to a strong economy is constantly training SCVs, Probes, or Drones.=12583
LoadingScreen/Help10,若想達到採集最佳化，每個晶礦需指派2個太空工程車、探測機或工蟲、高能瓦斯湧源需指派3個。 /// It takes 2 SCVs, Probes, or Drones to optimally harvest a Mineral Field and 3 for a Vespene Geyser.=12584
LoadingScreen/Help11,只需利用編隊功能即可訓練單位，所以沒有必要為此查看基地。 /// You can use control groups to train units without even looking at your base.=12585
LoadingScreen/Help12,雙擊一個單位或按住 CTRL 鍵後點擊一個單位，即可選取附近與該單位類型相同的所有單位。 /// You can select all nearby units of a given type by double-clicking on a unit, or by holding CTRL and clicking on a unit.=12586
LoadingScreen/Help13,黃色晶礦即高產量晶礦，採集此晶礦的速度會比普通晶礦來得快。 /// Rich Mineral Fields are yellow, and can be harvested faster than normal Mineral Fields.=12587
LoadingScreen/Help14,若要在多人對戰中獲得勝利，須消滅所有敵方建築或成為遊戲中最後的僅存者。 /// To win a multiplayer game, destroy all enemy structures or be the last player still in the game.=12588
LoadingScreen/Help15,當你在遊戲中達成目標時就會得到線上獎章，而該獎章即是你所獲得的成就。查看你的個人資訊來了解你可以獲得哪些成就。 /// Achievements are online trophies for accomplishing various goals in the game. View your profile to see what achievements you can earn.=12589
LoadingScreen/Help16,標示為「對重甲：5」的武器可對重甲目標造成5點傷害。 /// Weapons that list damage as "vs Armored: 5" do a total of 5 damage to targets that are considered Armored.=12590
LoadingScreen/Help17,除非有渡鴉、觀察者或監察王蟲等偵測單位進行偵測，否則無法攻擊匿蹤或遁地的單位。 /// Cloaked or burrowed units cannot be attacked unless spotted by a detector, such as a Raven, Observer, or Overseer.=12591
LoadingScreen/Help18,像渡鴉、觀察者及監察王蟲這類偵測單位能夠發現神族的幻影分身及本體之間的差異。 /// Detectors like Ravens, Observers, and Overseers can spot the difference between Protoss Hallucinations and real units.=12592
LoadingScreen/Help19,如果你有安裝麥克風，按住<k val="PTT"/> 即可和盟友通話。 /// If you have a microphone, you can hold down the<k val="PTT"/> key to talk to your allies.=12593
LoadingScreen/Help20,按下<k val="CameraFollow"/> 後可使遊戲鏡頭跟著選取的單位移動。 /// Press<k val="CameraFollow"/> to have the game follow a selected unit as it moves across the battlefield.=12594
LoadingScreen/Help21,可以使用太空工程車來修復建築或是機械單位。投入的太空工程車越多，修復的速度也就越快。 /// SCVs can be used to repair buildings or mechanical units. The more SCVs repairing, the faster the repair is complete.=12595
LoadingScreen/Help22,在戰鬥中，可使用太空工程車來修復主要的防禦工事或戰鬥單位。 /// Use several SCVs to keep vital defenses or combat units alive during a fight.=12596
LoadingScreen/Help23,使用醫療艇來支援大批步兵部隊。善用他們的運輸能力來將步兵送至敵軍後方以進行突襲。 /// Use Medivacs to support large infantry groups. Use their transport abilities to take infantry behind enemy lines for surprise attacks.=12597
LoadingScreen/Help24,惡狼能以火焰發射器對一直線上的目標造成傷害。攻擊時靠近成群結隊的敵人可以使你所造成的傷害最大化。 /// Hellions do damage in a straight line with their flame thrower. Get close to packs of enemies to maximize your damage.=12598
LoadingScreen/Help25,攻城坦克無法對距離過近的單位開火。在攻城坦克前面放置其他單位或是建築，讓坦克和敵人保持點距離。 /// Siege Tanks cannot fire at units that get too close. Put other units or structures in front of your Siege Tanks to keep the enemy back.=12599
LoadingScreen/Help26,死神能在低崖間上下移動。運用這點對敵人進行偵察，或是對敵方工作單位發動突襲。 /// Reapers can jump up and down short cliffs. Use them to scout the enemy or make surprise attacks against their workers.=12600
LoadingScreen/Help27,在狹窄區域放置補給站，以擋住敵人通往己方基地的行進路線。當你想要讓單位通過時，降下補給站即可。 /// Place Supply Depots in narrow areas to block enemy access to your base. Lower them when you want to leave.=12601
LoadingScreen/Help28,使用戰鬥藥劑可以讓步兵單位在戰場上變得更加勇猛。別忘了派遣醫療艇來治療因使用戰鬥藥劑而受傷的單位。 /// Use Stimpacks to make your infantry more dangerous in battle. Use Medivacs to heal the damage done by Stimpacks.=12602
LoadingScreen/Help29,星軌指揮總部能夠空投礦騾來採集額外資源。不要錯過任何可使用礦騾的機會。 /// Orbital Command Centers can call-down MULEs to gather additional resources. Use MULEs every chance you get.=12603
LoadingScreen/Help30,建造更多的兵營、軍工廠及星際港，使你能夠一次生產更多部隊。 /// Building extra Barracks, Factories, and Starports enables you to train more troops at a time.=12604
LoadingScreen/Help31,一旦開始躍傳，神族建築便會自行完成後續工作，此時探測機便可以去進行其他作業。 /// Once started, Protoss structures construct themselves, freeing up the Probe to do other things.=12605
LoadingScreen/Help32,你可以將星核的超時空加速技能用於星核本身，即可快速地訓練探測機。 /// You can rapidly train Probes by using the Nexus' Chrono Boost ability on the Nexus itself.=12606
LoadingScreen/Help33,空間之門可以讓你快速地躍傳單位到任何處於你能源範圍內的地點。 /// Warp Gates allow you to rapidly train units at any location where you have power.=12607
LoadingScreen/Help34,追獵者能瞬移至視野範圍內的任何一處。善用空中單位將視野拓展至崖邊以瞬移至高處。 /// Stalkers can blink to anyplace that you can see. Use fliers to see up cliffs to gain access to high ground areas.=12608
LoadingScreen/Help35,虛空艦的「稜鏡校準」能力可讓它們在短時間內對重甲單位造成的傷害提高。使用這個技能將你對建築物和重甲類型敵人造成的傷害最大化。 /// The Void Ray's Prismatic Alignment ability grants them additional damage vs. armored units for a short period.  Activate it to deal maximum damage against structures and armored enemies.=12609
LoadingScreen/Help36,巨像可行走於低矮的山崖間。使用這個技能來保護巨像或進行奇襲。 /// A Colossus can walk up short cliffs. Use this ability to protect your Colossus or to make surprise attacks.=12610
LoadingScreen/Help37,哨衛能產生力場來阻礙敵人行進。善用這點來防止敵人入侵你的基地，或是用以阻擋前來侵犯的近戰單位。 /// Sentries can create Force Fields to block movement. Use them to keep enemies out of your base, or to block the approach of melee units.=12611
LoadingScreen/Help38,哨衛能做出外貌近似己方單位的幻影分身，可以用來擾亂或迷惑敵人，讓對方分不清本體在哪。 /// Sentries can create Hallucinations that look like your units. Use them to confuse or distract the enemy from your real units.=12612
LoadingScreen/Help39,高階聖堂武士能以幽能風暴造成大量傷害。在將他們融合成執政官之前，試著用盡他們全部的能量。 /// High Templars do a lot of damage with their Psi Storm ability. Try to use up all of their energy before merging them into Archons.=12613
LoadingScreen/Help40,不朽者具有特殊護盾，可吸收<d ref="Behavior,ImmortalOverload,DamageResponse.ModifyLimit"/>點傷害。你可以關閉自動施放，留在特定時刻再使用。 /// Immortals have a special barrier that absorbs <d ref="Behavior,ImmortalOverload,DamageResponse.ModifyLimit"/> points of damage. Autocast can be turned off if you would like to use it at specific times.=12614
LoadingScreen/Help41,建造更多的傳送門、星際之門及機械製造廠，使你能夠一次生產更多部隊。 /// Building extra Gateways, Stargates, and Robotics Facilities enables you to train more troops at a time.=12615
LoadingScreen/Help42,每次突變產生一個蟲族建築就會耗掉一隻工蟲。記得孵化更多工蟲來彌補，以維持收入。 /// A Drone is used up every time you make a Zerg structure. Be sure to replace those Drones to maintain your income.=12616
LoadingScreen/Help43,選取一個孵化所，然後右鍵點擊晶礦場，即可讓之後孵化出來的工蟲自動採集晶礦。 /// Select a Hatchery and right-click on a Mineral Field to cause newly trained Drones to automatically harvest minerals.=12617
LoadingScreen/Help44,蟲族單位在蟲苔上移動較快。盡量四處散佈蟲苔來提高部隊的速度。 /// Zerg units move more quickly on creep. Spread creep wherever you can to speed up your forces.=12618
LoadingScreen/Help45,后蟲能讓孵化所孵化更多幼蟲。為每個孵化所都配上一隻后蟲，並且盡量多使用這項技能。 /// Queens can cause Hatcheries to spawn additional larva. Build one Queen per Hatchery and use the ability as often as possible.=12619
LoadingScreen/Help46,蟑螂在遁地時的再生速度非常快。讓受傷的蟑螂先遁入地底，等牠們恢復生命值後再投入戰鬥之中。 /// Roaches regenerate very quickly while burrowed. Burrow your wounded Roaches so they can regenerate and then return to battle.=12620
LoadingScreen/Help47,利用飛螳攻擊毫無防禦之力的敵方工作單位，當敵人回防的時候，飛離現場轉而攻擊其他地方。 /// Use Mutalisks to attack undefended enemy workers. When the enemy comes to defend, fly away and attack elsewhere.=12621
LoadingScreen/Help48,如果你需要更多幼蟲來加快部隊的生產速度，可以多建一些孵化所。 /// If you need more Larvae to train troops more rapidly, build additional Hatcheries.=12622
LoadingScreen/Help49,感染蟲和進化後的蟑螂能在遁地時移動。善用此能力以神不知鬼不覺地入侵敵方領地。 /// Infestors and upgraded Roaches can move while burrowed. Use this ability to infiltrate enemy territory unobserved.=12623
LoadingScreen/Help50,感染蟲可以使用神經寄生來控制敵方單位。善用此技能在攻城坦克和巨像這種危險的敵人身上。 /// Infestors can use Neural Parasite to control enemy units. Use this on dangerous enemies like Siege Tanks and Colossi.=12624
LoadingScreen/Help51,將各種族升級可以解開獨特的獎勵，例如具有種族特色的頭像、徽記、舞蹈動作和全新的單位外觀。 /// Level up each race to unlock unique rewards such as racially-themed portraits, decals, dances, and new unit skins.=12625
LoadingScreen/Help52,你在劇情戰役中玩的種族有其專屬的設定。多人對戰跟劇情戰役中的單位與建築有許多不同的地方。 /// The races you play in campaign are heavily modified.  Your units and structures in multiplayer are very different than what you have played in campaign.=12626
LoadingScreen/Help53,你可以觀看你的戰鬥錄影來研究如何增進自己的實力。 /// You can watch replays of your games to learn how to better play the game.=12627
LoadingScreen/Help54,你可以和A.I.練習對戰來改進自己的戰術。 /// You can practice against the A.I. to improve your strategies.=12628
LoadingScreen/Help55,試著預測對手的下一步以破解他們的攻擊或防禦戰術。 /// Try to anticipate what your opponent's next move will be so you can counter their next attack or defense.=12629
LoadingScreen/Help56,盡你所能採集最多的資源並且將其全數花光。部隊數量多的一方通常能獲得勝利。 /// Gather as many resources as you can and spend them all. The larger army almost always wins.=12630
LoadingScreen/Help57,《星海爭霸II》有許多職業級的玩家。你可以看他們的比賽來學習新的戰術。 /// StarCraft II is played by professional gamers. Watch pro matches to learn new strategies.=12631
LoadingScreen/Help58,《星海爭霸II》可以免費遊玩了！邀請你的朋友到StarCraft2.com下載遊戲！ /// StarCraft II is free to play! Invite your friends to download the game at StarCraft2.com!=12632
LoadingScreen/Help59,別忘了，你可以在「星海大師」遊樂場遊戲的30個挑戰中測試你的微控實力！ /// Don’t forget that you can put your micro to the test in 30 interesting challenges in the StarCraft Master Arcade game!=12633
LoadingScreen/HelpIntro00,多人對戰跟劇情戰役中所用的單位與建築並不相同。 /// The units and structures in a multiplayer game are different than what you experience in campaign.=12634
LoadingScreen/HelpIntro01,《星海爭霸II》的天梯系統會安排你跟實力相近的對手進行對戰。整體來說，你的獲勝機率大約會維持在一半。 /// The StarCraft II ladder is designed to match you against opponents of your skill level. Over time you will win about half your games.=12635
LoadingScreen/HelpIntro02,《星海爭霸II》是一款著重操控技巧與戰術的遊戲。只有不斷地練習才能增進你的實力。 /// StarCraft II is a game of skill and strategy. Practice is the only way to get better.=12636

Skin/Info/Adept,教士是訓練有素的戰場指揮官，使用淨化者科技來強化自身的幽能。他們可以投射出自身的幽影，並藉此傳送一大段距離。 /// Highly trained battlefield commanders, adepts utilize Purifier technology to amplify their psionic potential. They are capable of projecting shades of themselves and teleporting across great distances.=16301
Skin/Info/AdeptCE,達蘭的星穹冶煉廠或許能重建葛拉西斯的淨化者兵器，不過成品的性能跟原本由凱拉克所設計的原型機相比，還有一段距離。 /// The Daelaam's starforges may be capable of reconstructing the Purifier ordnance from Glacius, but they have yet to match the optimal performance of Karax's original prototypes.=16302
Skin/Info/AdeptGolden,末日之戰之後，緬懷往日時光的風潮逐漸興起。某些教士開始穿著過去的正式禮儀護甲，來展現他們的榮耀。 /// Nostalgic sentiment has been growing among the templar after the End War. Some adepts show their pride by wearing formal ceremonial armor from bygone days. =16303
Skin/Info/AdeptIhanrii,就算是老練的伊翰利教士，在求救訊號傳到克普魯星區邊疆地帶，將他們從靜滯狀態喚醒之後，也需要一段時間才能搞清楚狀況。 /// Even battle-hardened Ihan-rii adepts needed time to get their bearings after a distress signal woke them from deep stasis on the fringes of the Koprulu Sector.=16304
Skin/Info/AdeptPurifier,經過相位工匠凱拉克精密調整後，這些搭配人工智慧的戰士成為淨化者部隊的中堅份子，它們展現出來的敏捷身手和調整的精密程度令人讚嘆。 /// Refined by Phase-smith Karax, these AI warriors have become central figures in Purifier armies, impressing all who see them with their agility and refinement.=16305
Skin/Info/AdeptTaldarim,雖然時間還不長，不過塔達力姆運用逆向解析來研究達蘭教士身上的幽能強化科技，並且配備在這群前途無量的戰士身上。 /// Despite its recent development, the psionic amplification technology used by the Daelaam's adepts has already been reverse engineered by the Tal'darim and equipped on their most promising warriors.=16306
Skin/Info/Archon,雖然執政官的幽能非常強大，但是必須付出不小的代價：必須犧牲兩名聖堂武士，才能形成一名執政官。因此，每一名執政官都體現出無與倫比的英雄氣概。=16307
Skin/Info/Armory,兵工廠在建造時就附有數座風機，可以維持建築物在一定的溫度範圍內，讓其中的研究人員可以不斷努力改進人類的戰爭機器。 /// The armory is built around several turbines. These keep the building within temperature specifications while researchers work tirelessly to improve terran war machinery.=16308
Skin/Info/ArmoryCovertOps,自治聯盟在新型鋼鐵裝甲上的最新進展，是透過對特種部隊取回的薩爾納加石像進行分子層次研究而成的。 /// The Dominion's latest advances in neosteel armor were developed through the molecular examination of xel'naga constructs recovered by special forces teams.=16309
Skin/Info/ArmorySilver,神族在泰拉朵九號星兵工廠附近徘徊的報導，引發出一連串間諜活動的指控。伊翰利領導階層堅持這只是當地居民將發光建築誤認為人類博物館的意外事件。 /// Reports of protoss wandering into Tyrador IX's armories led to accusations of espionage, though Ihan-rii leadership insisted that these incidents were the result of settlers mistaking the gleaming structures for terran museums.=16310
Skin/Info/Assimilator,即使是科技最先進的神族，也需要這種多用途的高能瓦斯。他們開發出了瓦斯處理廠來收集這種實用的資源。 /// Even the highly advanced protoss appreciate the myriad applications of vespene gas. They developed assimilators to harvest this useful resource.=16311
Skin/Info/AssimilatorForged,塔達利姆瓦斯處理廠從土地中貪婪地搾取高能瓦斯，強度甚至引發了地震，破壞周圍的生態系統。 /// Tal'darim assimilators greedily wrench vespene gas from the ground, triggering earthquakes that decimate surrounding ecosystems.=16312
Skin/Info/AssimilatorIhanrii,伊翰利神族認為自己相當大方，因為他們長久以來允許人類住在阿拉基爾，並且在當地開採高能瓦斯，這顆星球可是他們的古老聖地。 /// The Ihan-rii protoss consider themselves very generous for allowing terrans to continue living on, let alone mining vespene gas from, their ancient and sacred homeworld, which they call Arakyr.=16313
Skin/Info/AssimilatorTaldarim,=16314
Skin/Info/Baneling,毒爆蟲首次登場是在卡斯克攻城戰，這是一種不穩定而且容易爆炸的戰鬥品系，由異化蟲進化而成。沒有多少物質能抵抗牠們爆炸時噴發出來的強酸。 /// First observed during the Siege of Cask, the baneling is a highly volatile and explosive combat strain evolved from the zergling. Few materials can resist the acidic burst released upon their detonation.=16315
Skin/Info/BanelingMecha,工程師重新打造毒爆蟲時，遭遇到了一個獨特的問題，就是他們小心採來的酸液囊，總是會腐蝕穿過周圍的金屬板結構。不過工程師們最終還是解決了這個問題。 /// The recreation of the baneling posed a unique problem for engineers, as their carefully harvested acid sacs kept melting through the surrounding plate infrastructure. Eventually, they made it work.=16316
Skin/Info/BanelingNest,蟲族的蟲巢裡一定要有一個毒爆蟲巢，來提供毒爆蟲品系的基因編碼。一旦毒爆蟲巢就緒，就可以命令任何在戰場上的異化蟲短暫進入蟲蛹狀態，然後再孵化為毒爆蟲。這是一種惡臭、腫脹的生物，背上還有充滿酸液的綠色囊腫。 /// The zerg hive cluster must have a baneling nest to add the baneling breed's genetic code. Once a nest is in place, any zergling on the field can be commanded to form a fleshy chrysalis for a brief pupation state, and then it will burst forth as a baneling--a foul, bloated creature with bulbous, acid-filled green sacs pulsating on its back.=16317
Skin/Info/BanelingNestMecha,擬態機甲毒爆蟲巢的上半部運用了與人類戰巡艦相同的反重力科技，使其漂浮在空中。 /// The upper half of the Simulant baneling nest is held aloft by the same antigravity technology deployed in terran battlecruisers.=16318
Skin/Info/BanelingNestRCZ,地獄犬為了摧毀人類的重要防禦設施而改造了毒爆蟲巢，使其能夠在泰拉朵九號星的洞穴通道網路中引爆。 /// To trigger the collapse of key terran fortifications, Cerberus baneling nests have been rigged to detonate in cave networks across Tyrador IX.=16319
Skin/Info/BanelingPrimal,德哈卡從凱莉根蟲群的毒爆蟲獲得啟發，決定在他自己的原生族群裡面挑出相似的品系進行突變。 /// Inspired by the banelings in Kerrigan's Swarm, Dehaka has encouraged the mutation of a similar strain of creatures within his pack.=16320
Skin/Info/BanelingRCZ,為了讓毒爆蟲馬上引爆，投入大筆資金替換神經系統所獲得的效益相當讓人懷疑。但幸好地獄犬的客戶們手頭上都有大筆資金。 /// The return on investment for replacing a baneling's entire nervous system, only to have it immediately blow up, is dubious. Luckily, Cerberus's clients have quite a lot of money to spend.=16321
Skin/Info/BanelingWebby,利維坦群落所演化出的毒爆蟲，牠們的酸液囊仍然保留了異化蟲身上的脊狀物。即使整個形態完全改變，仍無損牠們胡作非為的本性。 /// The spine-like growths of Leviathan Brood zerglings remain present on the acid sacs of their banelings. Even a total metamorphosis is incapable of changing the chaotic nature of their core essence.=16322
Skin/Info/Banshee,恆星工業組織所設計的女妖轟炸機，兼具了成本和效率兩個優點。這種轟炸機的主要功能是為前線步兵單位提供空中支援，是非常理想的戰術攻擊空中單位。 /// Procyon Industries designed banshees to be both economical and effective. Built specifically to provide air support for frontline infantry, they are ideal aircraft for tactical strikes.=16323
Skin/Info/BansheeCovertOps,自治聯盟的工程師在女妖轟炸機的垂直升降渦輪風扇方面有重大突破，在機體後方加裝垂直穩定器之後，大幅提升了穩定度和整體效能。 /// Dominion engineers have made critical upgrades in the banshee's twin VTOL turbofans, enabling superior stability and performance when paired with the new vertical stabilizer in the rear of the craft.=16324
Skin/Info/BansheeJunker,把一堆零件加裝在機械上面，已經成為傭兵惡名昭彰的特色；他們的女妖轟炸機當然也不例外。據說，這個特殊的設計還用上了一些推土機零件。 /// Mercenaries are infamous for cobbling together pieces of equipment on their machinery, and these banshees are no exception. Rumor has it that some bulldozer parts are involved in this particular design.=16325
Skin/Info/BansheeSilver,儘管大多數的泰拉朵女妖轟炸機都在第一波的地獄犬蟲族攻勢中被殲滅了，但還是有一位老練的飛行員解決了三頭雷獸。 /// Though most Tyrador banshees were wiped out in the first wave of the Cerberus zerg attack, one seasoned pilot managed to take down three ultralisks first. =16326
Skin/Info/BansheeUmojan,在數次地下交易之後，尤摩捷護衛軍總算可以從恆星工業組織取得幾台女妖轟炸機，而工業組織方面則宣稱他們被偷了。 /// Through a series of backdoor deals, the Umojan Protectorate has been able to acquire a limited number of banshees from Procyon Industries, although the company maintains that they were stolen.=16327
Skin/Info/Barracks,人類步兵遠離家園時的棲身之處，兵營不但清潔，具機動性，而且相當容易部署。 /// A home-away-from-home for terran infantry personnel, terran barracks are sterile, mobile, and capable of efficient deployment.=16328

Skin/Info/BarracksSilver,每一座泰拉朵騎士的兵營都配有五星級自動化廚房，以及全面性的健康休閒服務，不過僅供軍官階層使用。 /// Each Knights of Tyrador barracks features a five-star robotic kitchen and a full-service spa--for officers only, of course.=16330
Skin/Info/Battlecruiser,在戰線拉長的時候，常常會以戰巡艦當作行動指揮總部，可說是兼具厚實防禦和強力武器的空中要塞。 /// Battlecruisers often serve as mobile command headquarters during extended military campaigns. They are flying fortresses outfitted with heavy armor and imposing weaponry.=16331
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserCovertOps,經歷長時間的研發與改良，全新升級的命運女神級戰巡艦，終於獲准編入自治聯盟特種部隊的專屬單位。 /// After a lengthy research and development process, the newly upgraded Moirai class battlecruisers were approved for exclusive use by Dominion Special Forces.=16332
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserJunker,這批威力強大的艦隊，被改裝成符合傭兵品味的船艦。不過，看到這些船艦的人通常很快就死了，沒幾個能活著讚嘆他們優秀的船艦改裝技術。 /// These ferocious vessels have been modified to suit the mercenaries' preferences. However, few onlookers live long enough to admire their handiwork.=16333
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserRemastered,群落戰爭時期的戰巡艦艦橋外型比較低調，並且可以直接觀察左右舷的狀況，以確保能監控到蟲族入侵的狀況。 /// The command decks of Brood War-era battlecruisers had a lower profile, with port and starboard viewdecks to ensure maximum visibility in the event of a zerg ambush.=16334
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserSilver,在地獄犬蟲族的進攻之下，泰拉朵騎士們派出了巨獸級戰巡艦，向星軌上等待著的石製戰艦求援。 /// Assailed by Cerberus zerg, the Knights of Tyrador dispatched a Behemoth-class battlecruiser to request aid from the stone ships waiting in silent orbit.=16335
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserUmojan,尤摩捷戰巡艦擁有重新設計的新型鋼鐵合金板，以及針對大和砲的調整，讓它們在戰鬥中特別顯眼。 /// Umojan battlecruisers feature redesigned neosteel plating, as well as refinements to the Yamato cannons that make them particularly distinctive in battles.=16336
Skin/Info/BroodLord,經由進化成為天空霸主的寄生王蟲，會射出寄生蟲來攻擊敵人。對敵人來說，牠是相當恐怖的生物。 /// Evolved to rule the skies, the brood lords are terrifying creatures that hurl their destructive broodlings at enemy forces.=16337
Skin/Info/BroodLordMecha,就在超越所有標準的寄生王蟲原型機即將完成時，擬態計畫的科學家都去度假慶祝了。但奇怪的是，再也沒有人回來工作了… /// Upon completing the brood lord prototype which exceeded all standards, the team of Project Simulant scientists were sent on leave for a celebratory vacation. Strangely, they never returned...=16338
Skin/Info/BroodLordPrimal,有少數寄生王蟲被整合到原生蟲族族群當中，導致這些與眾不同的生物有著不尋常的爪子。 /// A small number of brood lords have been integrated into primal zerg packs, resulting in a strikingly different creature most notable for its unusual claws.=16339
Skin/Info/BroodLordRCZ,地獄犬寄生王蟲所派出的寄生蟲，都可以由指揮官透過電腦介面，在遠端對個別單位下指令進行戰鬥。 /// Each broodling dispatched from the Cerberus brood lord can be controlled individually by a commander safe at a computer console, far away from the actual battle.=16340
Skin/Info/BroodLordWebby,雖然寄生王蟲在後期才加入蟲族行列，不過牠們身上大多仍保留了利維坦群落的明顯基因特徵，就像是進化管理者阿巴瑟在初期原質實驗所留下的記號一樣。 /// Despite their late introduction into the Swarm, many brood lords still bear the Leviathan Brood's signature genetic traits--likely a sign of early essence experimentation by the evolution master, Abathur.=16341
Skin/Info/BroodLord_PremiumSkin_Aquatic,在感染某顆星球上絕大多數的海洋之後，部分寄生王蟲透過進化，獲得棲息在水中的能力，能夠潛入深邃的海溝，吞噬牠們的獵物。 /// While infesting a planet with exceptionally large seas, some brood lords took to the water and evolved the ability to dive deep into the trenches while devouring their prey.=16342
Skin/Info/Bunker,因為碉堡無所不在而且內部缺乏設施，人類步兵通常稱它為「戰場棺材」。 /// Due to its ubiquity and lack of amenities, terran infantry commonly refer to bunkers as "battlefield coffins."=16343
Skin/Info/BunkerCovertOps,下個世代的自治聯盟碉堡可以完整承受一隻雷獸的重量，不過讓陸戰隊們更開心的是裡面終於有椅子了。 /// The next-generation Dominion bunker can withstand the full weight of an ultralisk, but what most marines are excited about is the fact that it comes with chairs.=16344
Skin/Info/BunkerSilver,泰拉朵的超降溫碉堡，就算在悶熱的熱帶度假區，也一樣能營造出舒適的偵察環境。 /// Tyrador's supercooled bunkers make for comfortable reconnaissance, even in sweltering tropical vacation zones.=16345
Skin/Info/Carrier,這些宏偉的主力艦，能夠鼓舞聖堂武士...或是讓敵人心生畏懼。艦上搭載的攔截機，是戰場上令人聞風喪膽的武力。 /// These magnificent capital ships are known to inspire hope in the hearts of the templar--or fear in their enemies. Armed with swift interceptors, they are a formidable force on the battlefield.=16346
Skin/Info/CarrierGolden,有一小部分的航空母艦使用了古代的技術重新打造，讓外觀看起來更像來自衝突紀元以後的機種。這些航空母艦主要做為外交用途。 /// A small number of carriers have been rebuilt using ancient techniques to better resemble their counterparts from the period after the Aeon of Strife. They are primarily used for diplomatic visits.=16347
Skin/Info/CarrierIhanrii,伊翰利神族開發出了這種可動石質材料，不只輕量、耐用，還不易起化學反應。這些特性讓它相當適合當作大型太空船艦的材料。 /// The animated stone developed by the Ihan-rii protoss is light, durable, and chemically inert, making it the perfect material for massive deep-space ships.=16348
Skin/Info/CarrierPurifier,淨化者的航空母艦是極具效率的船艦，將自動化技術與極為致命的無人兵器完美結合在一起。 /// The Purifier carrier is a streamlined creation that perfectly combines automation expertise with the deadliest of drone weapons.=16349
Skin/Info/CarrierRemastered,航空母艦的主體是以星梭號這艘傳說中的旗艦為範本，並在特定角落保留了神族的空間，來紀念塔薩達和他的犧牲奉獻。 /// Carriers modeled after legendary flagship Gantrithor continue to be built in certain corners of Protoss space, to honor Tassadar and the sacrifice he made.=16350
Skin/Info/CarrierTaldarim,塔達力姆船艦的特徵，就是把卡萊工程技術轉化為殺傷力。整支死亡艦隊的主力幾乎由航空母艦構成。 /// Tal'darim shipwrights excel at repurposing khalai engineering for bloodshed. The carriers that make up the majority of the death fleet are warships through and through.=16351
Skin/Info/Carrier_AmonBrood_Collection,亞蒙腐化了大部分的黃金艦隊，納為己用。虛空能量不只改變了這些受控神族的外表，就連船艦外觀也因而改變。 /// Amon corrupted a large portion of the Golden Armada, using their warriors as his own. These possessed protoss took on a different appearance due to the Void energy, and their ships were likewise changed.=16352
Skin/Info/Colossus,巨像是神族首見專為破壞而設計的機器人。它們不僅象徵著血腥的過去，也代表著鞏固未來和平的必要手段。 /// Colossi were the first protoss robots designed solely for destruction. They are both a symbol of a bloody history and a necessary weapon to secure a peaceful future.=16353
Skin/Info/ColossusCE,在凱拉什仲裁事件後，淨化者計畫中的巨像因過於危險而遭禁用。而如今巨像已成為聖堂武士中的傳奇，是終極的淨化機器。 /// Deemed too dangerous for use after the Kalath Intercession, the Purifier program's colossi are legendary among the Templar's warriors. These are the ultimate purification machines.=16354
Skin/Info/ColossusGolden,以傳統風格使用最好的材料，重新打造在末日之戰中的巨像。這些巨像現在和古老的神族機械一樣富麗堂皇。 /// Selected colossi that saw combat in the End War have been remodeled in a traditionalist style using the finest materials available. They now resemble the grandest of ancient protoss robotics.=16355
Skin/Info/ColossusIhanrii,伊翰利巨像大多數的石質元件，都是經由重新設計的薩爾納加產能器所產生的虛空能量，來結合並保持懸浮狀態。 /// The many stone components of the Ihan-rii colossus are levitated and held together by void energies emanated from repurposed xel'naga dynamos.=16356
Skin/Info/ColossusPurifier,靠著最新的工程技術，淨化者打造出了流線且優雅的巨像，不過它依舊是一台不折不扣的殘暴戰爭機器。 /// The latest in Purifier engineering has yielded a sleek, subtly enhanced colossus that is nonetheless a brutal war machine.=16357
Skin/Info/ColossusTal,巨像是遠古戰爭的產物，原本被埋藏在星區各處，如今塔達力姆飛升者將它們挖掘出來，要利用它們強大的火力。 /// Relics of wars long over, colossi that lay buried and forgotten across the sector are often unearthed and reactivated by Tal'darim ascendants who seek superior firepower.=16358
Skin/Info/ColossusTaldarim,位階較低的飛升者經常相互挑釁對方，看看誰能將一台啟動的巨像癱瘓，然後取得控制權，如果成功了，塔達力姆就增添一台強大的戰爭兵器。如果失敗了也沒差，就少一位飛升者當你的競爭對手啦。 /// Lower ranking ascendants often dare each other to disable and commandeer an active colossus. If one succeeds, the Tal'darim gain a powerful war machine. If not, a rival ascendant has been eliminated.=16359
Skin/Info/CommandCenter,指揮中心具備高機動性和實務機能，可以進行資源調度。它可以隨時移動到富有晶礦和高能瓦斯的地方。 /// Mobile and practical, command centers are resource processors that can relocate to wherever minerals or vespene gas are plentiful.=16360
Skin/Info/CommandCenterCovertOps,強化反作用力登陸爪讓這座指揮中心可以在最艱困的環境中穩定著地。 /// Reinforced repulsor landing claws help this command center find solid footing in even the harshest environments.=16361
Skin/Info/CommandCenterRemastered,早先的指揮中心在設計上具備擴充式介面，用以連結外部附屬建築。後來為了提高安全性，以內建的隔區取代這些介面。 /// Previous iterations of the command center had an extensible interface in order to connect with external add-ons. These were later replaced with internal bays for increased security.=16362
Skin/Info/CommandCenterSilver,泰拉朵指揮中心在伊翰利神族到來之後，是用來接待克普魯星區眾多外交使節的地方，每名使節都極力想招募新來者加入他們的特定政治議程。 /// After the arrival of the Ihan-rii protoss, Tyrador's command centers played host to diplomatic envoys from around the Koprulu Sector, each intent on recruiting the newcomers to their own specific political agenda.=16363
Skin/Info/Corruptor,腐化飛蟲是藉由生物產生的電磁場浮在空中，牠噴出的強酸連最堅固的建材都能腐蝕掉。 /// Held aloft by a biologically produced electromagnetic field, corruptors can spray a stream of caustic acid that eats through even the most durable of construction materials.=16364
Skin/Info/CorruptorMecha,這些機械腐化飛蟲沒有孢子，而是用自我複製的奈米機器人取代，並且以程式執行相同的功能。這實在是讓人很不放心。 /// Rather than spores, these mechanical corruptors possess self-replicating nanites that have been programmed to perform the same function, disturbingly enough.=16365
Skin/Info/CorruptorPrimal,腐化飛蟲演化方式在蟲群與原生蟲族中截然不同，後者有著更加厚重的爪子和蟲殼，為牠們嚴苛的攝食方式提供協助。 /// The original corruptors have the distinction of being adapted by both the Swarm and the primal zerg. The latter have adapted thicker claws and carapaces to assist with their rigorous feeding process.=16366
Skin/Info/CorruptorRCZ,在阿克圖洛斯‧蒙斯克死亡之後，地獄犬計畫轉向地下進行，並把神經重組的目標由人類士兵轉往蟲族。 /// Driven underground after the fall of Arcturus Mengsk, the Cerberus Program evolved their neural reprogramming initiative, targeting zerg instead of terran soldiers.=16367
Skin/Info/CorruptorWebby,雖然硬化脊刺和網狀組織常常讓人聯想到水棲生物，不過利維坦群落的腐化飛蟲卻能夠在強大的重力環境下生存。 /// While hardened spines and webbed features often suggest an aquatic background, the Leviathan Brood's corruptors adapted them to survive in high gravity environments.=16368
Skin/Info/CreepTumorMecha,流浪的擬態機甲后蟲所產生的蟲苔瘤裡，必定包含著精密的奈米科技。但因為蟲苔瘤切開後隨即引爆的特性，導致後續研究難以進行。=16369
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCore,眾所皆知，神族會把死亡的精英戰士配對並結合在後天打造的身軀上，讓他們獲得新生，繼續光榮戰鬥。機械控制核心在開發這項技術時扮演了重要的角色。 /// The protoss are known to pair elite fallen warriors with artificial bodies, granting them a second life in glorious combat. The cybernetics core plays a large role in developing this technology.=16370
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCoreForged,所有的機械控制核心都是為了把生物個體與複雜的機械結合，塔達利姆機械核心唯一的不同之處在於結合的過程痛苦到難以想像。 /// All cybernetics cores possess the ability to bind biological beings to elaborate machinery; in Tal'darim cybernetics cores, the main difference is that the process is unimaginably painful.=16371
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCoreIhanrii,雖然伊翰利機械控制核心和同時期的神族版本所產生的能量差異很大，不過還是可以從伊翰利殖民地的人類偵查設備看出其中的相似性。 /// Terran recon of Ihan-rii settlements yielded footage of a structure resembling the contemporary protoss cybernetics core, though the energies produced by the Ihan-rii version were wildly different.=16372
Skin/Info/Cyclone,颶風飛彈車原先是設計成全自動無人機動攻擊載具，後來經過重新設計，可乘載一名駕駛員。畢竟，人類駕駛員的不可預測性是獨一無二的。 /// Originally intended to be fully automated, this mobile assault vehicle was redesigned to accommodate a pilot. After all, nothing can match the unpredictability of a human driver.=16373
Skin/Info/CycloneCovertOps,這台載具經過大幅度重新設計，好提升執行特種部隊任務所需要的機動性，例如裸露在外的胎面能適應各種難以移動的地形，以及輕易在狹小空間移動。 /// This vehicle has undergone extensive redesigns to increase its maneuverability in special forces missions, including exposed treads that will cross difficult terran and small spaces more readily.=16374
Skin/Info/CycloneJunker,米拉的傭兵大幅改裝了颶風飛彈車，裝上了合金版和大量尖刺。但因為他們施工草率，吸收傷害的能力其實根本沒差。 /// Mira's mercs have significantly bulked up their cyclones, adding extra plating and a generous number of spikes. However, due to their hasty engineering, its ability to absorb damage remains the same.=16375
Skin/Info/CycloneSilver,當地獄犬蟲族攻擊泰拉朵九號星時，有幾台颶風飛彈車還只裝備了本來要在晚上施放的遊樂園煙火。 /// When the Cerberus zerg attacked Tyrador IX, a few cyclones sent to defend were still armed with harmless fireworks used for nightly amusement park displays.=16376
Skin/Info/CycloneUmojan,如果模仿是最真摯的奉承，那這些颶風飛彈車就是尤摩捷工程師對泰倫自治聯盟工藝技術的致敬。 /// If imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, then these cyclones are the Umojan engineers' elaborate tribute to the ingenuity of the Terran Dominion.=16377
Skin/Info/DarkShrine,黑暗聖殿原先是尼拉辛姆這個獨立神族社群的紀念碑。在重新加入卡萊之後，尼拉辛姆將它做為訓練黑暗聖堂武士的基地。 /// The dark shrine once stood as a monument to the independent society of the Nerazim. After the rejoining the khalai, the Nerazim repurposed it as a training ground for dark templar.=16378
Skin/Info/DarkShrineForged,只有血獵人，大領主邪惡意志的執行者，知道塔達利姆黑暗聖殿裡流動的是什麼東西。 /// None but the blood hunters, enforcers of the Highlords' malevolent will, know what transpires within the Tal'darim dark shrine.=16379
Skin/Info/DarkShrineIhanrii,即使根據人類的觀測，顯示伊翰利黑暗聖殿外部那些可動石質材料的溫度幾乎低到結凍的程度，可是從聖殿頂部放出的高溫熱氣，不難得知內部溫度其實異常地高。 /// The superheated fumes venting from the top of the Ihan-rii dark shrine suggest infernal internal temperatures, though terran thermal analysis indicates the animated stone exterior is near-freezing.=16380
Skin/Info/DarkTemplar,黑暗聖堂武士是尼拉辛姆的強悍幽能戰士，他們能夠控制虛空的力量，從暗影處發動致命兇猛的攻擊。 /// Powerful psionic warriors of the Nerazim, dark templar have learned how to manipulate the powers of the Void. They strike from the shadows, deadly and relentless.=16381
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarGolden,守舊派的聖堂武士宣稱已經和一些尼拉辛姆締結了友誼，並且誇耀這些人是達蘭的真正象徵。但其他傳言說他們只是被賄絡了。 /// Templar traditionalists claim to have befriended a few of the Nerazim, boasting that these individuals are the true symbol of the Daelaam. Others say they were merely bribed.=16382
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarIhanrii,伊翰利神族在訓練初期，相當依賴虛空水晶來與他們獨特的幽能特徵共振。但當他們成熟以後，就會把這顆幽能水晶打造成致命又鋒利的矛尖。 /// Early in their training, Ihan-rii protoss are bound to a void crystal that resonates with their unique psionic signature. Once they reach adulthood, this crystal is sharpened into a deadly spearpoint.=16383
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarPurifier,淨化者和尼拉辛姆在交流增加之後，設計出了新款的哨兵，模擬了黑暗聖堂武士在戰鬥中無畏的態度。 /// After increased interaction with the Nerazim, the Purifiers have designed a new variant on the sentinel that mimics the combat prowess of Dark Templar warriors.=16384
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarTaldarim,塔達力姆這支部族是相當殘酷的，而且心狠手辣。無情的血獵人會藏身暗處，獵殺那些無法侍奉大領主的弱者。 /// Tal'darim society is brutal and unforgiving. Those deemed too weak to be of service to their Highlord are ruthlessly hunted down and executed by the blood hunters, who stalk their prey unseen.=16385
Skin/Info/Disruptor,裂光球是神族武力中最具破壞力的單位，源自淨化者計畫中的其中一項研究。它們的武器具有恆星能量的威力，破壞力十足。 /// Originally developed as part of the Purifier program, disruptors are among the deadliest of protoss armaments. Their solarite arsenal is capable of immense devastation.=16386
Skin/Info/DisruptorGolden,和巨像一樣，經歷過末日之戰的裂光球也被翻新，做為紀念神族勝利的象徵。而失敗的部分，或許會隨著時間過去而消逝。 /// Much like the colossi, disruptors that saw combat in the End War have been refurbished as reminders of the protoss' moments of victory. Perhaps with time, the memories of their losses will fade.=16387
Skin/Info/DisruptorIhanrii,從主力艦水晶核心發射出的伊翰利裂光球，外觀閃耀著綠色的能量。任何生物接觸到它的中央能量時，都會馬上灰飛煙滅。 /// Ihan-rii disruptors draw crackling green energy directly from the crystal cores of their capital ships. Anything biological that makes contact with the central power conduit is promptly vaporized.=16388
Skin/Info/DisruptorPurifier,來自賽博洛斯的最新裂光球擁有先進的裝甲，而且在協定上做了精密的調整。這些改進表示他們投入了大量心力在研發工作上。 /// The latest disruptors from Cybros feature advanced plating and protocol refinements that reflect their investment in ongoing research.=16389
Skin/Info/DisruptorTaldarim,雖然塔達力姆總是對達蘭所配備的武器不停的冷嘲熱諷，不過當他們還是會盡全力奪取裂光球並且加以改造，越多越好。畢竟，像這種威力強大的武器，誰不喜歡呢。 /// The Tal'darim often scoff at the Daelaam's choice of weaponry, but they were quick to seize and repurpose as many disruptors as they could. Such destructive power is too great to ignore.=16390
Skin/Info/Drone,工蟲除了專心工作以外，不會去思考其他事情，體內具有可進化成任何蟲族建築的基因編碼。只需要提供牠們資源，以及為額外生物質提供養分的蟲苔就行了。 /// Single-minded and diligent, drones hold within their genetic code the evolutionary potential of all zerg structures. All they require are resources and creep to nourish their added biomass.=16391
Skin/Info/DroneBlizzcon17,這隻不尋常的工蟲，是在一堆生鏽的殘骸中孵化出來。 為了不受影響，牠轉化自己的身體，與瓦礫融合。 /// This unusual drone hatched amid a pile of rusting terran wreckage. Rather than suffering from the interference, its flesh adapted to fuse itself to the rubble.=16392
Skin/Info/DroneMecha,擬態計畫一開始是從打造機械工蟲開始，原本的用途是當作練習目標，來測試各類戰鬥技巧和武器，但這計畫很快就開始擴大，規模也遠比原本要大得多。 /// The Simulant Project began with the construction of a mechanical drone that could be used during target practice to test alternate combat techniques and weapons, but it soon grew much larger.=16393
Skin/Info/DronePrimal,原生工蟲經常發現牠們處於危險的狀況下，因為族群中較強的個體會將工蟲當作額外的營養來源。 /// Primal drones often find themselves in a perilous position, as stronger members of their packs have been known to feed on them when they require additional nourishment.=16394
Skin/Info/DroneRCZ,就像其他地獄犬蟲族一樣，工蟲的神經系統也被機械控制系統取代，它可以完整控制蟲族的骨骼和肌肉。 /// Like the rest of the Cerberus zerg, this drone's nervous system has been replaced with cybernetic technology, enabling full musculoskeletal control.=16395
Skin/Info/DroneRemastered,工蟲的早期演化歷程中，曾經擁有更多樣的色彩，和更加具侵略性的反射行為。但隨著時間過去，這些特徵最終消失在蟲群當中。 /// Earlier evolutions of the drone had more vibrant coloration and increased aggression reflexes that gradually disappeared within the population in the following years.=16396
Skin/Info/DroneWebby,帶有劇毒的鰭刺，是警告捕食者不要靠近的常見防禦機制。有些生物會模仿這種外觀，藉此降低受到侵略的可能性。 /// Poisonous fin rays are a universal defense mechanism signaling predators to stay away. Some creatures merely mimic their deadly appearance to discourage unwanted aggression.=16397
Skin/Info/EngineeringBay,人類在群落戰爭之後開始大幅度發展工程能力。而因為人員的增加和工作複雜度的提升，電機工程所不再具備飛行能力。 /// The terrans heavily developed their engineering capabilities after the Brood War. Due to the increase in personnel and the intricacy of their work, the engineering bay is no longer cleared for flight.=16398
Skin/Info/EngineeringBayCovertOps,實驗型電機工程所透過讓人工智慧在模擬戰爭中互相競爭的方式，加快研究速度。 /// Experimental engineering bays increase research speed by pitting rival AIs against one another in simulated battle.=16399
Skin/Info/EngineeringBaySilver,每座泰拉朵電機工程所，都有一個區塊打算用來當成新型遊樂園景點，不過在地獄犬蟲族來襲之後，這件事情就暫時擱置了。 /// A portion of each Knights of Tyrador engineering bay is devoted to concocting new amusement park attractions, though this policy has been temporarily suspended in wake of the Cerberus zerg assault.=16400
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamber,在進化室裡，基因序列會扭曲並融合，讓蟲族大軍獲得強化。 /// Genetic sequences twist and merge within the evolution chamber, generating improvements to the zerg army. =16401
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamberMecha,就像其他的擬態機甲建築，進化室也是由可彎曲的聚合物合金組成，如此才能應付內部不斷攪動的生物機械程序。 /// Like other Simulant structures, the evolution chamber is constructed from a polymeric alloy capable of flexing to accommodate the roiling biomechanical processes within.=16402
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamberRCZ,地獄犬生物工程部門在歷經長達數月的挫敗後，發現只要在進化室的數條動脈裡面注入滿滿的命令激素，就能控制這座建築的超適應傾向。 /// After months of frustration in the Cerberus bioengineering department, it was discovered that pumping an evolution chamber's arteries full of command pheromones could just about tame the structure's hyperadaptive tendencies.=16403
Skin/Info/Extractor,這座生物性的建築物會吸收高能瓦斯並將其以肉囊的形式排出。這些肉囊經過精心設計，讓工蟲可以輕鬆搬運。 /// This is a biological structure that digests vespene gas before excreting it in small flesh sacs. These sacs are perfectly designed to be easily transportable by a drone.=16404
Skin/Info/ExtractorMecha,在擬態機甲的計畫檔案中，載明了瓦斯萃取巢只有裝飾性的用途。至於它如何改變為擁有完整瓦斯生產功能的建築，沒有人知道其中的原因。 /// Planning documents indicate that the Simulant Project's extractors were intended to be purely decorative. It remains unclear when they shifted into full vespene production.=16405
Skin/Info/ExtractorRCZ,地獄犬瓦斯萃取巢在泰拉朵九號星的地表下跳動，汲取地殼中每一道高能瓦斯，化為進一步擴張的能量。 /// Cerberus extractors pulse unremittingly beneath Tyrador IX's surface, leeching every trace of vespene gas from the planet's crust to power further expansion.=16406
Skin/Info/Factory,在第二次星際戰爭期間，軍工廠拆除了廁所，讓技師可以利用多出來的空間部署具備攻城功能的攻城坦克。 /// During the Second Great War, latrines were removed from factories. This extra space allowed mechanics to deploy siege tanks with siege capabilities already installed.=16407
Skin/Info/FactoryCovertOps,R36系列軍工廠有更堅固的錨爪、強化的地基，表面還加上了防彈塗層。 /// The R36-series factory features sturdier anchors, a reinforced foundation, and bulletproof coat of paint.=16408
Skin/Info/FactorySilver,伊翰利神族和泰拉朵九號星領導階層之間的協商遇到強烈阻礙，原因是位於爭議區域的人類軍工廠發生數起原因不明的爆炸事件，於當地留下好幾個發光的綠色坑洞。 /// Settlement negotiations between the Ihan-rii protoss and Tyrador IX's leaders hit a snag when several terran factories in a disputed area mysteriously exploded, leaving glowing green craters.=16409
Skin/Info/FleetBeacon,艦隊導航台的功能是強化附近星際之門與幽能矩陣的連結，讓大型主力艦可以透過躍傳運送。 /// Fleet beacons serve to strengthen the connection of any nearby stargate to the psionic matrix, enabling the warp transport of massive capital ships.=16410
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconForged,塔達利姆艦隊導航台強制讓大量幽能穿過中央球體，藉以傳送巨大的裝甲戰艦。 /// The Tal'darim fleet beacon forces an almost certainly inadvisable amount of psionic energy through its central sphere, enabling the teleportation of massive and heavily armored warships.=16411
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconIhanrii,伊翰利神族終於回到阿拉基爾，接下來他們打造出強大的艦隊導航台，想以此搜索宇宙各處，找出他們古代文明的倖存者。 /// Back on Arakyr at last, the Ihan-rii built powerful fleet beacons to scan the depths of space for other survivors of their ancient civilization.=16412
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconTaldarim,=16413
Skin/Info/Forge,冶煉廠裡有許多相位工匠不眠不休，為他們的弟兄改良武器、護甲，和船艦。這些精英工程師會不斷工作，直到收復艾爾的那天為止。 /// The forge houses phase-smiths working tirelessly to improve the weapons, armor, and ships of their brethren. These elite engineers will not rest until the day Aiur is reclaimed.=16414
Skin/Info/ForgeForged,在卡達利姆冶煉廠裡，被囚禁的卡萊工程師遭到拷問，逼迫他們吐露技術秘密。 /// Inside Tal'darim forges, captured Khalai engineers are interrogated for their technological secrets. =16415
Skin/Info/ForgeIhanrii,伊翰利從阿拉基爾南極一帶的礦脈開採虛空水晶，再以真空密封方式存放在冶煉廠最深處的艙室裡面。 /// The Ihan-rii mine void crystals from veins along Arakyr's southern pole, storing them vacuum-sealed in their forges' deepest chambers.=16416
Skin/Info/ForgeTaldarim,=16417
Skin/Info/FusionCore,核融合核心中所進行的工作極度精密，研究員必須調控反物質與核能，來提升戰巡艦的威力。 /// The work undertaken in the fusion core is extremely delicate. Researchers here harness antimatter and nuclear power to increase battlecruiser capability.=16418
Skin/Info/FusionCoreCovertOps,為了配合全新的命運女神級戰巡艦，核融合核心的能量輸出提升了四倍，但它的發熱特性並沒有因此隨之提高。 /// To accommodate the new Moirai-class battlecruiser, the fusion core's energy output was quadrupled without increasing its heat signature.=16419
Skin/Info/FusionCoreSilver,液冷式核融合核心除了維持軌道戰巡艦隊的運作，同時也是泰拉朵九號星大多數賭場、水上樂園和機械按摩室的動力來源。 /// In addition to supporting the orbital battlecruiser fleet, liquid-cooled fusion cores provide most of the power for Tyrador IX's casinos, water parks, and robotic massage parlors.=16420
Skin/Info/Gateway,群落戰爭之後，神族對古代薩爾納加的躍傳科技進行了逆向工程。傳送門因此可以在幾秒鐘內，運送戰士到遠方的戰場上。 /// Following the Brood War, the protoss reverse engineered the ancient warp technology of the xel'naga. Gateways can now transport warriors to distant battlefields within seconds.=16421
Skin/Info/GatewayForged,塔達利姆傳送門可以躍傳的距離遠比卡萊的傳送門要長。但缺點是額外的能量有可能會讓乘客在旅途中化為碎片。 /// The Tal'darim gateway can warp warriors from much further away than its Khalai counterparts. One downside of the additional power is that passengers are occasionally torn to bits en route.=16422
Skin/Info/GatewayIhanrii,由於人類某位權貴人士在拜訪伊翰利殖民地時誤觸傳送門，接觸到過量虛空能量導致該人士當場蒸發（而且還弄得現場一片混亂），泰拉朵九號星上面的種族關係面臨前所未見的嚴峻考驗。 /// Interspecies relations on Tyrador IX faced their toughest test yet when a terran dignitary visiting an Ihan-rii settlement touched a gateway and was immediately (and messily) vaporized by excess void energies.=16423
Skin/Info/GatewayTaldarim,=16424
Skin/Info/Ghost,幽靈特務是出類拔萃的人類特務單位，會利用他們與生俱有的幽能來使他們的奪命技能更加致命。這些探員無論是在滲透或是暗殺方面，都無人能出其右。 /// The ultimate terran covert operatives, ghosts harness their innate psionic potential to enhance their lethal skill sets. They are unrivaled in their ability to infiltrate and assassinate.=16425
Skin/Info/GhostAcademy,自治聯盟成立之後，蒙斯克決定大幅修改幽靈特務計畫，於是成立了幽靈特務學院以及附屬的核彈發射井，來完整駕馭這股潛能。 /// After forming the Dominion, Mengsk sought to overhaul the ghost program. Dedicated ghost academies with attached nuclear silos were erected in order to fully harness this potential.=16426
Skin/Info/GhostAcademyCovertOps,新式的幽靈特務學院改善了核彈發射井將輻射洩漏到隔壁訓練場的問題。 /// Newer ghost academies have ameliorated the issue of radiation leaking from nuclear silos into the neighboring training areas.=16427
Skin/Info/GhostAcademySilver,當泰拉朵騎士發現地獄犬在幕後控制蟲族入侵時．立刻從傭兵中招募幽靈特務來追蹤和暗殺這間可惡企業的領導階層。 /// When it was discovered that Cerberus was responsible for the invasion of remote-control zerg, the Knights of Tyrador recruited mercenary ghosts to track down and assassinate the rogue corporation's leadership.=16428
Skin/Info/GhostCovertOps,維勒安大帝近年來大幅改革幽靈特務的執行計畫，吸引許多更優秀、更忠誠的新血。他們完全依照自己的自由意志來執行任務。 /// Emperor Valerian has initiated various changes in the ghost program in recent years, resulting in better, more committed recruits who serve of their own free will.=16429
Skin/Info/GhostEidolon,很少有幽靈特務能夠說自己是精英，因為能夠成功在嚴苛的工作環境中一路撐下來的人實在不多；只要你成為精英，都會擁有專屬於你的鬼影戰鬥服。 /// Few ghosts manage to survive the rigors of the program long enough to call themselves veterans, but those who do gain access to the highly exclusive Eidolon suits.=16430
Skin/Info/GhostJunker,即使米拉‧韓有著迷人的性格，但依舊很難找到幽靈特務在她麾下效命。或許是因為幽靈特務偏好使用更精密的武器，而傭兵們通常無法提供。 /// Despite her charismatic personality, Mira Han has had nothing but trouble recruiting and retaining ghosts among her crew. Perhaps they prefer more sophisticated weaponry than mercs can offer.=16431
Skin/Info/GhostNova,每個幽靈特務都是致命的特務密探，不過唯有以前段班成績畢業的幽靈特務才是最致命的。在戰場上，這些精英刺客在無數的行動中扮演著關鍵角色。 /// All ghosts are deadly covert operatives, but those who graduate at the head of their class are the deadliest. These elite assassins are at the center of countless battlefield operations.=16432
Skin/Info/GhostSilver,幽靈特務精英會看守著重要的遊客。但他們的面具在參觀岩石行星之後遭到客訴：「拜託，那個面具嚇死人了！」從此之後他們就不使用面具了。 /// Elite ghosts guard Tyrador's most valuable tourists. Their visors were discontinued after a visiting rock star complained that "the masks freak me out, man."=16433
Skin/Info/GhostUmojan,這些精英特務名為暗影護衛，是受雇來保護尤摩捷護衛軍的秘密，同時保衛和平的部隊。 /// Known as shadowguards, these elite operatives are employed to keep the secrets of the Umojan Protectorate, as well as the peace.=16434
Skin/Info/GreaterSpireMecha,官方指出，擬態機甲計畫從來沒有成功複製出巨型螺旋塔。而針對相關的照片證據，自治聯盟代表也出面澄清了那不過只是精細的仿製品而已。=16435
Skin/Info/Hatchery,每個殖民地都需要一個核心來分解晶礦，製造幼蟲，還有產生蟲苔。孵化所擁有蟲族所有品系的基因藍圖。 /// Every colony needs a heart. From digesting minerals to creating larva to generating creep, hatcheries hold the genetic blueprints for the zerg.=16436
Skin/Info/HatcheryMecha,當擬態機甲計畫所複製的孵化所不明地開始產生與蟲苔毫無差異的物質時，計畫主持人就得煩惱更麻煩的問題了。 /// By the time the Simulant Project's replica hatcheries began mysteriously producing a substance indistinguishable from creep, the directors had bigger problems to worry about. =16437
Skin/Info/HatcheryRCZ,地獄犬確定無人發現他們成功滲透泰拉朵九號星的地下環境後，著手在這顆行星的廣大熔岩通道中安置可遠端控制的孵化所。 /// After verifying that their infiltration of Tyrador IX's subterranean environment had escaped detection, Cerberus began seeding the planet's extensive lava tubes with remote-operated hatcheries.=16438
Skin/Info/HatcheryRemastered,刀鋒女皇消失後，蟲族蟲后爭相爭奪控制權。許多弱小的蟲后遭到置換，並且從所屬的群落消失無蹤。剩下的蟲后找到被遺棄、處於休眠狀態的孵化所，努力建立新的群落。 /// The zerg broodmothers vied for dominance over one another in the absence of the Queen of Blades. Many of those who were weak were displaced from their colonies and perished. Others discovered abandoned, dormant hatcheries and set to work raising new broods.=16439
Skin/Info/Hellion,惡狼是種速度很快的攻擊單位，配有輕型裝甲，能快速發動突擊和進行迴避動作。在傭兵公司裡面相當受歡迎。 /// High-speed raiders with lightweight chassis, hellions excel at lightning-fast strike missions and evasive maneuvering. They are particularly popular with mercenary companies.=16440
Skin/Info/HellionCovertOps,精緻地運用大膽的三輪設計，讓這台惡狼的外型更加流線靈活，比之前更好操控。對了，駕駛員之間的對話也比以往更加有趣。 /// Refined to utilize a bold, three-wheel design, this hellion is sleeker and easier to steer than ever before. Word among the drivers is that it's even more fun, too.=16441
Skin/Info/HellionJunker,這些經過改裝的惡狼，原本是給地下破壞組織使用的；結果在偏遠星球，變成一些專門掠奪資源的幫派最愛用的載具。 /// Originally modified for underground demolition leagues, these Hellions have become the preferred vehicles of the fringe worlds' notorious junker gangs.=16442
Skin/Info/HellionJunkerMM,惡狼的設計目標就是為了讓駕駛員盡快脫離危險情況，而且實務上運作得不錯。惡狼還裝置了非法的戰鬥藥劑噴灑器，但傭兵們對此不做任何回應。 /// These hellions were made to get their drivers out of bad situations quickly and look good in the process. They may also have illegal stim emitters, but the mercs are tight-lipped about them.=16443
Skin/Info/HellionSilver,泰拉朵惡狼上那些拉風的鉻合金輪圈是和街頭賽車時尚教主JJ Hyun合作設計的。 /// The stylish chrome rims on the Tyrador hellion were designed in collaboration with street racer-turned-fashion icon JJ Hyun.=16444
Skin/Info/HellionUmojan,尤摩捷的人可以享受駕駛的樂趣，都是因為這台精心設計的惡狼。他有跑車等級的改良式懸吊系統、具有防禦能力的合金板，甚至還有舒適的駕駛座。 /// Umojans drive in style thanks to their sophisticated hellions, which sport improved suspension, defensive plating, and even more comfortable seats for their drivers.=16445
Skin/Info/HighTemplar,在神族中，高階聖堂武士是最受人敬重、戰鬥經驗最豐富的戰士。他們將自身幽能提升到驚人的境界，他們的心智就是最強大的武器。 /// The high templar are the most respected and experienced warriors of the protoss race. Having honed their psionic abilities to an awe-inspiring degree, their minds are their greatest weapon.=16446
Skin/Info/HighTemplarGolden,席拉克高階聖堂武士是第一個穿上古代裝甲，來紀念卡斯和他在統一神族的貢獻上所扮演的角色。他們藉由擁抱輝煌的過去，來迴避對未來困境的恐懼。 /// The Shelak high templar were the first to wear ancient armor in recognition of Khas and his role in uniting the templar. By embracing the glorious past, they quiet their fears about the troubled future.=16447
