Skin/Info/HighTemplarIhanrii,「澤拉圖」發出的求救訊號將他們從靜滯狀態喚醒，但伊翰利神族聯繫不上他。於是伊翰利神族決定回到那個他們之前稱為家的地方。 /// Unable to reach the "Zeratul" whose distress signal had wrested them from deep stasis, the Ihan-rii protoss made their way to the system that, long ago, they had called home. =16448
Skin/Info/HighTemplarPurifier,在大量的實驗之後，淨化者終於讓A.I.戰士有能力使用與達蘭高階聖堂武士完全相同的技能。據說亞坦尼斯大主教本人對此也是嘖嘖稱奇。 /// After extensive experimentation, the Purifiers have perfected AI warriors that possess the same distinctive abilities as the high templar in the Daelaam. Hierarch Artanis himself is said to be impressed.=16449
Skin/Info/HighTemplarTaldarim,塔達力姆透過拉克希爾儀式，在飛升之鍊往上爬。長年吸收態化氫及侍奴的生命精華，讓飛升者的威力更勝以往。 /// Through Rak'Shir, the Tal'darim climb the Chain of Ascension. Years of absorbing terrazine and the essence of their supplicants have made these ascendants powerful indeed.=16450
Skin/Info/HiveMecha,在出現數個擬態機甲蟲穴進一步突變為成熟蟲巢的案例後，一旦有人擁有執行此研究的經驗，就有可能開始一連串鉅細靡遺的調查。=16451
Skin/Info/Hydralisk,刺蛇的存在目的就是成為讓敵人聞風喪膽的恐怖殺手。牠們以強韌的肌肉組織，從蟲殼之間高速射出的脊刺，就連新型鋼鐵都能打穿。 /// Evolved to be nightmarish killers, hydralisks boast robust musculature that allows them to eject the spines between their carapace plating with such speed that they can puncture neosteel.=16452
Skin/Info/HydraliskDen,蟲族使用溫和的惰蛇做為結構，將它進化為刺蛇獸穴。而隨著時間過去，它也逐漸發展出外骨骼構造來保護下方的血肉。 /// The zerg took the structure of the peaceful slothien and evolved it to create the hydralisk den. Over time, it has developed a biological exoskeleton to protect its flesh.=16453
Skin/Info/HydraliskDenMecha,研究者一直無法找出刺蛇獸穴長出釩合金刀刃的原因，而且也找不到是哪個人把刀刃放在那裡的。 /// Investigators were never able to ascertain the purpose of the deadly vanadium blades sprouting from the hydralisk den, nor the individual responsible for placing them there.=16454
Skin/Info/HydraliskDenRCZ,地獄犬對入侵泰拉朵九號星勢在必得，因此需要展示「在實體環境提高刺蛇20%產能效率」等實驗成果，進而爭取更多資金。 /// Abandoning the invasion of Tyrador IX was never an option for Cerberus, which needs to demonstrate metrics like "+20% hydralisk production efficiency in real-world scenarios" to earn out its funding agreements.=16455
Skin/Info/HydraliskMecha,擬態機甲刺蛇會對它的創造者造成重大的危險，於是他們選擇將爪子替換成在組裝過程中容易變鈍的刀刃。 /// Simulant hydralisks posed a significant risk to their creators, who chose to replace their claws with blades that could be easily dulled during the assembly process.=16456
Skin/Info/HydraliskNoxious,第一個在遺傳因子編入劇毒基因序的蟲族是雷獸，不過現在刺蛇也具有這種基因了。牠們繼承的不只是超強的毒性，連外觀也變得更加兇惡。 /// Though the noxious strain of zerg first emerged in ultralisks, it has since spread to include hydralisks as well. These specimens have inherited the strain's signature toxic characteristics, along with a more ferocious appearance.=16457
Skin/Info/HydraliskPrimal,蟲群的刺蛇很快就與原生蟲族族群融合，並保留了大部分原來的特徵。這顯然是牠們在演化上具有優勢的證據。 /// Swarm hydralisks were quickly integrated into primal zerg packs, where they kept many of their original traits. Clearly this is a testament to their evolutionary strength.=16458
Skin/Info/HydraliskRCZ,地獄犬刺蛇在沙塵暴期間突破了新迦南的防禦陣地，因為它們發亮的眼睛被誤認為是沙地越野車的頭燈。 /// Cerberus hydralisks penetrated New Canaan's defense perimeter during a dust storm, when their luminescent eyes were mistaken for dune buggy headlights.=16459
Skin/Info/HydraliskRemastered,刺蛇在早期演化階段擁有較細的脊刺，和五顏六色的頭冠，讓人印象深刻。 /// Earlier Hydralisk evolutions were characterized by slimmer spikes and an imposing, colorful crest.=16460
Skin/Info/HydraliskWebby,利維坦群落的刺蛇，一直保有變形成遁地獸所需的基因序。其實，構成遁地獸外觀的重要因子，是直接編寫在牠們的DNA裡面。 /// Hydralisks of the Leviathan Brood never lost the genetic sequences necessary to metamorphize into lurkers. Indeed, elements of the lurkers' appearance are woven directly into their DNA.=16461
Skin/Info/Immortal,受人尊崇的神族英雄過世後，遺骸會被移植到機械外骨骼的身體裡面。配有厚重護甲的不朽者是最忠誠的戰士。 /// When revered protoss heroes fall, their remains are transplanted into robotic exoskeletons. These heavily armed and shielded immortals are among the most loyal of warriors.=16462
Skin/Info/ImmortalAdun,對神族來說，沒有比自我犧牲更崇高的榮耀了。亞頓比誰都了解這點，也因此使得不朽者備受尊崇。 /// To the protoss, there is no greater honor than self-sacrifice. Adun understood this most of all, and it is in his name that the immortals are consecrated.=16463
Skin/Info/ImmortalGolden,末日之戰以後，某些死亡的聖堂武士被推舉放進古代不朽者的外骨骼當中，來彰顯他們試圖聯合紛亂神族的奉獻決心。 /// After the End War, some fallen templar elected to be placed into ancient immortal exoskeletons to show their dedication to the ideals that united the protoss in times of trouble.=16464
Skin/Info/ImmortalIhanrii,英勇戰死的伊翰利英雄會被放在有四足步行的機械石棺中保存。這些石棺會帶著遺體上戰場，並且裝備著巨大的火砲。 /// Ihan-rii heroes who die honorably are interred in four-legged robotic sarcophagi, which carry their remains to future battles, armed with tremendous cannons.=16465
Skin/Info/ImmortalPurifier,末日之戰之後，淨化者再次利用了死亡的不朽者軀體，讓他們成為純粹的機械戰士繼續運作。 /// In the aftermath of the End War, the Purifiers have been able to repurpose the shells of deceased immortals so they can continue functioning as purely robotic fighters.=16466
Skin/Info/ImmortalTaldarim,失敗蒙羞的塔達力姆戰士，為了尋求雪恥的機會，自願進入這台裝甲攻擊機械。他們唯一的願望就是為了大領主而死。 /// Encased within armored assault frames, Tal'darim warriors who are felled in failure and disgrace seek the opportunity to erase their shame. Their hope is to die well in service of their Highlord.=16467
Skin/Info/InfestationPit,感染巢內各式基因不斷競爭，培養出一系列的病原體、瘟疫帶原細胞，以及神經寄生物。感染蟲只會運用其中最有效率的產物。 /// The infestation pit is where genetics run wild, cultivating a vast array of diseases, plague cells, and neural parasites. Only the most efficient of these maladies are utilized by infestors. =16468
Skin/Info/InfestationPitMecha,擬態機甲AI發生錯誤時，首先會出現感染巢停止回應維修人員的跡象。 /// The first suggestion of a Simulant Project AI malfunction came when the infestor den stopped responding to its maintenance technicians.=16469
Skin/Info/InfestationPitRCZ,從妥善分佈於各地的感染巢所散布的神經寄生蟲，保證能讓碰巧進入由地獄犬所控制的熔岩通道探勘的人，在回報遭遇技術困難後從此消失無蹤。 /// Neural parasites from judiciously distributed infestation pits ensure that any adventurous spelunkers who happen across Cerberus-occupied lava tubes report technical difficulties, then are never heard from again.=16470
Skin/Info/Infestor,感染蟲正如其名，會感染牠們所到之處，擴大蟲族的影響範圍。牠們會將神經寄生蟲注入生物體內，把敵人轉化為沒有自我意志的蟲族士兵。 /// True to their name, infestors spread the Swarm's influence wherever they go. Organisms that are injected with an infestor's neural parasites become the zerg's mindless soldiers.=16471
Skin/Info/InfestorMecha,研究者原本創造了AI來複製感染蟲的神經寄生行為，但最後以失敗收場。正當研究者將感染蟲移出產線時，寄生行為的AI開始正常運作了… /// Researchers failed to create an AI that replicated the infestors' neural parasites. They were removing the infestors from production when, unexpectedly, the parasites' AI began functioning perfectly...=16472
Skin/Info/InfestorPrimal,感染蟲常常是原生蟲族族群中較大、較兇惡競爭者的目標，因此他們發展出了更厚的背部甲殼來保護自己。 /// As frequent targets of larger, more vicious competitors within their pack, primal infestors have evolved thickened plating along their back to protect themselves. =16473
Skin/Info/InfestorRCZ,為了回應企業客戶的需求，地獄犬在脆弱的感染蟲體內，植入了有支撐作用的鈦結構。 /// In response to feedback from an important corporate client, Cerberus implanted the notoriously fragile infestor with supportive titanium infrastructure.=16474
Skin/Info/InfestorWebby,作為殖體生物，構成司令塔的有機組織會有各式各樣不同功能。以利維坦感染蟲來舉例，牠們的基礎生物防禦構造就非常明顯。 /// As a colony creature, the organisms comprising the borboru matriarch took many different functions. Within Leviathan infestors, the defensive structures of the base creature are more pronounced.=16475
Skin/Info/LairMecha,當第一個擬態機甲孵化所突變成蟲穴時，內部審查機制隨即啟動，不過始終沒有發現應該為此負責的工程師。=16476
Skin/Info/Larva,這些低調，蛆一般的有機生物，在外層覆蓋著與外貌不相稱的強韌表皮，並且它有能力突變為各式各樣的恐怖蟲族。 /// This unassuming, maggot-like organism is covered in an deceptively strong hide and capable of mutating into any number of horrors.=16477
Skin/Info/LarvaMecha,讓擬態機甲能相互以視覺辨識，一直是打造在輪廓與行動方式上與本體極為相似的機甲幼蟲的理由。但這無法解釋擬態機甲計畫的科學家同時複製出壓扁蟲族幼蟲聲音的理由。 /// Visual recognition among Simulants is a common justification for creating mecha larvae that resemble their inspirations in silhouette and gait. This doesn't entirely explain why Simulant Project engineers felt it necessary to replicate the zerg larva's signature squelching noises.=16478
Skin/Info/LarvaRCZ,地獄犬投入大量精力，將獨特並且往往會引發痛苦的刺激物應用於他們孵育出的蟲族幼蟲的變態過程。 /// Cerberus invested a great deal of effort in mapping unique and often painful stimuli to the metamorphoses of the zerg larva in which they resulted.=16479
Skin/Info/Liberator,解放者的前身是地球聯合理事會的女武神，原始用途是用來對付空中的敵人。後來加裝了空對地武器，因此能夠清除敵方地面部隊。 /// Inspired by the UED’s valkyries, liberators were originally designed to combat aerial threats. The addition of air-to-ground artillery allows them to also deal with terrestrial enemy forces.=16480
Skin/Info/LiberatorCovertOps,運用近期在新型鋼鐵結構的改良，成功設計出更複雜的解放者裝甲，整個變形過程變得更加流暢，讓自治聯盟艦隊全都羨慕不已。 /// Recent improvements in neosteel construction have led to more complex plating designs that augment the liberator's transformation process, making it the envy of the Dominion fleet.=16481
Skin/Info/LiberatorJunker,米拉‧韓在一場戲劇性的牌局中贏得了所有解放者。但不幸的是，她不久之後又把他們輸給了另一個傭兵。 /// Mira Han won all of her liberators in just one incredibly dramatic poker game. Unfortunately, she lost them all to a rival mercenary just a short time later.=16482
Skin/Info/LiberatorSilver,泰拉朵九號星上的解放者配備了大量前方照明燈，大大提高了深夜在這個星球荒野巡邏時的視野能見度。 /// Liberators on Tyrador IX are equipped with numerous front-facing floodlights, increasing visibility during late-night patrols of the planet's stunning wilderness. =16483
Skin/Info/LiberatorUmojan,尤摩捷護衛軍只花了幾年，就自己開發出了知名的解放者。它的後方推進器經過完全重新設計，讓泰倫自治聯盟的工程團隊相當羨慕。 /// It only took a few years for the Umojan Protectorate to unleash its version of the famous Liberator. Its wholly re-imagined rear thrusters have become the envy of the Terran Dominion engineering team.=16484
Skin/Info/Lurker,在野生蟲巢裡面取得早已消失的基因序，讓遁地獸又重回蟲群行列。牠們會從敵人看不見的地底下發出攻擊，殲滅敵人。 /// The lurker was believed lost until its sequences were recovered from a feral hive cluster. Now, the lurkers serve the Swarm once again, annihilating their foes from the darkness below.=16485
Skin/Info/LurkerDen,遠觀之下，遁地獸穴似乎有更多部份是由白骨組成。直到接近觀察之後，才會發現表面的材質更像是有溝槽的厚皮革。 /// From a distance, the lurker den appears to be more bone than flesh. Upon closer inspection, the exterior is more like a grooved, thick leather.=16486
Skin/Info/LurkerDenMecha,打造尖端為奈米級的脊刺會產生大量的熱，而擬態機甲遁地獸穴會利用複雜的排氣網路和冷卻鰭片將熱發散出去。 /// The process of forging nano-tipped lurker spines generates tremendous heat, which the Simulant lurker den dissipates through a convoluted network of vents and cooling fins.=16487
Skin/Info/LurkerDenRCZ,地獄犬預先考慮到強化警戒以及在重要區域暗中佈局防禦的需求，於是大量生產遁地獸穴作為感染泰拉朵九號星的支援手段。 /// Anticipating the need for advance lookouts and a stealthy first line of defense, Cerberus produced an abundance of lurker dens to support their infestation of Tyrador IX.=16488
Skin/Info/LurkerMecha,大量的地底測試讓遁地獸機械化相當成功，但遁地獸尖刺的形狀需要重新設計，來應付鈍物撞擊的狀況。 /// Extensive subterranean tests yielded a capable mechanized lurker, aside from its spikes, which were reshaped to better perform under blunt force impact.=16489
Skin/Info/LurkerPrimal,某些原生刺蛇發生了突變，因此擁有更多遁地獸的特性。牠們目前的型態，比牠們的刺蛇始祖更像是遁地獸。 /// Some of the primal hydralisks developed mutations that led them to exhibit an increasing number of lurker characteristics. At this point, they resemble lurkers more than their hydralisk ancestors.=16490
Skin/Info/LurkerRCZ,一隊伊翰利神族出發前往泰拉朵九號星地表調查，因為地獄犬遁地獸先前埋伏在降落地點，造成了一場大屠殺。 /// A company of Ihan-rii protoss dispatched to investigate the surface of Tyrador IX were  massacred by Cerberus lurkers that happened to be burrowed at the landing site.=16491
Skin/Info/LurkerWebby,在利維坦群落中，刺蛇和遁地獸之間的先天關聯性是沒有其他蟲族生物能相比的。例如，牠們在變形後都會產生許多巨型脊刺。 /// The innate connection between hydralisks and lurkers within the Leviathan Brood is unparalleled among the Swarm. As such, their metamorphosis yields a considerable number of additional seismic spines.=16492
Skin/Info/Marauder,掠奪者是會走路的坦克，是自治聯盟專為穿透蟲族的堅硬蟲殼而打造的，不過他們所配備的手榴彈也很適合用來對付各種不同的目標。 /// Marauders are walking tanks, designed by the Dominion to combat the hardened carapaces of the zerg. Their grenades are effective against a variety of other targets, as well.=16493
Skin/Info/MarauderCovertOps,當自治聯盟特種部隊進行掠奪者裝備改進的意見調查時，其中之一的選項：給我們更大管的武器，獲得壓倒性的支持。武器研究人員欣然照辦。 /// When the Dominion Special Forces surveyed their personnel for improvements on marauder suits, only one dominated the conversation--bigger guns. The weapons researchers gladly obliged.=16494
Skin/Info/MarauderDeluxe,CMC-660重型戰鬥服近來的改進已經通過審核，接受自願者進行實地測試。幸好在部隊裡有許多掠奪者踴躍報名。 /// Recent improvements to the CMC-660 Heavy Combat Suit have been approved for voluntary field testing. Luckily, there are plenty of marauders in the corps who could use the credits.=16495
Skin/Info/MarauderJunker,身為米拉‧韓傭兵團最早的成員，這些掠奪者在傭兵界裡有著不尋常的忠誠…但也有可能只是米拉勒索他們的手法特別高明。 /// As some of the original members of Mira Han's crew, these marauders are unusually loyal compared to others in the mercenary world... or Han just has exceptionally compelling blackmail on them.=16496
Skin/Info/MarauderSilver,泰拉朵的掠奪者重量幾乎是自治聯盟標準版本的兩倍。工程師利用強化的液壓系統和更大的排氣量來彌補這個重量差異。 /// The Tyrador marauder weighs almost twice the Dominion standard. Engineers compensated for the extra density with enhanced hydraulics and exhaust.=16497
Skin/Info/MarauderUmojan,CMC戰鬥服做了一些特殊改進，讓這些掠奪者有強化夜視能力的選項，上半部的結構也經過大幅強化，來支撐更重的榴彈發射器。 /// Special advancements in CMC armor have given these marauders improved night vision options, as well as a heavily reinforced upper frame to support their weightier grenade launchers. =16498
Skin/Info/Marine,陸戰隊站在各個星區的最前線保衛著人類的世界。這裡面成員可能是罪犯、反抗軍或愛國分子，但不論是何種人，都已隨時做好戰鬥的準備。 /// Marines are the first line of defense for terran worlds across the sector. Comprised of convicts, rebels and patriots alike, they're always ready for a fight.=16499
Skin/Info/MarineCovertOps,一個人在自治聯盟特種部隊的服役時間也許不會太久，不過有一點是所有陸戰隊一致同意的：這份工作，讓你一刻不得閒。 /// One's service in the Dominion Special Forces may not always last long, but all marines can agree that there's never a dull moment on the job.=16500
Skin/Info/MarineJunker,那些在問傭兵的武器上為什麼要有刺刀的人，一定沒和他們一起參與過迴水酒吧大混戰的盛況。 /// Those who ask why these mercenaries carry bladed weapons have clearly never been in a backwater bar fight with them.=16501
Skin/Info/MarineRemastered,打過群落戰爭的陸戰隊都很懷念當時穿的裝甲，他們說那裝甲的舒適度現在的根本不能比。 /// Marines who fought in the Brood War often express nostalgia for the armor they wore back then, which they claim was significantly more comfortable.=16502
Skin/Info/MarineSilver,守衛泰拉朵渡假村和海灘的傭兵陸戰隊們，都是最有經驗的老兵。他們因為工作輕鬆，報酬優渥才被吸引到這裡來。 /// The mercenary marines who guard Tyrador's resorts and beaches are mostly grizzled veterans lured to the system by the promise of an easy gig and generous pay.=16503
Skin/Info/MarineUmojan,尤摩捷陸戰隊最近對於裝甲升級相當興奮，這項官方政策讓新兵的安全性和平均部署時間都獲得提升。不過，這有可能是為了將來的戰事做準備。 /// Umojan marines have recently seen exciting armor upgrades—officially to increase the safety and average deployment time of recruits, but possibly as preparation for a future conflict.=16504
Skin/Info/MarineXPR,儘管戰豬因為酗酒和在酒吧中的粗暴舉止而聲名狼藉，但他們卻是這個星區中最可靠的傭兵。 /// Despite their reputation as heavy drinkers and barroom brawlers, the War Pigs are some of the most dependable mercenaries in the sector.=16505
Skin/Info/Medivac,醫療艇兼具空投與醫療能力，在部署兵力的同時，還能縮短讓傷兵重回戰場的時間。 /// Functioning as both a dropship and a medical bay, medivacs allow for simultaneous troop deployment and triage, reducing the time required to redeploy wounded soldiers.=16506
Skin/Info/MedivacCovertOps,因應最近秘密行動部隊執勤時死亡率居高不下，自治聯盟領導階層同意編制大量醫療艇，好降低人員傷亡。 /// In response to considerable losses on a recent covert ops mission, the Dominion leadership has approved the use of medivacs on a greater number of assignments, with the goal of reducing casualties.=16507
Skin/Info/MedivacJunker,儘管傭兵們在戰鬥中通常只能自求多福，但偶爾當任務中有重要人士時，就會讓改裝的醫療艇出動。 /// Though mercenaries are used to taking their chances in battle, occasionally their missions involve important enough personnel to merit the use of one of these customized medivacs.=16508
Skin/Info/MedivacSilver,儘管擁有大量有經驗的飛行員，泰拉朵九號星的醫療艇，大多還是用來救援把遊艇弄到擱淺的有錢遊客。 /// Though staffed by experienced pilots, medivacs on Tyrador IX are mostly used to rescue wealthy tourists who wreck their luxury yachts on reefs in the emerald seas.=16509
Skin/Info/MedivacUmojan,尤摩捷護衛軍的醫療艇駕駛會接受大量醫護訓練，而士兵的壽命也因此達到平均值以上。 /// The extensive medical training of medivac pilots has been credited for the longer than average soldier lifespan in the Umojan Protectorate.=16510
Skin/Info/MissileTurret,儘管這些防禦性建築很容易故障，要對付空中來的攻擊還是相當有效率，而且還能偵測到躲藏的敵人。 /// Although these defensive structures are prone to breaking down, they effectively target aerial attackers and are capable of detecting hidden foes.=16511
Skin/Info/MissileTurretCovertOps,感謝特種部隊飛彈砲台簡約低調的設計，敵方船艦經常直到進入火線範圍當中，才能察覺它的存在。 /// Thanks to their sleek, low-profile design, special forces missile turrets often remain undetected until enemy ships are directly within their line of fire.=16512
Skin/Info/MissileTurretSilver,雖然伊翰利宣稱他們快速擴張虛空艦隊僅是為了儀式典禮之用，不過泰拉朵騎士還是大量部署飛彈砲塔以防萬一。 /// Though the Ihan-rii claim their fast-growing void ray fleet is intended for ceremonial purposes only, the Knights of Tyrador have begun a massive expansion of their missile turret network just in case.=16513
Skin/Info/Mothership,聖母艦是神族最強大的船艦，也是神族的星際指揮中心，只要一艘便能扭轉戰爭的局勢，同時也是黃金艦隊的旗艦。 /// The ultimate protoss vessel, Motherships serve as star-faring command centers that can single-handedly decide the outcome of a battle. They are the flagships of the Golden Armada.=16514
Skin/Info/MothershipGolden,即使聖母艦一直都維持著良好的狀態，但因為對聖堂武士黃金紀元的重新燃起的熱情，讓這些無價的船艦受到了新一波的支援和關注。 /// Though motherships have always been well-maintained, the revival of interest in the golden age of the Templar has resulted in a new wave of support and care for the priceless vessels.=16515
Skin/Info/MothershipIhanrii,伊翰利神族相信他們是薩爾納加的真正繼承者。他們也光榮地將這樣的信念，以符文寫在聖母艦上。 /// The Ihan-rii protoss believe themselves to be the only true descendants of the xel'naga, a message they convey proudly in the runes that adorn their motherships. =16516
Skin/Info/MothershipPurifier,為了能和聖堂武士平起平坐，淨化者開始打造自己的巨大聖母艦。 /// In the interest of presenting themselves as equals to the templar, the Purifiers have begun constructing their own massive motherships.=16517
Skin/Info/MothershipTaldarim,死亡艦隊的聖母艦，擁有足以操控戰局的威力。艦隊首領會如同王者一般，坐在名為聖母艦的王座之上，俯視敵軍的遍野屍骸。 /// The death fleet's motherships are equipped for total battlefield domination. Each one is a throne from which a Tal'darim fleet lord oversees the ruin of their foes.=16518
Skin/Info/Mutalisk,很少有什麼能像滿天飛螳一樣讓人怵目驚心。牠們在空中射出來的刃蟲共生體，能輕易讓敵人潰不成軍。 /// Few things are as terrifying as a sky blotted out by the wings of mutalisks. The glave wurm symbiotes they expel can easily ravage entire armies from above.=16519
Skin/Info/MutaliskMecha,儘管飛螳在一開始的重量測試中不太順利，但最後的成功讓擬態計畫獲得許多投資人的青睞，而其中有些人的動機十分可疑。 /// Though the mutalisk struggled with initial weight tests, its eventual success led to many new investors for the Simulant Project--some of them with ulterior motivations.=16520
Skin/Info/MutaliskPrimal,原生飛螳千變萬化，特別在翅膀與尾部的型態上更是多樣化。這個品系一般也擁有較黯淡的色彩，才能在各種不同的環境中隱藏自身的存在。 /// The primal mutalisks are everchanging, particularly when it comes to their wings and tails. This strain also features subdued coloring, allowing them to conceal themselves in many different environments.=16521
Skin/Info/MutaliskRCZ,一群地獄犬飛螳，就能讓泰拉朵九號星的新手維京戰機飛行員無法招架。對他們來說，從古代石製戰艦上出現的伊翰利神族，才是更難纏的對手。 /// Swarms of Cerberus mutalisks outmaneuvered the inexperienced viking pilots defending Tyrador IX, but they faced a tougher foe when the Ihan-rii protoss descended in ancient stone ships.=16522
Skin/Info/MutaliskWebby,飛螳是利維坦群落的恐怖武力。據說，在戰鬥中牠們協調一致有如單一個體，化為一個足以遮蔽天空的強悍集團。 /// Mutalisks comprise a vast number of the Leviathan Brood's forces. It is said that they function as one mind in battle, a singular unyielding mass that blacks out the sky.=16523
Skin/Info/Nexus,星核的作用是神族在銀河間連結幽能矩陣時的定位點，而近來的科技進步讓這些定位點有能力操縱空間和時間。 /// The nexus acts as an anchor allowing protoss to access the psionic matrix across the galaxy. Recent technological advancements have enabled these focal points to manipulate space and time itself.=16524
Skin/Info/NexusForged,塔達利姆在很久以前就改造了劫來的卡萊星核，讓建築風格更加狂野。在星核的頂端還安裝了超載的凱達林水晶，並利用幽能尖刺來限制它的力量。 /// Long ago, the Tal'darim adapted a captured Khalai nexus to maximize its architectural brutality, with a supercharged khaydarin crystal restrained by psionic prongs at its peak. =16525
Skin/Info/NexusIhanrii,即使伊翰利神族歡迎人類代表團進入殖民地參觀，但是他們發出詭異聲音和心跳聲響的壯麗石頭星核仍是禁區。 /// The Ihan-rii welcome terran delegations into their settlements, but never inside their imposing stone nexuses, from which strange ululations and distant heartbeat-sounds emanate.=16526
Skin/Info/NexusRemastered,群落戰爭後，達蘭神族投入大量相位工匠，以最新的時間扭曲科技來翻新舊型星核。 /// Following the Brood War, the Daelaam dedicated a great many phase-smiths to retrofit older nexuses with the latest chronal distortion technology.=16527
Skin/Info/NydusNetwork,蟲殖地網是從群集的地下通道進化而來，蟲后打算利用它來突擊與擴張。蟲殖地網經過化學物質刺激後會形成隧道，從地底穿越整個戰場。 /// Nydus networks evolved from a combination of nydus canals and the desire of broodmothers to surprise and swarm. When activated by chemical stimuli, nydus networks form tunnels underground across the battlefield.=16528
Skin/Info/NydusNetworkMecha,擬態機甲計畫解散之後，對研究機構進行了觀測儀掃描。結果發現未經許可的蟲殖地網形成了複雜的網路，以蜂窩狀分布在整個機構當中。 /// A scanner sweep conducted after the dissolution of the Simulant Project revealed a convoluted network of unauthorized nydus tunnels honeycombing the facility.=16529
Skin/Info/NydusNetworkRCZ,可遠程控制的蟲殖地網，能讓第二次入侵泰拉朵九號星的部隊同時出現在該星球各地，好為地獄犬的執行董事會帶來更大收益。 /// Remote-operated nydus networks ensure that the second invasion of Tyrador IX will come from everywhere at once, hopefully facilitating an outcome more palatable to the Cerberus executive board.=16530
Skin/Info/NydusWormMecha,儘管擬態機甲地下蠕蟲缺乏原本無法摧毀的肌肉與骨骼構造，但內部的氣味好聞多了。=16531
Skin/Info/Observer,觀察者具有複雜的感應裝置，能夠在短時間內取得大量資料。它們藉由收集到的重要情資，一次又一次的改變戰鬥局勢。 /// Complex sensor matrices allow observers to collect massive amounts of data in a short amount of time. The critical intelligence they provide has turned the tide of battle time and again.=16532
Skin/Info/ObserverGolden,舊型觀察者有不同的穩定器設定，但效果一樣好，而這些舊型觀察者也因此獲得了更多不同凡響的看法。有些相位工匠宣稱這樣的設定也會改善效能，但從未經過驗證。 /// Older observers had a different stabilizer configuration that, though equally effective, gave them with a more imposing aspect. Some phase-smiths claim that it also boosts performance, but this is unverified. =16533
Skin/Info/ObserverIhanrii,千年以來，伊翰利神族就一直部署著觀察者，來監控其他神族和蟲族的地盤。而且從來沒有被發現過。 /// For millennia, the Ihan-rii have deployed observers to monitor the other protoss sects and the zerg without concern of being discovered.=16534
Skin/Info/ObserverPurifier,淨化者勢力特別重視觀察者，菲尼克斯本人尤其如此。 /// Observers are greatly prized among the Purifier forces, having found especially strong favor with Fenix himself.=16535
Skin/Info/ObserverTaldarim,想要順利欺騙敵人和讓詭計生效，最重要的就是偵察。 最精明的飛升者會大量利用觀察員來偵察史雷因的敵人...以及其他飛升者。 /// Reconnaissance is essential for effective deception and subterfuge. The most cunning ascendants make extensive use of observers to spy on Slayn's enemies... and on each other.=16536
Skin/Info/Oracle,尼拉辛姆長久以來遭到艾爾放逐，也因此讓他們得以進行新科技的實驗。敏捷的先知艦就是這類實驗的成功案例。 /// During their long exile from Aiur, the Nerazim were free to experiment with new technologies. The agile oracle vessels are an excellent example of how fruitful this exploration could be.=16537
Skin/Info/OracleGolden,守舊派的聖堂武士還在借用尼拉辛姆的科技，只改變外觀來迎合他們的喜好。大族長芙菈森拒絕為此做法發表任何評論。 /// Templar traditionalists still borrow technology from the Nerazim, choosing to change only the aesthetics to suit their preferences. Matriarch Vorazun has declined to comment on this practice.=16538
Skin/Info/OracleIhanrii,伊翰利神族派出了先知艦，來調查靠近泰拉朵九號星軌道的巨獸級戰巡艦。 /// The Ihan-rii dispatched oracles to investigate the Behemoth-class battlecruiser that approached them in orbit around Tyrador IX.=16539
Skin/Info/OraclePurifier,儘管在初期遭遇到許多設計上的挑戰，聰明的相位工匠還是成功打造出了與尼拉辛姆先知艦十分相似的船艦。 /// Though initially beset by design challenges, clever phase-smiths have been able to engineer vessels similar to the Nerazim oracles.=16540
Skin/Info/OracleTaldarim,長久以來，塔達力姆一直著迷於尼拉辛姆的時間控制技術。偷來的先知艦會交由它們的新主人，也就是艦隊首領加以謹慎保護。 /// The Tal'darim have long coveted the Nerazim's temporal mastery. Stolen oracles are jealously guarded by the fleet lords who control them.=16541
Skin/Info/OrbitalCommandCovertOps,星軌指揮總部的最新科技掃描儀讓大多數的偵察任務變得不再必需，以往會被派去偵察敵情的低階陸戰隊都因此降低了不少工作壓力。=16542
Skin/Info/OverSeerWebby,利維坦群落的監察王蟲特別強化了偵查能力，牠們的鰭和觸鬚讓牠們能在大氣與水中以最小阻力移動。 /// Bred to specialize in reconnaissance, the fins and tendrils of the Leviathan overseers allow them to cut through both air and water with minimal effort.=16543
Skin/Info/Overlord,對蟲族的蟲巢來說，王蟲扮演十分重要的角色，除了散佈蟲苔，牠還能將蟲后以幽能發出的指令，傳達給進化程度較低的下等蟲族。 /// Overlords perform a critical function for a zerg hive cluster-- spreading creep and relaying psionic commands from a broodmother to the less evolved organisms she controls. =16544
Skin/Info/OverlordMecha,王蟲是擬態計畫早期的作品，它由一位實驗室的科學家所操控，讓它在行動中佔領重要又安全的位置。 /// An early creation during the course of the Simulant Project, the overlord is carefully controlled by a lab scientist, making it a critical safety point in the entire operation.=16545
Skin/Info/OverlordPrimal,像德哈卡之類的原生蟲族族群領袖，已經演化到不需要王蟲的階段。但有少數領袖還是保留了這個過去的特徵。 /// Some primal zerg pack leaders, like Dehaka, have evolved beyond the need of overlords, but a few of them nonetheless remain as vestiges of the past.=16546
Skin/Info/OverlordRCZ,即使是位於低可見度的環境中，地獄犬王蟲還是會利用熾熱的能量光束來標定位置，比方說泰拉朵九號星的濃霧河岸和沙塵暴。 /// Cerberus overlords use incandescent energy beacons to pinpoint positioning even in low-visibility conditions, like the dust storms and fog banks common on Tyrador IX.=16547
Skin/Info/OverlordWebby,王蟲負責操控蟲族的低階物種。由於牠們之間的聯繫從不間斷，因此利維坦群落的王蟲身上，會浮現出受牠們操控的蟲族基因突變特徵。 /// Overlords exert control over the minions of the zerg. As a result of their constant connection, the Leviathan Brood's overlords reflect the genetic mutations of the creatures beneath them.=16548
Skin/Info/OverlordXPR,由於王蟲需要同時支援不同的蟲族品系，因此有時候會在牠們身上看到為順應需求而做出的自發性突變，以增進自身的工作效率。 /// Due to their need to support many different strains of zerg at once, overlords can sometimes exhibit spontaneous adaptive mutations in an attempt to improve their own efficiency.=16549
Skin/Info/Overseer,監察王蟲是從王蟲進化而成，主要工作是進行偵查，以及四處探測可能隱藏起來的敵人。 /// Evolved from the overlord, the overseer focuses its eyes towards scouting and revealing the presence of hidden enemies, wherever they may lurk.=16550
Skin/Info/OverseerMecha,王蟲眼睛的有機構造無法完整複製出來，於是首席工程師將其替換為可以取代大部分功能的偵測器，唯一不能取代的是有機構造之美。 /// Unable to fully replicate the organic structure behind the overseer's eyes, the head engineer replaced them with detection sensors that fulfill largely the same purpose—aside from the aesthetics. =16551
Skin/Info/OverseerPrimal,監察王蟲在原生蟲族中是相當稀有的物種，非常少見。和蟲群中的同類一樣，原生監察王蟲是從原生王蟲演化而來，擁有特別敏銳的感官。 /// One of the rarest species of primal zerg, the overseers are seldom seen. Like their Swarm counterparts, they evolved from primal overlords and possess especially keen senses.=16552
Skin/Info/OverseerRCZ,地獄犬監察王蟲的偵測技術，是由魯道福‧薩索里安博士所開發完成。它可以替半徑20公里以內的所有匿蹤目標進行精確的三角定位。 /// The Cerberus overseer's void sensor technology was developed by one Dr. Rudolfo Subsourian. It can triangulate the exact position of a cloaking effect within 20 kilometers.=16553
Skin/Info/Phoenix,鳳凰戰機主要是作為空戰騷擾之用，以高速與迴避能力而著稱。就算敵方有數量優勢，也能藉由暫時讓敵人無法行動來與之抗衡。 /// Designed for aerial harassment, phoenixes are known for their unmatched speed and maneuverability. A single strike force can keep an enemy army pinned down even when vastly outnumbered.=16554
Skin/Info/PhoenixGolden,席拉克部族使用的鳳凰戰機，與早期仲裁者偏好使用的護衛機相當類似。儘管有些人覺得那是充滿爭議的象徵，但也有其他人讚嘆其美麗的工藝。 /// The Shelak tribe has commissioned phoenixes that resemble the escort ships favored by early judicators. Though some see them as controversial symbols, others praise the beautiful craftsmanship.=16555
Skin/Info/PhoenixIhanrii,儘管伊翰利鳳凰戰機的石質構造，沒有賦予它更好的操縱性和更高的速度。但在迫降的時候，就能展現出這材質堅固的特性了。 /// Though the Ihan-rii phoenix's stone construction doesn't inhibit its maneuverability or top speed, it does make it a more formidable missile when crash-landing.=16556
Skin/Info/PhoenixPurifier,淨化者不需要使用幻影戰機的相位科技，他們會部署機械化的鳳凰戰機進行防空任務。 /// When the Purifiers do not need the phasing technology of the mirages, they will deploy robotic phoenixes to defend their skies.=16557
Skin/Info/PhoenixTaldarim,塔達力姆重視壓倒性的威力，但是他們也明白快速又致命的武器價值何在，因此他們有好好保養從聖堂武士那邊偷來的大批鳳凰戰機。 /// There is a time for overwhelming force, and a time to be swift and deadly. The Tal'darim recognize the value in the latter, which is why they maintain a fleet of phoenixes stolen from the Templar.=16558
Skin/Info/PhotonCannon,神族相位工匠可以把他們的防禦性建築加上強大的反物質加農砲，以及先進的偵測方式。但將躍傳科技整合進光子加農砲的實驗則大多失敗了 /// Protoss phase-smiths can outfit their defensive structures with powerful antimatter cannons and advanced detection measures. Experiments integrating photon cannons with warp technology widely ended in failure.=16559
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonForged,即使塔達利姆承諾要遵守嚴格的戰士教條，但這並不影響他們秘密建造光子加農砲，並在敵人的礦區降下毀滅之雨的行為。 /// Despite their commitment to a rigid warrior code, the Tal'darim have no problem building photon cannons in secret to rain devastation on their enemies' mineral lines. =16560
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonIhanrii,伊翰利光子加農砲配備的相位阻斷器，具有獨特的翼型特徵，其設計靈感來自於原先稱霸泰拉朵九號星天空的雄偉猛禽，這種生物後來被早期的人類移民撲殺殆盡。 /// The phase disruptor housing of the Ihan-rii photon cannon features a distinctive wing-shape inspired by a majestic avian creature that once ruled Tyrador IX's skies, at least until it was hunted to extinction by early terran settlers.=16561
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonTaldarim,=16562
Skin/Info/PlanetaryFortressCovertOps,最新的行星要塞配備了強大的火力，錨爪也因此必須要深入地下三倍的距離，才能避免每次開火時要塞都因此滑動。=16563
Skin/Info/Probe,探測機是卡萊工匠設計用來構築神族殖民地的核心無人機，在能量方面能夠自給自足，並且能夠啟動躍傳程序，把已經預先組建完成的重要建築傳送到指定地點。 /// Designed by the Khalai to lay the foundation for protoss settlements, probes are self-sufficient drones that can enable and initiate the warp-in of critical prefabricated structures.=16564
Skin/Info/ProbeBlizzcon17,有群專門撿拾可用資源的人，在被摧毀的神族殖民地中，回收這些探測機，然後再以人類的工程技術和零件來改裝。運用在它們身上的，可是一種獨特的技術。 /// These probes were salvaged from a destroyed protoss colony by members of a junker gang, who then retrofitted them with terran engines and accessories. If nothing else, their craftsmanship is unique.=16565
Skin/Info/ProbeGolden,有一些探測機活到了衝突紀元之後。在當時即使是最簡單的神族機械，也有精緻而奢華的外觀。 /// A small number of probes have survived since the period following the Aeon of Strife, where even the simplest of protoss robotics had a refined and luxurious appearance.=16566
Skin/Info/ProbeIhanrii,伊翰利探測機在太空深處長期休眠時，會變形為立方體方便收納。 /// When not in use during long periods of deep-space hibernation, Ihan-rii probes fold into perfect cubes for compact storage.=16567
Skin/Info/ProbePurifier,探測機是效率與勤勉的最佳模範。它們以增強的協定運作，與淨化者資料網路完整整合在一起。 /// These probes are models of efficiency and diligence. They operate on enhanced protocols for full integration with the Purifier data web.=16568
Skin/Info/ProbeRemastered,來自大戰年代的探測機擁有更長的穩流飛翼。但相位工匠很快就發現，這樣的設計會在大規模的激烈戰鬥中產生麻煩。 /// Probes from the Great War era had longer stabilizer fins, but phase-smiths quickly learned that they could become a liability in the midst of a widescale, vicious battle.=16569
Skin/Info/ProbeTaldarim,達蘭利用探測機預先標定出資源，好降低採集時對生態環境造成的影響。不過塔達力姆才不管這些。 /// Probes utilized by the Daelaam are calibrated to gather resources with as little ecological impact as possible. The Tal'darim have no use for such precautions.=16570
Skin/Info/Pylon,對達蘭神族來說，重建家園的首要工作就是建立全新的幽能矩陣。每座水晶塔當中所含的凱達林水晶，讓神族能妥善運用矩陣的能量。 /// Forging a new psionic matrix has been vital to the Daelaam's reconstruction efforts. The khaydarin crystal within each pylon allows the protoss to tap into the matrix's energy.=16571
Skin/Info/PylonForged,每個塔達利姆水晶塔都充滿幽能，足以供應16個傳送門所需的能量。 /// Each Tal'darim pylon crackles with enough psionic energy to power sixteen gateways.=16572
Skin/Info/PylonIhanrii,由伊翰利神族重新開拓的泰拉朵九號星各個區域，隨處都能看見水晶塔所散發出來的空靈光芒，即使在軌道上也清晰可見。 /// Across areas of Tyrador IX recolonized by the Ihan-rii, proliferating fields of luminescent pylons produce an ethereal glow visible from orbit.=16573
Skin/Info/PylonTaldarim,=16574
Skin/Info/PylonXPR,科夏寇曾經是艾爾的首善之都。這座城市雄偉壯麗，華美的程度難以言喻。就連水晶塔這最簡單的建築都有著璀璨的裝飾。 /// Kor-shakal was once the crown jewel of Aiur, a city so resplendent that it defied description. Even structures as simple as its pylons were adorned in shining decorations.=16575
Skin/Info/Queen,蟲后，是凱莉根為了守護蟲族的未來而創造出來的新種后蟲，具有獨立思考與分析的能力，在不斷進化的蟲族中擔任群落首領的角色。 /// To safeguard the future of the Swarm, Kerrigan orchestrated the creation a new breed of queens. Capable of independent thought and analysis, they serve as the hive masters of an ever-evolving Swarm.=16576
Skin/Info/QueenMecha,華麗的后蟲是完成量產的機型中第一個失蹤的。而擬態計畫的經理們並不想讓大眾發現他們的行蹤，只能盡可能低調地調查事件始末。 /// The magnificent queen was the first completed production model to go missing. Loath to publicly reveal their activities, the Simulant Project managers investigated the matter as quietly as possible.=16577
Skin/Info/QueenPrimal,原生族群中一切只看力量，所以相較於傳統的群落，后蟲在原生族群中的地位更加特殊，很少會大量出現。 /// Primal packs are ruled by strength alone, therefore queens occupy a much different position within them versus more traditional broods, and are rarely present in great numbers.=16578
Skin/Info/QueenRCZ,后蟲把守著地獄犬的後方，它擁有鈦金屬鍛造刀和脊刺噴射發射器，還有連神經系統重建都無法消滅的雌性直覺。 /// Queens defend the Cerberus backline with forged titanium blades, jet-powered spine launchers, and matronly instincts even a neurological overhaul couldn't eliminate entirely. =16579
Skin/Info/QueenWebby,利維坦群落中，就連后蟲都兇殘無比。任何膽敢當面挑釁后蟲的愚蠢生物，很快就會被無數脊刺射穿全身。 /// Even the queens of the Leviathan Brood are incredibly vicious and hostile. Any creatures foolish enough to approach their clutch with hostile intent find themselves quickly impaled by many spines.=16580
Skin/Info/Ravager,經過數年基因調整，從蟑螂進化而成的劫毀蟲，能夠迅速產生大量酸蝕體液，然後噴向敵人。 /// Evolved from roaches after years of genetic modification, ravagers possess the ability to quickly generate massive quantities of corrosive bile and then expel them at their foes.=16581
Skin/Info/RavagerBone,蟲族甲殼鈣化之後會更加堅硬，成為更有效的裝甲。阿巴瑟非常喜愛這個帶有威嚇意味的外觀。 /// Calcification of zerg carapaces into a hardened shell makes for effective armor. Abathur considers the intimidation factor a welcome bonus.=16582
Skin/Info/RavagerMecha,劫毀蟲的擬態機甲在電漿火焰容器的周圍安裝了吸熱隔板，來取代原本的尖刺。如此一來，機甲的其他部分才不會受到損害。 /// Simulant ravagers have been fitted with heat-absorbent panels instead of spikes around their plasma fire receptacles to prevent damage to the rest of the model. =16583
Skin/Info/RavagerPrimal,原生劫毀蟲既難以掌控又嗜血，牠們會吞食不夠強壯，無法反擊的幼體。在這樣的侵略性之下，我們很難預期這個物種能夠興盛多久。 /// Defiant and bloodthirsty, the primal ravagers will devour their own young if they are not strong enough to fight back. Given this level of aggression, it is uncertain how long their species will thrive.=16584
Skin/Info/RavagerRCZ,地獄犬劫毀蟲背部的電漿脊刺會將牠發射的酸蝕體液加熱至高溫狀態。在泰拉朵九號星上，這些劫毀蟲把人類防禦措施打出了一個大缺口。 /// The plasma spines on the Cerberus ravager's back superheat the corrosive bile it fires. On Tyrador IX, these ravagers punched massive holes in the terran defense.=16585
Skin/Info/RavagerWebby,完全進化後的劫毀蟲，身形巨大，外型恐怖令人不敢直視。利維坦群落的劫毀蟲全身覆滿絲網、有如夢魘，恐怖程度更甚其他群落。 /// Monstrous and towering, the fully evolved ravager is a terrifying sight to behold. The webbed nightmares deployed by the Leviathan Brood are only more so.=16586
Skin/Info/Raven,渡鴉具備一流的偵測能力與防禦能力，可以建造砲塔、部署防禦無人機，甚至朝敵軍發射飛彈。如果這樣還不夠，跟你說，渡鴉的花費比前代機種還要便宜。 /// Invaluable for surveillance and defense, the raven can construct a turret, build a defense drone, or fire missiles at enemy forces. If this wasn't enough, it's also more cost effective than its predecessors.=16587
Skin/Info/RavenCovertOps,這台可是自治聯盟特種部隊的引以為傲的空中單位。據說，就連位於地下兩公里的兩名凱爾莫瑞亞礦工在交談，它都能偵測到，可謂巧奪天工的設計。 /// The pride of the Dominion Special Forces, this exquisitely designed craft is rumored to be able to detect Kel-Morian miners whispering to each other two kilometers underground.=16588
Skin/Info/RavenJunker,傭兵們通常不太使用高科技的監視用空中單位，但在生鏽的外殼和脫落的烤漆之下，這些渡鴉表現得和自治聯盟的單位一樣好。 /// Highly advanced surveillance craft aren't the most popular among mercenaries, but beneath the rust and cracking paint, these ravens are as good as any others in the Dominion.=16589
Skin/Info/RavenSilver,正當地獄犬蟲族擊潰泰拉朵九號星的防衛者時，一架在高處的渡鴉，偵測到了一隊石製艦隊在這個星球的重力井當中。 /// As the Cerberus zerg threatened to overwhelm Tyrador IX's defenders, a high-altitude raven detected a fleet of strange stone ships in the planet's gravity well.=16590
Skin/Info/RavenUmojan,這些渡鴉是精密科技的結晶，配備了我們所知不多的人工智慧系統，遠超過了自治聯盟工程師以往認可的水準。 /// The height of sophistication, these ravens are equipped with a little-understood artificial intelligence system that exceeds anything that Dominion engineers would ever approve.=16591
Skin/Info/Reactor,在研究神族控制過的地區時，人類科學家有了突破性的發展，讓指揮官有能力使生產能力提高到兩倍。 /// While researching protoss containment fields, terran scientists made a breakthrough that allowed commanders to double their production capacity.=16592
Skin/Info/ReactorCovertOps,最先進的反應爐能量輸出足以和雷神引擎匹敵，而可靠性只略微降低。 /// Cutting-edge reactors now rival the energy output of thor engines, with only marginally reduced reliability.=16593
Skin/Info/ReactorSilver,在泰拉朵九號星五星級渡假勝地的總統套房，全都配有軍用級反應爐，以因應富有客人的複雜娛樂電子裝置和控制裝置需求。 /// Presidential suites in Tyrador IX's five-star resorts each come with their own military-grade reactor, in recognition of the complex recreational electronics and cybernetics the wealthiest guests tend to bring along.=16594
Skin/Info/Reaper,不願意重新社會化的人，在通過訓練之後，就會成為死神。這群突擊兵具有高度攻擊性，能夠執行高風險任務，不過生存率相當低。 /// Recruits who prove resistant to resocialization are trained as Reapers. Hyper-aggressive and prone to taking risks, these shock troopers seldom survive a full tour of duty.=16595
Skin/Info/ReaperCovertOps,在最近的一連串重組行動中，已經不再強迫死神使用危險的藥劑來提高作戰表現了。目前招募新人時，則是偏好天生不可預測性極高的人選。 /// In the wake of recent reforms, reapers are no longer forced to use dangerous stimulants to increase their performance. The recruiting process now favors candidates who are naturally unpredictable.=16596
Skin/Info/ReaperJunker,米拉掠奪者手下從來不缺死神。他們喜歡用回收來的各式特殊護甲來凸顯自己，特別是那顆莫霍克頭。 /// There's never a shortage of reapers among Mira's Marauders. They tend to outdo themselves scrapping together their distinctive armor—particularly the mohawks.=16597
Skin/Info/ReaperSilver,泰拉朵九號星上，有個死神為了躲開新迦南附近的沙塵暴決定繞路，卻正巧看見了地獄犬蟲族的入侵部隊。 /// On Tyrador IX, an invasion force of Cerberus zerg was spotted by a reaper taking the long way home to avoid a dust storm near New Canaan.=16598
Skin/Info/ReaperUmojan,多年以來，尤摩捷護衛軍都能挑選出擁有適合心理素質的人選，來打造他們自己的死神部隊，而結果也相當不錯。 /// Over the course of many years, the Umojan Protectorate was able to psychologically profile enough suitable candidates to create their own Reaper Corps with surprisingly good results.=16599
Skin/Info/Refinery,瓦斯精煉廠的設計是用來提煉原始高能瓦斯，並將其包裝在圓筒中，方便太空工程車運輸。 /// The refinery is designed to extract raw vespene gas and package it into a handy cylinder, which is easily transportable by space construction vehicles.=16600
Skin/Info/RefineryCovertOps,特種部隊的精煉廠提煉高能瓦斯的速度和一般的機型一樣快，但噪音降低了75%。 /// The special forces refinery harvests vespene just as fast as the regulation model, but produces 75% less noise.=16601
Skin/Info/RefinerySilver,根據泰拉朵九號星瓦斯精煉廠的報告，在遭受地獄犬攻擊後，雖然他們費盡心血進行維修，但是高能瓦斯的產量仍低於平均水準，彷彿儲存在地底的瓦斯全都轉向流到其他地方去了。 /// Despite diligent maintenance, Tyrador IX's refineries have reported lower-than-average vespene yields since the Cerberus attack, as if the underground reservoirs they tap have been diverted.=16602
Skin/Info/Roach,刀鋒女皇當初精心挑選蟑螂這種生物，將牠們納入蟲群。牠們具有可觀的組織再生能力並且能噴出酸性毒液，使牠們不僅生存力高，也非常致命。 /// Roaches were hand-selected by the Queen of Blades for assimilation into the Swarm. Their impressive tissue regeneration and acidic venom make them resilient as well as deadly.=16603
Skin/Info/RoachDeluxe,在札迦拉的命令之下，阿巴瑟繼續改良蟲族的基因組，要讓蟲族成為完美的生物。蟑螂與生俱來的再生能力，使牠們成為這種研究的理想對象。 /// Under Zagara's orders, Abathur has continued to manipulate the zerg genome in search of perfection. The roach's innate regenerative abilities make it the ideal candidate for such a pursuit.=16604
Skin/Info/RoachMecha,這些機械安裝了精緻的自我修理系統來複製蟑螂強大的治療能力，同時還能對抗內部儲存的強酸所帶來的構造損害。 /// These machines have been outfitted with a sophisticated self-repair system to replicate the roach's incredible healing ability, while also combatting structural damage from its acid reserves.=16605
Skin/Info/RoachPrimal,蟑螂是最先被吸收進澤瑞斯原生族群的物種之一。牠們發展出突變成原生火蟑螂和原生守護者的能力。 /// Roaches were among the first to be absorbed into primal packs on Zerus, where they developed the capability to mutate into primal igniters and primal guardians.=16606
Skin/Info/RoachRCZ,地獄犬科學家使用奈米碳纖維材質來強化蟑螂那原本就很堅韌的裝甲。而為了強化牠的攻擊力，又加裝了鑄造的鈦金屬刀。 /// Cerberus scientists bulwarked the roach's already-impressive armor with a carbon fiber nanoweave. Forged titanium blades were added to aid its offensive capabilities as well.=16607
Skin/Info/RoachWarren,生產蟑螂和劫毀蟲需要潮濕陰暗的環境。以有機生物質建造的蟑螂繁殖場，正好可以精確地複製出這種環境。 /// Generating roaches and ravagers requires humid, dark conditions. The roach warren is a perfectly constructed biological organ that replicates this environment precisely.=16608
Skin/Info/RoachWarrenMecha,蟑螂繁殖場需要這種先進的聚合合金做為包覆材料，才能抵擋其內部產生的強酸腐蝕性。 /// Significant polymer-alloy innovations were necessary to develop a housing for the Simulant roach warren that would withstand the turmoil of its internal acid generation.=16609
Skin/Info/RoachWarrenRCZ,像蟑螂繁殖場這種經過地獄犬改造的蟲族建築，會產生具有自我複製能力的藍圖，以此讓幼蟲成長時，能夠同步安裝遠端控制裝置。 /// Cerberus adaptations of zerg structures like the roach warren produce self-replicating blueprints for remote control equipment to be installed synchronous with larval development.=16610
Skin/Info/RoachWebby,從贊塔蛞蝓衍生出來的蟑螂，展現出驚人的適應潛能。利維坦群落的蟑螂長期暴露在高能瓦斯中，因此更具攻擊性。 /// Much like the zantar slugs they are derived from, roaches display an incredible potential for adaptation. Vespene exposure has been known to cause those of Leviathan Brood to grow incredibly aggressive.=16611
Skin/Info/RoboticsBay,機械研究所是重要的卡萊相位工匠最主要的研發設施。 /// The robotics bay serves as the primary research and development facility of the khalai's foremost phase-smiths.=16612
Skin/Info/RoboticsBayForged,黑暗且不祥的機械爪飄出了一陣陣的態化氫煙霧，這就是塔達力姆機械研究所。 /// Terrazine fumes leak from the dark, ominous claw that is the Tal'darim robotics bay.=16613
Skin/Info/RoboticsBayIhanrii,伊翰利機械研究所的分段組裝手臂能靈活地快速移動，讓人忘記這些是以石頭構成的。 /// The segmented assembly arms of the Ihan-rii robotics bay move with flexibility and speed that belie their stone composition.=16614
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacility,相位工匠需要昂貴的設施來躍傳巨大的自走戰爭單位，譬如說巨像。 /// Phase-smiths require expansive facilities to warp in enormous war automatons, such as the colossus.=16615
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacilityForged,厚實的裝甲外殼，加上強化的重型錨爪，讓塔達利姆機械製造廠有著嚇人的外貌。 /// An armored housing and heavy-duty, reinforced anchors give the Tal'darim robotics facility an intimidating profile.=16616
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacilityIhanrii,當伊翰利被問及近期大量建造的機械製造廠，他們不願正面回應。這些設施不分日夜、無時無刻都在製造重型武裝單位。 /// The Ihan-rii have been evasive when questioned about the frenzied activity of their newly constructed robotics facilities, which churn out heavily armed units at all hours of the day and night.=16617
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacilityTaldarim,=16618
Skin/Info/RoboticsSupportBayTaldarim,=16619
Skin/Info/SCV,在人類星球，建築和維修工作都交由T280太空工程車來執行。由於其多功能性質與極為可靠的工作能力，讓太空工程車成為工業方面的貴重工具。 /// The T-280 SCV is a staple of construction and repair across all terran worlds. A versatile and reliable workhorse, the Space Construction Vehicle is an invaluable industrial tool.=16620
Skin/Info/SCVBlizzcon17,就算是專門回收可用物資的人，也需要採集晶礦或高能瓦斯。只是他們喜歡擺出威嚇他人的姿態。 /// Even junker gangs have to collect minerals and vespene gas, though they try to do so in an intimidating style.=16621
Skin/Info/SCVCovertOps,由於秘密任務的獨特需求，就連太空工程車也都換上最新式的裝備，像是出力更強的夾子，以及新式雷射開採鉗。 /// Due to the unique demands of covert missions, even the SCVs must be outfitted with all of the latest upgrades, including a stronger utility clamp and new laser extraction claw.=16622
Skin/Info/SCVJunker,有一部分太空工程車駕駛受不了自治聯盟的低薪高工時，選擇往傭兵的方向發展。而顯然大多數人都很滿意這個選擇。 /// Tired of low pay and long hours in the Dominion, some SCV pilots choose to go the mercenary route. It's safe to say that most of them never look back.=16623
Skin/Info/SCVRemastered,在群落戰爭期間，T280太空工程車外觀相當不同，不僅不那麼笨重，工作夾比較小，而且據說還有隱藏式的杯架。 /// T-280 SCVs dating back before the Brood War featured a different, less bulky appearance with smaller utility clamps and, purportedly, secret cup holders.=16624
Skin/Info/SCVSilver,泰拉朵騎士為他們的行星防禦部隊選擇護甲時，使用了鉑銥合金來盡量凸顯光澤，並且抵抗刮傷。 /// When selecting armor for their planetary defense force, the Knights of Tyrador chose a platinum-iridium alloy to maximize gleam and scratchproofing.=16625
Skin/Info/SCVUmojan,簡單、堅固、實用。這些太空工程車配備了雷射鑽洞機，即使是最緻密的礦物，也能輕鬆劃開一道完美的刻痕。 /// Simple, sturdy, and reliable, these SCVs feature laser drills that make perfectly clean cuts on even the densest minerals.=16626
Skin/Info/SensorTower,感應塔結合電磁學和熱學科技，加上都卜勒分析以及地震感知器，讓人員可以透過最終輸出的多重光譜分析資料，輕易地偵測到敵人。 /// Using a combination of electromagnetic and thermal technology alongside Doppler analysis and seismic sensors, the multispectrum output of these towers causes them to be easily detectable by enemies.=16627
Skin/Info/SensorTowerCovertOps,由於一隻大蛾觸發了錯誤警報，導致一座瑪而‧薩拉貿易站因此氣化，因此，新一批的感應塔將感知能力稍微調低了一些。 /// After a false alarm triggered by an overlarge moth led to the vaporization of a Mar Sara trading post, the new line of sensor towers had its perceptive power dialed back slightly.=16628
Skin/Info/SensorTowerSilver,在地獄犬蟲族攻擊沒多久，泰拉朵感應塔開始偵測到奇怪的震波模式，可是這些震動是起因於伊翰利神族的大規模建設工作。 /// Soon after the Cerberus zerg attacked, Tyrador sensor towers began detecting strange seismic patterns, but these were attributed to widespread Ihan-rii construction efforts.=16629
Skin/Info/Sentry,哨衛是一種戰鬥無人機，配有力場產生器，以及全像投影裝置，在戰場上提供支援，保護數量日益減少的神族戰士。 /// Robotic combat drones outfitted with force field generators and holo-projectors, sentries were developed in order to support and protect the dwindling numbers of protoss warriors.=16630
Skin/Info/SentryGolden,在神族機械中並沒有明顯與哨衛對應的早期版本，不過充滿想像力的相位工匠重新設計了哨衛，讓它與其他有長遠歷史的機械有一致的風格。 /// Sentries themselves have no clear predecessors within protoss robotics, but imaginative phase-smiths have redesigned them to complement other vessels with longer histories.=16631
Skin/Info/SentryIhanrii,很久以前，伊翰利神族曾經駕馭了一種強大的薩爾納加神器，名為「星雲之井」，並用來提供哨衛能量。但如今這種神器所剩無幾。 /// Long ago, the Ihan-rii protoss harnessed volatile xel'naga artifacts known as "nebula wells" to power their sentries. Few of these artifacts remain.=16632
Skin/Info/SentryPurifier,儘管淨化者大軍通常偏好使用強化者，但還是有哨衛會出現在他們的行列之中。這些無人駕駛的機械已經整合到淨化者的資料網路中，不需要仰賴幽能。 /// Though Purifier armies often prefer energizers, some sentries are present within their ranks. These drones have been integrated into the Purifier data web rather than relying on psionic energy.=16633
Skin/Info/SentryTaldarim,落入塔達力姆手中的哨衛，大多被改裝成浩劫者了，僅有少數維持原本樣貌。因此產生多種不同的機械支援單位，卻也造成部隊編制上的困擾。 /// While most sentries seized by the Tal'darim are refitted into havocs, some are left mostly unchanged. This results in a varied array of robotic support and a certain degree of misdirection.=16634
Skin/Info/ShieldBattery,由於護盾恢復科技的進展，護盾充能器在群落戰爭期間遭到大量棄用...。但在改善生產率以及容量之後，某些陣營開始重新運用這項科技。 /// Shield batteries were largely abandoned in the wake of the Brood War due to advancements in shield regeneration. After improvements were made to its throughput and capacity, some factions reintegrated the technology.=16635
Skin/Info/ShieldBatteryForged,儘管塔達利姆可以使用護盾充能器，但他們基本上還是會將資源投資在更具侵略性的目標上。 /// Though the Tal'darim have access to shield batteries, they typically prefer to invest their resources in more aggressive pursuits.=16636
Skin/Info/ShieldBatteryIhanrii,伊翰利神族為了將自己建設大量護盾充能器防禦網路和強大常備軍的行為合理化，他們提出的理由是「為防禦不受控制的野生生物攻擊行為」。 /// To justify their construction of a vast shield battery defense network and a powerful standing army, the Ihan-rii cite "defense against unruly wildlife."=16637
Skin/Info/SiegeTank,機動性較強的庫希歐攻城坦克是弧光攻城坦克的後繼機，在泛用性和威力方面都更為優秀。戰地指揮官說這型坦克攻守皆備。 /// A modern replacement for the aging Arclite model, Crucio siege tanks are both versatile and heavy hitting. Battlefield commanders swear by them for both offense and defense.=16638
Skin/Info/SiegeTankCovertOps,雖然庫希歐攻城坦克是廣大自治聯盟指揮官愛用的單位，不過這種坦克已經沒有改良空間了。強化裝甲和威力強大的加農砲讓這型坦克的作戰效率更加傑出。 /// Though the Crucio has long been popular among the Dominion commanders, it was not without room for improvement. Reinforced plating and heftier cannons make this version even more formidable.=16639
Skin/Info/SiegeTankJunker,這些可怕的坦克經過大量改造，已經和原本的庫希歐攻城坦克完全不一樣了。它們在有突發的破壞需求時，表現得比原始型號好多了。 /// These beastly tanks are so heavily modified that they hardly resemble their original Crucio models. They fare much better than their predecessors when it comes to impromptu demolition matches.=16640
Skin/Info/SiegeTankMerc,人類傭兵不斷在調整他們的機械載具，例如讓引擎最佳化來提高速度，加強控制介面的多功能性，或是以外觀塗裝來威嚇敵人。 /// Terran mercenaries can always find ways to customize their vehicles, whether it's adding speed through engine optimization, versatility in control configurations, or cosmetic changes to intimidate enemies. =16641
Skin/Info/SiegeTankSilver,高層重要人士來訪泰拉朵時，一隊外觀完美無瑕的鉑合金攻城坦克會連發十響禮炮，迎接他們到來。 /// Dignitaries above a certain rank are greeted upon their arrival in Tyrador with a ten-round salute from a company of spotless platinum-alloy siege tanks. =16642
Skin/Info/SiegeTankUmojan,尤摩捷帝國坦克是最近才開發出來的產品，但它在早期的戰鬥測試中已經打敗了自治聯盟的對應單位，而這正是他們的目的。 /// Umojan Imperio tanks are a recent invention that has already rivaled their Dominion counterparts in early combat tests—which was precisely their goal.=16643
Skin/Info/SpawningPool,孵化池的大型腔室是用來存放異化蟲之外的突變種品系的，包括無法飛行的后蟲。 /// The spawning pool's large chambers have grown to house the genetic mutations for organisms other than the zergling, including a flightless variant of the queen.=16644
Skin/Info/SpawningPoolMecha,聚合物鈦金屬複合材料讓擬態機甲孵化池擁有可彎曲性，並且使其能夠儲存孵化池所需的揮發性黏液。 /// Polymer-titanium composites allow the Simulant spawning pool to flex and conform to the volatile ooze it contains.=16645
Skin/Info/SpawningPoolRCZ,相較原本的純生物控制機制，機械控制強化器能夠更加精準地讓地獄犬孵化池的溫度和酸鹼度維持在一定範圍內。 /// Cybernetic enhancements keep Cerberus spawning pools in temperature and pH ranges considerably more precise than their pure-biological antecedents.=16646
Skin/Info/SpineCrawler,在群落戰爭之後，蟲群製造出了脊刺爬行蟲，可以協助蟲群對抗來自地面的威脅。它們可以在戰場上移動位置，取得控制區域的優勢。 /// Following the Brood War, the swarm generated spine crawlers to better protect itself from ground threats. They are capable of repositioning around the battlefield to gain area control.=16647
Skin/Info/SpineCrawlerMecha,擬態機甲脊刺爬行蟲擁有單分子尺度的脊刺尖端，讓脊刺爬行蟲有辦法刺穿最厚的人類裝甲。 /// A spearpoint terminating in a monomolecular tip allows the Simulant spine crawler to penetrate even the thickest terran armor. =16648
Skin/Info/SpineCrawlerRCZ,地獄犬安排了數千隻遠端控制的脊刺爬行蟲深入泰拉朵九號星地殼中，以擴展錯綜複雜的熔岩通道網路。 /// Cerberus has tasked thousands of remote-control spine crawlers with expanding the lava tube networks that criss-cross Tyrador IX's crust.=16649
Skin/Info/Spire,尖嘯螳螂高聳的巢穴是蟲族螺旋塔的基礎，其底部是由具彈性的肌肉組織構成。 /// The towering nests of the mantis screamers formed the basis for the zerg spire. The stalks that form their foundation are made of flexible muscle.=16650
Skin/Info/SpireMecha,供應擬態機甲飛螳和腐化飛蟲的推進氣體庫存，讓螺旋塔不斷與它的限制用纜線拉扯擺動。 /// A reservoir of propellant gases for Simulant mutalisks and corruptors keeps the spire bobbing against its restraint cables.=16651
Skin/Info/SpireRCZ,地底的地獄犬螺旋塔所孵化出的飛螳，從泰拉朵巨蝠學會利用回聲定位進行狩獵的能力，一舉取代巨蝠，成為這顆星球最恐怖的穴居生物。 /// Mutalisks from subterranean Cerberus spires exhibit echolocative hunting behavior absorbed from Tyrador gigabats, previously the planet's scariest cave-dwelling creature.=16652
Skin/Info/SporeCrawler,光是孢子殖穴還不足以保障主宰的生存，為了保護自己的物種，蟲族進化出了空中防禦，製造出適用更多場合的孢子爬行蟲。 /// Spore colonies were not enough to prevent the Overmind's elimination. In order to protect their species, zerg evolved their air defense, creating the more flexible spore crawler.=16653
Skin/Info/SporeCrawlerMecha,第一位發現擬態機甲孢子爬行蟲的假彈藥被替換成奈米仿真物質的人類飛行員，獲得了一大筆退休金，和一副純金打造的義肢。 /// The first terran pilot to discover that the Simulant spore crawler's fake ammunition had been replaced by a nano-facsimile of the real thing was awarded a generous pension and gold-plated replacement legs.=16654
Skin/Info/SporeCrawlerRCZ,地獄犬孢子爬行蟲聚集在泰拉朵九號星地表的洞窟中，看起來就像是一大片脈動的多刺石筍。 /// Cerberus spore crawlers amass in caverns near Tyrador IX's surface like great fields of pulsing, spiny stalagmites.=16655
Skin/Info/Stalker,追獵者是由尼拉辛姆所創，並且在當中注入了原本戰士的暗影原質。他們的瞬移本事，使他們行動迅速又難以捉摸。 /// Created by the Nerazim, stalkers are machines that are infused with the shadow essences of their warriors. The ability to teleport makes them both swift and unpredictable.=16656
Skin/Info/StalkerDeluxe,尼拉辛姆的追獵者科技受惠於卡萊工程科學，神族現在正試著將龍騎士機甲的強化部件整合到追獵者的框架當中。 /// The Nerazim's stalker technology has benefited from Khalai engineering. The protoss are now experimenting with integrating dragoon chassis reinforcements into the battle strider frame. =16657
Skin/Info/StalkerGolden,卡萊相位工匠試圖以古代聖堂武士的風格，重新打造出尼拉辛姆的追獵者。可惜最終招來了許多批評，而非景仰。 /// Khalai phase-smiths have attempted to recreate Nerazim's stalkers in the elegant style of the ancient Templar. Unfortunately, their results elicited more offense than admiration.=16658
Skin/Info/StalkerIhanrii,追獵者身上雕銘著神聖的符文，可以用來保護他們的可動石質裝甲，抵抗伊翰利神族敵人的攻擊。 /// These stalkers are inscribed with sacred runes meant to safeguard their animated stone armor against the heretic enemies of the Ihan-rii. =16659
Skin/Info/StalkerPurifier,進化者進一步改善了追獵者的程式，讓它有能力全自動地從複雜的互動戰鬥紀錄中取得資料，進而改善表現。 /// The Purifiers have further refined stalker programming to draw from a complex log of battle interactions, allowing them to perform well even though they are fully automated.=16660
Skin/Info/StalkerTaldarim,並不是每個塔達力姆神族都希望成為飛升者。那些只想琢磨自己的戰鬥技巧，好好為大領主效勞的人，往往會化身追獵者，專心狩獵敵人。 /// Not all Tal'darim seek ascension. Those who wish only to sharpen their combat skills and serve their Highlord often choose to become stalkers, in order to better hunt and kill their foes.=16661
Skin/Info/Stargate,躍傳主力艦的過程需要耗用大量能量，導致過程中放射出的大量光線，在極遠的距離外就能觀測得到。 /// The process of warping in capital ships requires such a vast amount of energy that the excess light emission can be witnessed from vast distances.=16662
Skin/Info/StargateForged,塔達利姆星際之門延長的建築結構可以協助剛召喚來的船艦加速離開，直接投入戰鬥。 /// The elongated structure of the Tal'darim stargate helps newly summoned ships accelerate out of the bay and directly into battle.=16663
Skin/Info/StargateIhanrii,雖然伊翰利宣稱他們很滿意居住在古老家園的生活，不過他們的星際之門卻開始製造可穿梭星際的主力艦種，暗示著某種追求權力的動機。 /// Though the Ihan-rii claim to be satisfied with partial inhabitation of their ancestral homeworld, their stargates have begun to produce interstellar capital ships, which would suggest somewhat more imperial motives.=16664
Skin/Info/StargateTaldarim,=16665
Skin/Info/Starport,自治聯盟陸戰隊作戰手冊中明白指出，空軍優勢是人類在克普魯以及其他星區取得主導地位的關鍵。 /// The Dominion Marine Corps combat handbook makes very clear that air superiority is vital to terran dominance in the Koprulu sector and beyond. =16666
Skin/Info/StarportCovertOps,每次任務完成之後，特種部隊星際港會將成員與貨物運送到星軌上，就和一座功能齊全的太空站一樣。 /// After each mission is complete, the special forces starport carries its crew and cargo into orbit, where it functions as a fully operational space station.=16667
Skin/Info/StarportSilver,為了因應大量激增的外星威脅，泰拉朵騎士加速進行星際港生產計畫，可是伊翰利似乎也同時跟進，加快擴增空軍規模的腳步。 /// Proliferating extraplanetary threats have led the Knights of Tyrador to accelerate their starport production schedules, but the Ihan-rii seem to be amassing air units just as quickly.=16668
Skin/Info/SupplyDepot,稱職的指揮官一定相當明白補給線的重要性。少了堆滿糧食與彈藥的補給站，根本不可能打仗。 /// Every CO worth their salt knows the importance of a supply line. Without a depot fully stocked with food and ammo, warfare is simply impossible.=16669
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotCovertOps,在比較炎熱的行星上，這種補給站的超強通風系統讓下哨的陸戰隊們紛紛到這裡來享受清涼飲料。 /// On hotter planets, this supply depot's supercharged ventilation system makes it a popular spot for off-duty marines to crack open a few cold ones.=16670
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotSilver,泰拉朵騎士補給站頂部的獨角獸印記，每天會以手工打磨兩次，通常是由新人或是最低階的士兵來做。 /// The unicorn sigil atop each Knights of Tyrador supply depot is hand-polished twice daily, usually by the freshest and lowest-ranking recruits.=16671
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotXPR,安捷爾物流在經過失去繼承人的這場悲劇之後，再度恢復了營運。這家公司保證會以優惠的價格，並在預定時間內將貨物運抵前線。 /// After the tragic loss of its heir apparent, Angel Shipping is back in business. The company's shipments are guaranteed to arrive on the frontline ahead of schedule and under budget.=16672
Skin/Info/SwarmHost,蟲族的增殖能力相當強，其中以百生獸最為優秀。憑藉著快速孵化一群又一群蝗蟲，讓百生獸具有以一擋百的戰力。 /// The Swarm excels at proliferation, especially the hideous Swarm Host. By rapidly birthing multitudes of locusts, a single Swarm Host can overwhelm an enemy army.=16673
Skin/Info/SwarmHostMecha,在研究百生獸機械運作機制時，工程師開始一個個生病倒下，但安全系統卻沒有回報任何問題，生產也沒有受到任何干擾，除了幾個致命的案例以外。 /// Engineers began to fall ill while working on the swarm host mechanics. However, the safety systems did not report a problem, and production continued undisturbed—fatalities aside.=16674
Skin/Info/SwarmHostPrimal,原生百生獸是所有百生獸的祖先，百生獸僅僅只是其中一個旁支物種。但在命運的擺弄之下，這兩個品系再度合而為一。 /// These creatures have developed as an offshoot of the primal hosts, who were the progenitors of all swarm hosts. Now, through a surprising twist of fate, the strains have merged once more.=16675
Skin/Info/SwarmHostRCZ,地獄犬百生獸內部有微型產線，讓每隻蝗蟲都配有可遠端遙控的頭部裝置。 /// The Cerberus swarm host contains an internal microfactory that equips each locust with remote-control headgear.=16676
Skin/Info/SwarmHostWebby,利維坦群落的百生獸特別擅長兩棲作戰，牠們身上具有許多基因優勢，因此能迅速通過水域，獵殺牠們的獵物。 /// The swarm hosts of the Leviathan Brood are uniquely specialized for amphibious assault and bear many genetic advantages that allow them to move quickly through the oceans and assail their prey.=16677
Skin/Info/TechLab,一旦戰鬥用建築建造完成，就能在旁邊成立科技實驗室進行研發工作。其中某些研發工作相當危險，但對戰事相當重要。 /// Once combat buildings are established, small tech labs are built alongside them to undertake research and development work. Some of this work can be dangerous, but it is seen essential to the war effort.=16678
Skin/Info/TechLabCovertOps,特種部隊的科技實驗室使用從自治聯盟神族盟友偷來的奈米科技，將能源使用效率最大化，提升研發速度。 /// The special forces tech lab uses nanotechnology pilfered from the Dominion's protoss allies to maximize energy efficiency and research speed.=16679
Skin/Info/TechLabSilver,泰拉朵騎士科技實驗室擁有最先進的氣候控制系統，可以透過行星的激烈溫度變動來把效率維持在尖峰狀態。 /// Knights of Tyrador tech labs feature state-of-the-art climate control systems to maintain peak efficiency through the planet's intense shifts in temperature.=16680
Skin/Info/Tempest,暴風艦加入黃金艦隊建制的時間不算長，但是已經贏得威力最強戰艦的美名。面對它們射出的猛烈崩解能量，沒人能掉以輕心。 /// Tempests are a recent addition to the Golden Armada, and have earned their place as one of the fleet’s most powerful warships. Their volatile disintegration weaponry is a force to be reckoned with.=16681
Skin/Info/TempestGolden,在數次實驗之後，相位工匠終於打造出了獨特的暴風艦，裝飾著閃耀的合金板。這些合金板可以承受船艦動能矩陣的破壞性傷害。 /// After some experimentation, phase-smiths created customized tempests with high-sheen ornamental plating that could withstand the destructive energies of the vessel's kinetic matrix.=16682
Skin/Info/TempestIhanrii,伊翰利暴風艦石質表面的抑制效果，反而提升了動能矩陣集中能量輸出的功率。 /// The dampening effect of the Ihan-rii tempest's stone surface enhances its ability to focus the incredible power output of its kinetic matrix.=16683
Skin/Info/TempestPurifier,這些遠端操作的船艦是淨化者計畫最具代表性的成就。賽博洛斯所製造的合金板更讓它在同型船艦中顯得十分搶眼。 /// This remotely piloted vessel is one of the signature achievements of the Purifier program, and its Cybros manufactured plating is among the most distinctive of its kind.=16684
Skin/Info/TempestTaldarim,雖然這是少數案例，不過達蘭還是有讓塔達力姆感到驚艷的地方，例如暴風艦就是一個例子。大領主第一次見識到暴風艦的實戰表現，就發誓一定要把它們納入死亡艦隊。 /// Occasionally, the Daelaam impress the Tal'darim. The creation of the tempest was one such moment. Upon first seeing them in combat, the Highlord vowed to seize them for the death fleet.=16685
Skin/Info/TemplarArchive,高階聖堂武士會在聖堂文庫存取並研究前人的記憶與經驗，磨練自身的幽能能力。 /// The high templar hone their psionic abilities at the templar archives by accessing and studying the memories and experiences of their predecessors.=16686
Skin/Info/TemplarArchiveForged,在戰事之間，飛升之鍊階級較高的塔達利姆戰士可以進入聖堂文庫，重新體驗他們最英勇的事蹟。 /// In between battles, Tal'darim warriors ranked highly on the Chain of Ascension can visit the templar archives to relive their most heroic feats.=16687
Skin/Info/TemplarArchiveIhanrii,伊翰利聖堂文庫嚴密收藏著文明相關的秘密，例如宗教文獻，或是關於恐怖的半有機體可動石材之操作指南。 /// Ihan-rii templar archives contain the civilization's most closely guarded secrets, including religious texts and instructions for the gruesome semi-organic generation of animated stone.=16688
Skin/Info/Thor,雷神展現了人類的極致軍事力量，在一台機體上就裝備了足夠解決敵方一整支戰鬥部隊的火力。 /// The ultimate expression of terran military might, the Thor is outfitted with enough artillery to take down an army of enemy combatants on its own.=16689
Skin/Info/ThorCE,改造與強化雷神已經成為自治聯盟工程師們的一場地下競賽。而對於可以不斷增強這架攻城雙足兵器，領導者們也相當滿意，允許這股風潮持續下去。 /// Improving on the Thor has become an informal competition amongst Dominion engineers. Top brass is content with allowing this trend to continue, as long as it results in more powerful siege walkers.=16690
Skin/Info/ThorCovertOps,自治聯盟特種部隊的雷神身上不光是進行過無數改良，還加裝了最新型的生化鋼鐵裝甲，可說是近代武器工程方面的重大成果。 /// A signature achievement in recent weapons engineering, the Dominion Special Forces thor boasts innumerable upgrades and the latest in neosteel plating advancements.=16691
Skin/Info/ThorJunker,米拉的手下們早就想要一台雷神了，但製造上的困難總會讓他們打退堂鼓。不過相信他們很快就能找到方法，組裝出一台有完整功能的雷神了… /// Mira's crew has long desired a Thor of their own, but construction challenges routinely set them back. Any day now, they could find a way to assemble one that is fully functional...=16692
Skin/Info/ThorSilver,泰拉朵的雷神經過鈽塗層處理，可以使動能在閥值以下的投射物彈道偏折，而且鈽處理在閱兵的時候也相當美觀。 /// Tyrador thors are treated with a plutonium coating that deflects projectiles below a certain energy threshold. They also look great in parades.=16693
Skin/Info/ThorUmojan,在經過數年狂熱的探索之後，尤摩捷護衛軍終於找到對抗自治聯盟雷神的解答。它令人印象深刻的程度，就和它身上尤摩捷符號的數量一樣，讓人驚嘆。 /// After years of fervent exploration, the Umojan Protectorate has finally come up with its answer to the Dominion's Thor, and its impressiveness is only matched by the number of Umojan symbols it sports.=16694
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncil,暮光議會是達蘭神族代表舉行會議，討論神族將來如何改善的所在地。 /// The twilight council serves as a meeting place for representatives of the Daelaam to discuss the betterment of all protoss.=16695
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncilForged,這又是一座偷來的卡萊建築物，只是塔達利姆暮光議會的外觀更加陰沉嚇人，不過它所提供的升級選項完全相同。 /// Another stolen Khalai structure, the Tal'darim twilight council's architecture is more intimidating and somber, though the upgrades it bestows are identical.=16696
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncilIhanrii,伊翰利議會高層發現，返回阿拉基爾這個古老家園，帶來一種既熟悉又不安的感覺。離開家園這段時間太久了，許多事物都跟以前不一樣了，例如空氣品質變差，以及他們喜愛的數個物種已經滅絕，這兩者皆肇因於人類在此地發展。 /// Ihan-rii council elders have found the return to their homeworld, Arakyr, both familiar and unsettling. Much has changed in their long absence, including a decline in air quality and the extinction of several beloved species, both attributable to terran development.=16697
Skin/Info/Ultralisk,雷獸擁有難以置信的體型和力量。牠們那裝甲等級的蟲殼幾乎無法穿透，而那對巨大的鐮刃能輕易地將敵人碾碎或切成兩半。 /// Ultralisks are legendary for their size and strength. Their armored carapaces are nearly impenetrable, and their gargantuan pincers can both crush and eviscerate their enemies with ease.=16698
Skin/Info/UltraliskCE,雷獸原本就巨大且破壞力驚人。在注入了澤瑞斯星原生蟲族的原質之後，牠們又更成為了名符其實的殺戮機器。 /// Ultralisks are powerful and destructive enough as they are. When infused with the essence of Zerus's primal zerg, however, they become truly unstoppable killing machines.=16699
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavern,這個洞穴存放了許多帶有輻射的危險生物質。其中產生的化學反應會用來製造雷獸所需的基因編碼。 /// This cavern is filled with dangerous biological deposits infused with high radiation. The chemical reactions created within are used to build the genetic code required for the ultralisk.=16700
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavernMecha,擬態機甲雷獸洞穴利用改造過的戰巡艦熱能護盾，來存放具有放射性的內部構造。 /// The Simulant Project ultralisk cavern houses its radioactive innards within a converted battlecruiser engine heatshield.=16701
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavernRCZ,雷獸洞穴每小時能製造出三組閃亮亮的鈦合金刀刃，威力十分驚人。稍微美中不足的地方，正如地獄犬副總裁某次諷刺地說道，雷獸嘴巴上方的燈看起來像是滑稽的小眼睛。 /// This ultralisk cavern churns out three sets of gleaming forged-titanium blades every hour, an intimidating purpose only slightly undermined by the fact that--as a Cerberus vice president once wryly observed--the lights above its mouth look like goofy little eyes.=16702
Skin/Info/UltraliskMecha,在計畫早期，大家都同意團隊不會試圖複製雷獸。但後來實驗室的狀況一片混亂，顯然這個協議已經不存在了… /// Early in the project, it was agreed that the team would never construct a replica of the ultralisk. When chaos later overtook the lab, it became clear that the agreement had been broken...=16703
Skin/Info/UltraliskPrimal,原生雷獸的外觀有很高的變異性，有些和蟲群的雷獸相當類似，另一些有著不同特徵的雷獸則很能適應澤瑞斯的生活。 /// Primal ultralisks exhibit a high level of variety in their appearance, with some closely resembling the Swarm ultralisks, and others adapting different features better suited to life on Zerus.=16704
Skin/Info/UltraliskRCZ,地獄犬業務團隊總是會對有潛力的客戶展示如何遠端遙控雷獸。牠們的熱處理鈦金屬刀更是一大看點。 /// Cerberus sales teams always make sure to show prospective clients the remote-control ultralisk. Their heat-treated titanium blade implants are a beautiful sight to behold.=16705
Skin/Info/UltraliskRemastered,相較於現代雷獸的厚重裝甲，以前的雷獸比較輕巧敏捷，強大的肌肉和肌腱可以一次屠殺一片敵人。 /// Early ultralisks were slimmer and more agile than their modern-day counterparts, with swaths of durable muscle and sinew instead of bulky armor.=16706
Skin/Info/UltraliskWebby,幾乎沒有什麼生物能跟雷獸的怪力相抗衡。利維坦群落的雷獸身上長出脊刺和骨刃，如此恐怖的外型可說是一代傳奇。 /// Few other living creatures can match the sheer might of the ultralisks. Those birthed by the Leviathan Brood are terrifying visages of spines and blades--monsters worthy of legend.=16707
Skin/Info/Viking,維京戰機的設計理念，是用來強化泰倫自治聯盟的對空武力；具有兩種變形模式，可說是相當優秀的現代戰機。 /// Developed to bolster the Terran Dominion's anti-air forces, the Viking is a modern classic thanks to its two versatile combat modes.=16708
Skin/Info/VikingCovertOps,自治聯盟的研究人員發現，在維京戰機上面加裝一組雙引擎，就能同時強化戰機在兩種模式下的火力。 /// Dominion researchers have added a new set of twin engines to complement the existing design of the viking, while increasing its firepower in both modes.=16709
Skin/Info/VikingJunker,米拉的技師幫維京戰機加上了一系列特殊改裝，包括一組巨大的雙引擎，它在全速運轉下發出的怒吼聲，對敵人有強大的威嚇力。 /// Mira's mechanics have given their Vikings a number of special additions, including massive twin engines that produce an impressively intimidating roar when fully revved.=16710
Skin/Info/VikingMecha,在維勒安大帝的指示下，城堡工業在維京戰機技術面有大幅突破。設計出的原型機具有更加流線的外型，效率也更高。 /// Under Emperor Valerian's orders, Castillo Industries has developed a breakthrough in Viking technology. Their prototype features a sleeker and more efficient construction.=16711
Skin/Info/VikingSilver,維京戰機藍色的推進器在夜空中十分搶眼，甚至在數哩外就能看見。遊客們也因此能確保泰拉朵騎士正在看顧他們。 /// At night, the stunning blue thrusters on this viking can be spotted from miles away, reassuring tourists that the Knights of Tyrador are watching over them.=16712
Skin/Info/VikingUmojan,在長時間的協商之後，城堡工業終於同意為尤摩捷護衛軍獨家生產全新，配備有重裝甲的維京戰機。 /// After a protracted negotiation, Castillo Industries has agreed to manufacture a new, heavily plated Viking model exclusively for the Umojan Protectorate.=16713
Skin/Info/Viper,阿巴瑟將原生蟲族的飛蟒基因序編入蟲族基因庫，飛蟒能隨主人的意思，任意操弄戰場。 /// Originally a part of the primal zerg, the vipers' sequences were incorporated into the Swarm by Abathur himself. Now, they serve as a tool to manipulate the battlefield to their master's liking.=16714
Skin/Info/ViperMecha,當擬態計畫接近完成時，計畫總監開始特別注意他們打造出的成品，以及成本。而就在這個時候，計畫的主辦人開始拒絕回答任何問題。 /// As the Simulant Project neared its completion, the directors became increasingly concerned about what they had created—and at what cost. The project owners stopped answering questions around this point.=16715
Skin/Info/ViperPrimal,飛蟒的原始樣本就已經具備了許多難纏的防禦能力，而這也讓阿巴瑟注意到牠，以牠做為蟲群進一步演化的首選。 /// The original viper specimens possess a number of uniquely vicious defenses, making it no surprise that they came to Abathur's attention as prime candidates for further evolution.=16716
Skin/Info/ViperRCZ,植入了髻狀顱內移植物的飛蟒，在抓握物體上的準確性大幅提升。 /// Vipers with hammerhead cranial implants demonstrate dramatic increases in prehensile proboscis precision.=16717
Skin/Info/ViperWebby,利維坦群落可說是最古老的蟲族群落之一。與蟲族的其他物種相比，牠們的飛蟒呈現出更多破壞蠍的特徵。雖然這讓牠們的外型看起來十分奇形怪狀，但好處是體內可儲存強烈的劇毒。 /// As one of the original zerg broods, Leviathan vipers exhibit more defiler tendencies than the rest of the Swarm. While this has caused many abnormalities to surface, its potent toxins appear to be worth it.=16718
Skin/Info/VoidRay,聖堂武士和尼拉辛姆科技的結合，造就出虛空艦，這種極具破壞力的攻擊艦，正是兩個陣營攜手合作的證明。 /// The result of combining Templar and Nerazim technology, void rays are devastating assault ships that demonstrate what is possible when the two factions unite for a common cause.=16719
Skin/Info/VoidRayGolden,最新的虛空艦結合了古老聖堂武士的經典架構，以及尼拉辛姆偏好的陰影色彩風格。 /// The latest void rays have combined the classical refinement of ancient Templar construction with the shadowy coloration favored by the Nerazim.=16720
Skin/Info/VoidRayIhanrii,在泰拉朵九號星上，一支石製艦隊帶著轟鳴的虛空能量光束出現，讓淹沒新迦南防禦設施的地獄犬蟲族頓時無處可逃。 /// On Tyrador IX, a fleet of stone ships with shrieking void-energy beams appeared and blindsided the Cerberus zerg just as they overran New Canaan's defenses. =16721
Skin/Info/VoidRayPurifier,淨化者的虛空艦是工藝的結晶。在這艘船艦上，結合了三個不同神族陣營的研究成果。 /// The Purifier void ray is a true feat in engineering, combining the research of three different protoss factions in a single elegant vessel.=16722
Skin/Info/VoidRayTaldarim,血岩晶體取得不易。如果塔達力姆的晶體存量不足以把虛空艦改裝成毀滅者，他們會毫不猶豫的直接利用在虛空艦本身的武裝。 /// Bloodshard crystals are not easily collected. When the Tal'darim do not have enough of them to convert a void ray into a destroyer, they make use of the ship's existing armaments without hesitation.=16723
Skin/Info/WarpPrism,傳輸稜鏡能作為幽能矩陣的延長線，不只是具備機動性的兵力運輸工具，同時也是緊急時的能量供給裝置。雖然本身脆弱不耐攻擊，但是對神族艦隊來說，它們是不可或缺的存在。 /// By acting as a conduit into the psionic matrix, warp prisms function as both mobile troop transport and emergency power source. Though they are fragile, no protoss fleet is complete without them.=16724
Skin/Info/WarpPrismGolden,古代聖堂武士的傳輸稜鏡有特殊的水晶晶格，有時會反射出經過他們傳送的戰士神經模式。 /// Ancient Templar warp prisms featured a distinctive crystal lattice that would sometimes reflect the neural patterns of the warriors they transport.=16725
Skin/Info/WarpPrismIhanrii,伊翰利傳輸稜鏡逐漸展開，就像一朵在母星山丘上綻放的花朵一般。而這顆母星，現在被當地居民稱作「泰拉朵九號星」。 /// Unfurled, the Ihan-rii warp prism evokes a flower that once covered the hillsides of their homeworld, referred to by its current residents as "Tyrador IX."  =16726
Skin/Info/WarpPrismNerazim,達蘭相位工匠在改良傳輸稜鏡上有重大突破，尼拉辛姆指揮官對這種可以運用虛空能量的相位稜鏡讚譽有加。 /// Daelaam phase-smiths have broken new ground by adapting warp prisms to use Void energy. These variants, known as phase prisms, have already earned great popularity with Nerazim commanders.=16727
Skin/Info/WarpPrismPurifier,淨化者的傳輸稜鏡會在必要時，自動將A.I.人格在不同的機體之間轉移。而且這個效果在戰場上各處都能都能發動。 /// Purifier warp prisms can automatically transfer an AI personality between different shells if needed, and warp prisms enable this to happen anywhere on the battlefield. =16728
Skin/Info/WarpPrismTaldarim,到底要不要以先進武器來武裝傳輸稜鏡，是艦隊首領之間永遠爭論不休的話題。有些人希望，單純用它們把戰士送到戰場上就好。 /// Arming warp prisms with advanced weaponry is a point of contention among the fleet lords. Some prefer to use them to simply deploy their own warriors onto the battlefield.=16729
Skin/Info/WidowMine,寡婦詭雷最一開始是由維克多‧卡臣斯基所設計出來的，後來逐漸改良成具有超絕殺傷力的致命武器，能對敵人發射防禦飛彈，攻其不備。 /// Initially developed by Victor Kachinsky, the widow mine has been refined into a surprisingly lethal device that can fire defensive missiles against unsuspecting enemies.=16730
Skin/Info/WidowMineCovertOps,由於過去偶爾會發生誤傷意外，因此技術人員在寡婦詭雷上面加裝了更多的合金板，藉此減少事故發生的機率，以及防止意外傷亡。 /// Perplexed by occasional misfires in the past, technicians have added more protective plating to the widow mines to better contain accidents and protect against unintended injuries.=16731
Skin/Info/WidowMineJunker,在數次造成巨大破壞的實驗之後，米拉的傭兵重新設計出了寡婦詭雷，可以承載更多武器和炸藥。 /// After several rounds of heavily destructive experimentation, Mira's mercs redesigned their widow mines to accommodate additional weaponry and explosives.=16732
Skin/Info/WidowMineSilver,儘管寡婦詭雷常常因為血淋淋的意外登上新聞版面，但它簡約亮麗的外表還是吸引了許多泰拉朵九號星的上流社會人士，把它當作居家的寵物。 /// Despite gory accidents that make the news from time to time, sleek and shiny widow mines remain a common pet in the upper-class households of Tyrador IX.=16733
Skin/Info/WidowMineUmojan,尤摩捷工程師對機械總是充滿熱愛，他們還舉辦了打造完美寡婦詭雷的比賽，但等到發現冠軍是個還在努力取得學位的學生以後，所有工程師都震驚了。 /// Always fond of robotics, the Umojan engineers held an exclusive competition to craft the perfect widow mine and were thrilled to discover that the winner was still a student finishing her degree.=16734
Skin/Info/Zealot,狂戰士是戰場上無可比擬的戰鬥單位，經過了數十年的嚴苛訓練，他們的作戰技巧近乎完美。他們那知名的幽能之刃，是由自身的幽能所形成的。 /// Peerless warriors on the battlefield, zealots undergo decades of intense training in order to perfect their combat skills. Their signature psi-blades are formed with their own psionic energy.=16735
Skin/Info/ZealotGolden,有許多狂戰士很快就跟上了高階聖堂武士慶祝神族黃金紀元，以及其藝術和文化成就的風潮。不過這波運動至今尚未受到官方認可。 /// Many zealots were quick to follow the high templar in celebrating the protoss' golden age, along with its artistic and cultural achievements. However, the movement has received no official recognition thus far.=16736
Skin/Info/ZealotIhanrii,伊翰利神族狂戰士相信薩爾納加總有一天會回歸，讓勇敢的戰士們都能受到神的永久祝福。 /// Zealots of the Ihan-rii protoss believe the xel'naga will return one day to bless valiant warriors with eternal godhood.=16737
Skin/Info/ZealotPurifier,儘管哨兵們沒有各自的人格，但在程式設定之下，他們依舊是高貴的戰士，就和狂戰士一樣。 /// Though they do not possess unique personalities, the sentinels are programmed to be noble warriors equal to their zealot brethren.=16738
Skin/Info/ZealotRemastered,為了展現大無畏精神，有許多狂戰士在大戰期間不戴頭盔作戰。但這樣的行為在之後已經被禁止了。 /// To demonstrate their fearlessness, many zealots went without head armor during the Great War. This practice has since been discontinued.=16739
Skin/Info/ZealotTaldarim,在飛升之鍊最底層的成員，同時是最急著想證明自己的人。因此塔達力姆的狂戰士可說是最危險的敵人。 /// The lowest ranking links in the Chain of Ascension are also the ones most eager to prove themselves. A zealot of the Tal'darim is a dangerous foe to face.=16740
Skin/Info/ZealotXPR,雖然秘密議會已經不存在了，但司法官們依舊擁有軍事領袖的地位，始終保持著對達蘭的忠誠。只要神族還存在，他們就會繼續英勇作戰。 /// Though the Conclave no longer exists, the praetors who served as its military leaders are still loyal to the Daelaam. For as long as the protoss live, they will continue to fight with valor.=16741
Skin/Info/Zergling,異化蟲既殘暴又充滿野性，若牠們在某個高等品系的蟲族控制下大舉進攻，危險性不可輕忽。 /// Savage and feral, zerglings are most dangerous when attacking in large groups that are controlled by a larger and more advanced strain of zerg.=16742
Skin/Info/ZerglingMecha,儘管它們的外觀和行為都很像異化蟲，但這種擬態異化蟲純粹由機械打造而成，並且仰賴電力，而非吸收敵人的DNA做為動力來源。 /// Though they look and act just like zerglings, the simulants are purely mechanical reproductions that run wholly on electrical power sources, rather than absorbing the DNA of their enemies.=16743
Skin/Info/ZerglingPrimal,某些較小型的原生異化蟲，與蟲群中的同類相當類似，甚至連攻擊的方式都非常接近。 /// Some of the smaller primal zerglings have been known to resemble their counterparts in the Swarm, even to the point where they possess similar attack capabilities.=16744
Skin/Info/ZerglingRCZ,蟲族的神經系統很容易過度活化，這讓地獄犬的工程師必須再加裝兩組天線，才能正確控制牠們。 /// Zergling nervous systems are so hyperactive that Cerberus engineers had to affix two antennas to control their movement properly.=16745
Skin/Info/ZerglingWebby,減少異化蟲的基因組數量，造成意料之外的結果。 利維坦群落的異化蟲快速成長並非刻意進化而成的，而是DNA極為簡化後的副作用。 /// The reduction of the zergling genome has had unpredictable results. The growths present on Leviathan zerglings are not intentionally evolved, but a byproduct of their extremely simplified DNA.=16746
Skin/Info/ZerglingXPR,異化蟲是平均壽命最短的蟲族。要是有能夠延長牠們壽命的突變基因，都值得詳加觀察與分析。 /// Few zerg have a shorter life expectancy than the zergling. Any mutation that appears to increase that life expectancy is considered worthy of observation and analysis.=16747

UI/HelpGameMechanic_FogOfWar_Description,<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>戰爭迷霧會限制玩家只能看到其單位與建築可見的視野。</li><li>當玩家失去某區域的視野，就無法看見其中的敵方單位，但敵方建築仍會在原地點顯示其最後被看見的狀態與位置。</li><li>如果玩家被視野外的敵人攻擊時，這些攻擊單位會在戰爭迷霧中暫時現形，但是玩家必須擁有完整視野才能展開反擊。例如：當玩家的單位被視野外的攻城坦克攻擊時，展開攻擊的攻城坦克會在戰爭迷霧中暫時現形。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Fog of War limits players' vision to what their units and structures can see.</li><li>When a player loses vision of an area, enemy units can't be seen and structures are shown in the last seen state and location.</li><li>If a player is attacked by an enemy they can't see, they will be shown the attacking unit but can't retaliate until they have vision. Example: If a siege tank is attacking outside of your vision, the siege tank is displayed briefly through the fog of war.</li></ul>=18245

UI/HelpGameMechanic_HighLowGround_Description,<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>你必須擁有高地的視野才能攻擊高地上的敵人。</li><li>高地上的單位在攻擊你時會在戰爭迷霧中現形，但你必須擁有該處高地的視野才能展開反擊。</li><li>若想獲得高地的視野，你必須將地面部隊移動至高地上，或者利用飛行單位來獲得視野。</li></ul></s> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>You must have vision of the high ground in order to attack units on a higher cliff level.</li><li>Units on high ground appear through the fog of war if they attack you, but you can't counterattack unless you have vision of the high ground.</li><li>To gain vision of the high ground, you need a ground unit on the high ground or a flying unit to act as a spotter.</li></ul></s>=18247
